◎講師は、PR TIMES認定 プレスリリースエバンジェリストです。
「プレスリリース」の存在を社会に広める人として、業界のリーディングカンパニーに認定されています。
なお、PR TIMESの商品を積極的に販売することはありませんので、ご安心ください。
◎この講座は、2015年から日本全国の企業、業界団体、商工会議所などでリピート開催されている人気講座です。
導入実績：鎌倉市商工会議所（神奈川県）、 高岡市商工会議所（富山県）、 ＪＡ（農業協同組合）栃木中央会　ほか多数
◎講座にはワークが入っています。視聴しながら自社のことを具体的に考えることができます。受講後はビジネスの不安やモヤモヤを、スッキリ解消！
◎本講座をご受講の方には、プレスリリースのひな形（Word版）をプレゼント。受講後、すぐにプレスリリースを作り、送ることができます。

courses.title: DIY Video Recording on a Budget
courses.bio: Learn how to record your video with OBS on a low budget
objectives: Learn to record your own video on a budget with a free video recording software
Learn the basic in OBS for your video recording
Learn the necessary steps to create a video production in OBS
How to look good and how to sound good in your video
How to engage your audience
Learn how to use a free editing tool to edit your video
How to record and play back your video

Session 3: Overview and Scope of the Course

requirements: No prior knowledge required. You will learn everything you need to know.
courses.description:
DIY Video Recording on a Budget
For many, moving from in-person to online presentations may bring a new set of challenges to overcome. Are you concerned you might fumble with new technology or appear frazzled when presenting in an unfamiliar digital arena? Or are you concerned with the cost of producing a recorded video for training and or other purposes. You’re not alone.
This seminar will give you tips to help you deliver online presentations like a pro and on a budget.
Recorded training programs have the benefit of being accessible any time. They can be rewound, paused, fast-forwarded, etc. They can be watched by a new employee at home after work or over a lunch break.
The organization can distribute these recordings to new employees to save time and reduce repetition during the training period. Providing all trainees with the same record of information also increases the consistency and accuracy of the training process.
• Accessible any time
• Can be watched by new employee
• Content can be reviewed at own pace
• Allow users to use other resources at the same time
• A collection of resources
• Analyzing training effectiveness
This course will show you how to use OBS (Open Broadcast Software), a free open source software, to record your training in a cheap and effective way. It can be used to capture your PowerPoint presentations together with the presenter and record it as a video.
Open Broadcaster Software or OBS is a free, open-source software for video recording and video streaming. It can be used to capture your screen and/or PowerPoint presentations and record it as a video or stream it live to the audience.
This course line will cover the steps required to quickly setup OBS Studio to record videos from PowerPoint presentations with a webcam overlay.
target_audience: For those who want to learn how to produce a video on your own without breaking the purse.

courses.title: eBook and Paperback Book Cover Design Using Canva and Gimp
courses.bio: Self-Publishing? Create your own professional looking book covers; ready to upload to major retailers and distributors.
objectives: Find inspiration for your book covers as well as free, cheap or premium images without infringing upon someone else's copyright
Understand the technical terms used in image design such as image size, file size, aspect ratios and color modes as well as what file type to use when uploading to your chosen platforms.
Know the current specifications for print book, eBook and catalogue covers on major platforms like Amazon and Smashwords.
Design an eBook catalogue cover in Canva using either a template or your own specifications and images
Work out the specifications for a paperback book cover or generate one in Createspace, and then design your cover in Canva with a little image manipulating in Gimp.
Set up and design book covers in Gimp using layer masks and blend modes to create interesting effects.
Convert your catalogue cover images and paperback book cover images to a suitable size to embed within your ebooks.

Finding Inspiration, Images and Colors a: Finding Inspiration for Your Book Covers
Where to Find Suitable Images For Your Book Cover
An Easy Guide to Choosing Colors
Technical Terms and Specifications for B: Understanding the Technical Terms Used in Image Design
Current Specifications for Catalogue and Embedded eBook Cover
Designing in Canva: An Overview of the Canva User Interface
Cover Design - eBook and Paperback Front Cover
Creating Multiple Similar Covers Quickly in Canva
Rasterizing Vector Graphics To Use In Canva
Designing A Paperback Book Cover in Canva
Designing in Gimp: Getting Started With The Right Sized Canvas in GIMP
Understanding Layers and Blend Mode in GIMP
Applying a Layer Mask and Blending the Background in GIMP
Using the Text Tools to Add a Book Title in GIMP
Reducing Your Catalogue Covers to a Suit: Reducing Your Catalogue Covers to a Suitable Size to Embed Within Your eBook
Creating 3D Mockups of Your Book Cover f: Creating 3D Mockups of Your Book Cover for Marketing

requirements: You need to sign up for free accounts at both Canva and Gimp and be willing to believe that you are perfectly capable of creating a great cover.
courses.description:
Thanks to huge advances in computer technology making your own book covers is not nearly as hard as it used to be. You can use drag and drop image building apps online. My favorite of these is Canva.
For those few things that you cannot do inside Canva, there is also no need to invest in expensive image manipulation software because you can do them in Gimp for free.
Even though designing a book cover can get a little technical, it's a skill you can easily learn. In this course I will teach you the software you need so that you too can get stuck in and create great covers for your books.
Designing images for book covers and designing them for social media banners and posts is very similar, so once you know how to use the software, you can go on to create all the marketing material to go with your book as well.
target_audience: Anyone wishing to design their own book covers including writers of both fiction and non-fiction. It would also be handy for marketers putting out reports and other promotional material.

courses.description:
Welcome to Building & Monetizing Newsletter Business with AI course. There is one business that has amazing prospects and huge potentials in the market but not a lot of people talk about it. If you might be wondering what is it? The answer is newsletter business. People might underestimate the prospects of this business because this model is less popular compared to business models like e-commerce, social media marketing agency, and print on demand. Actually, this is good news because it means that you will have relatively less competition and a higher chance to be successful. Now, let’s talk about the course. This is a comprehensive step by step guide on how to start your first newsletter business from scratch, in addition to that, you will also outsource most of your work to AI tools. In the introduction session, you will learn the basic fundamentals of newsletter business model, such as getting to know the market overview of newsletter business, main benefits of having newsletter business, and learn how AI can be used to automate newsletter creation. Then, you will continue by learning how to pick a high demand niche for your newsletter business and specify your target audience. Afterward, you will enter the project section, where you will be guided step by step on how to build your newsletter business from scratch using tools like Beehiiv, Newsletter Pilot, Any Word, Hoopy Copy, Junia AI, and Neural Newsletter. Once you have built your newsletter business using those tools, you will learn how to promote your newsletter and start growing your subscription base using several marketing strategies like social media promotion, uploading your website on Product Hunt, and building email lists. In the next section, you will learn several pricing strategies, specifically we will be mainly focusing on tiered pricing, freemium model, and pay what you want model. Then, you will also learn how to monetise your newsletter business through several monetisation models like monthly subscription, displaying ads, and sponsored content. Lastly, you are also going to learn about selling your newsletter business to big media companies. This section will highlight several marketplaces where you can sell your newsletter business, for example Duuce and Flippa where you can easily find people who might potentially be interested in acquiring your newsletter business.
First of all, before getting into the course, we need to ask ourselves this question, why should we start a newsletter business? Well, there are many answers to that question but one thing that people do not realise is the fact that there are many hidden monetisation models for this particular business, Not only that, in today’s creator economy, if you have high quality traffic, it opens many doors for monetisation, you can sell your products, you can also promote someone else product and get commission, or get paid through sponsored content, therefore by operating a newsletter business with substantial amount of subscribers, realise it or not you have the traffic that can potentially be monetised. Can you imagine, a lot of businesses have to prepare budgets for running ads to get traffic, but as someone who runs a newsletter business, you already have the traffic and the concept here is actually very simple, you create high quality and valuable news contents, and people who are interested will subscribe and in return you get their attentions
Below are things that you can expect to learn from this course:
Learn the basic fundamentals of newsletter business model, such as getting to know, market value and market trend of newsletter business, main benefits of having newsletter business, and how AI can be used to automate newsletter creation
Learn how to pick high demand newsletter niche and specify your target audience
Learn how to build and customize newsletter website with Beehiiv
Learn how to generate newsletter content with Beehiiv AI
Learn how to generate newsletter content with Hoppy Copy
Learn how to generate newsletter content with Neural News
Learn how to generate newsletter content with Junia AI
Learn how to generate newsletter content with Anyword
Learn how to generate newsletter content with Newsletter Pilot
Learn how to create Stripe account and connect it to Beehiiv
Learn how to set up price for premium subscription
Learn about Boosts marketplace on Beehiiv
Learn email automation to optimise newsletter CTR
Learn how to promote newsletter and grow subscription base using social media, referral program, and Product Hunt
Learn several pricing strategies for newsletter business, such as tiered pricing and freemium model
Learn how to monetise newsletter business through subscription based model, displaying ads, and sponsored content
Learn how to sell your newsletter business and potentially get acquired by media companies
Learn how to estimate your newsletter business valuation using Duuce calculator
target_audience: People who are interested in building and monetising newsletter business using Beehiiv
People who are interested in generating newsletter content automatically using AI

courses.description:
Journalism for Broadcast. Imagine appearing on a network newscast as a reporter or anchor and you look as confident, poised and articulate as any childhood idol you grew up watching. Wouldn't it be nice to know that you can look and sound exactly the way you want when you are conducting interviews or anchoring a newscast?
In this On-Camera Skills for TV Reporters and News Anchors Journalism course you will learn the following:
* How to look comfortable, confident and relaxed on TV
* How to sound conversational
* How to rehearse using video, and how to critique yourself
* How to make constant on-air improvements
*How to prepare for broadcast journalism
This TV journalism course is delivered primarily through spoken lectures. Because the skill you are learning is speaking related, it only makes sense that you learn through speaking.
The skill you will learn in this class is not primarily theoretical or academic. It is a skill that requires physical habits. That is why you will be asked to take part in numerous exercises where you record yourself speaking on video, and then watching yourself. Learning presentation skills is like learning how to ride a bicycle. You simply have to do it numerous times and work past the wobbling and falling off parts until you get it right.
This TV journalism course contains numerous video lectures plus several bonus books for your training library.
TJ Walker has been coaching and training people on their presentation and TV journalism skills for 30 years. Now, through the power of Udemy's online platform, he is able to give you the same high quality training that he gives in person to CEOs, Fortune 500 executives, and Presidents of countries. Only you can now receive the training at a tiny fraction of the normal fee for in-person training.
How long this course takes is up to you. The longest part of the course involves you speaking on video, critiquing yourself, and doing it over until you like it. But if you get to the point where you love how you look and sound when you present it will be well worth the time spent. And having this skill will save you time for all future media presentations in your life.
You can begin improving your media presentation skills right now. You may have an opportunity to speak out as soon as tomorrow, so why waste another day worried that your media presentation skills are not up to high standards. Please enroll today.
There is a 100% Money-Back Guarantee for this journalism course. And the instructor also provides an enhanced guarantee.

"5 Stars! I am a broadcaster and hoped this course would help improve my skills. It went beyond my expectations. I found this to be a very comprehensive course with excellent tips and a ton of written support. You can watch the videos to gain an understanding, then use the included books for in-depth comprehension. This is an excellent course for public speaking, and perfect for those who want to go into broadcasting or podcasting. It is also a valuable resource for seasoned reporters who want to improve their job performance and remain at the top of their game." Dave Allen



What others say:
“TJ Walker's single-minded devotion to presentation has made him the #1 expert for executives seeking guidance on speaking to the public and media." Bob Bowdon, Anchor/Reporter, Bloomberg Television
“TJ Walker is the leading media trainer in the world." Stu Miller, Viacom News Producer
(TJ Walker's Media Training Worldwide) “The world's leading presentation and media training firm." Gregg Jarrett, Fox News Channel Anchor

courses.title: Self-Publishing: Ihr Autoren-Erfolg mit E-Books und Büchern
courses.bio: "Selfpublishing-Papst" Matthias Matting erklärt, wie Sie Bücher/eBooks optimal erstellen, veröffentlichen und vermarkten
objectives: Ihr Manuskript für die Veröffentlichung hochladen
Romane und Sachbücher erfolgreich selbst verlegen
Ein optimales eBook online anbieten

Ihr gedrucktes Buch in die Läden bringen
Ihr Buch auf bestmögliche Art vermarkten
Ein dauerhaftes Einkommen mit eBooks erzielen
Rechtlichen und finanziellen Stolpersteinen aus dem Weg gehen
requirements: Interesse am Schreiben und Veröffentlichen
courses.description:
Beim Self-Publishing ist der Autor gleichzeitig Verleger. Das bringt zahlreiche neue Aufgaben mit sich: Sie müssen Ihr Buch nicht nur schreiben, sondern auch als eBook und gedrucktes Buch veröffentlichen. Sie müssen sich um Covergestaltung und Lektorat kümmern. Sie sind für die Vermarktung ebenso zuständig wie für die Abrechnung und Versteuerung – und Sie sind auch Ansprechpartner in rechtlichen Fragen.
Dieser Kurs bereitet Sie umfassend und allgemeinverständlich auf all diese Aufgaben vor. "Self-Publishing-Papst" Matthias Matting erklärt Ihnen, welche Fallstricke wo lauern, wie Sie mit der nötigen Software umgehen und wie Sie Ihr Buchprojekt auch finanziell erfolgreich und risikolos angehen. Dabei orientiert sich der Kurs stets an praktischen Beispielen. Wenn Sie binnen ein, zwei Wochen alle Lektionen durchgearbeitet haben, ist Ihr neues Buch bereits im Verkauf – garantiert.
Einen Bestseller zu landen, das kann Ihnen dieser Kurs nicht versprechen – dafür ist der Markt einfach von zu vielen Zufällen abhängig. Was Ihnen der Kurs jedoch geben kann, ist die Gewissheit, für Ihr Buch wirklich alles getan zu haben, was derzeit möglich ist.
target_audience: Autoren vor ihrer ersten Veröffentlichung
Autoren, die mit ihren bisherigen Veröffentlichungen unzufrieden sind
Erfahrene Autoren, die ihre Arbeitsweise professionalisieren wollen
Verlags-Autoren, die sich nach Alternativen fragen
Journalisten mit Interesse an einer Zweitverwertung ihrer Inhalte
Verlags-Profis mit Interesse am Phänomen Selfpublishing
Hobbyautoren auf der Suche nach ihrer Leserschaft

requirements: A computer with a internet connection

At least 1 hour of experience watching professionally produced cooking videos on the internet or televisions, like those on the Food Network
courses.description:
Cooking videos are extremely popular on YouTube. If you search, you'll find hundreds of thousands. Unfortunately, most don't look very good. Some are even painful to watch...
Don't think that you have to have thousands of dollars in professional equipment to produce decent quality cooking videos or a crew of people to help you. It's possible to produce quality cooking videos all by yourself as long as you understand what really matters when it comes to making them. Believe me. I've been producing 1 video a week for over 2 years now and have over 16,000 subscribers. My audience thinks I have a film background, but I don't!
Let me let you in on a little secret: it's not all about your equipment! You can have have the best equipment, but if you don't understand the fundamentals to making great cooking videos, you still won't produce great work.
Although lots of people will watch cooking videos with less than stellar quality, they actually do appreciate it when you take the time to learn what it takes (and implement it of course) to improve your production quality. Well, unless your personality is so amazing that they just want to hear you tell stories and jokes!
Production quality doesn't just mean that your video is pretty. It also means that your video is a superb teaching tool. There are many small details that matter when someone is preparing a dish. Make sure they can see them!
What's Included
The course is divided into 5 main sections and is composed primarily of video. Each video explains key concepts and shows you what they look like. There are also a few cheat sheets, templates and several lists of resources for reference.
Ingredients for an amazing cooking video
Tools of the Trade
Making Time
Pre-Production
Recording Audio Separately
Who is This Course for?
This course is for anyone who currently makes cooking videos on YouTube and for anyone who has been thinking about it for some time.
If you currently have a YouTube channel and want to take your cooking videos to the next level, this course is for you. You'll learn key concepts that will help you see your production process differently and what you need to focus on to improve your videos.
If you are thinking about making cooking videos and haven't yet gotten started, this is the perfect course for you. You'll get an idea of what's involved and find out what not only what equipment you'll need, but also key concepts that will make your first video look like it's not.
What's Not Included
This course does not teach you how to edit your cooking videos. That information is in a separate course, "How to Edit Professional Looking Cooking Videos in an Hour or Less."
I do briefly discuss how my pre-production process makes editing a breeze!
target_audience: Anyone who is currently making cooking videos on YouTube
Anyone who has been thinking about making cooking videos for some time

courses.description:
＼プレゼン資料はAIで超時短！／
プロが教えるAI×プレゼン資料作成講座
このコースでは、Gensparkをメインに活用して、誰でも短時間で質の高いプレゼン資料を作成するスキルを身につけます。AIをきっかけにフリーランスになり、100万円以上をAIに使ってきた現役プランナーが、実務で役立つプロフェッショナルな資料作成術を余すことなく解説。AIツールの力を借りることで、時間を節約しながらも見栄えの良い資料が作れるようになります。

［コースの内容］
Gensparkの機能・活用法を基礎から応用まで
ChatGPT、Gemini、Claudeなどの大手AIをGenspark上で使い分けることができるので、Gensparkでアウトライン・構成・リサーチ・デザインまで、段階的に学べるので初心者でも安心です。


時短とクオリティを両立するテクニック
AIを活用することで、短時間でプロフェッショナルなクオリティの資料を作成するためのテクニックを学びます。


プロンプト設計による出力精度の向上
AIがより精度の高い内容を出力するためのプロンプト設定と改善方法を学び、効率よくターゲットに響く資料を作成できるようになります。

GensparkとGammaの徹底比較であなたに最適のAIツールがわかる
資料生成AIの王道であるGensparkとGammaを「セキュリティは大丈夫か？、資料の色は指定できる？、PowerPointで出力できる？」という実務における根本的な疑問から、業務別のユースケース、強みと弱みまで比較することで、あなたのニーズと社内環境にあったAIツールを判断いただけます。

［学習内容］
このコースを修了すると、以下のスキルを身につけることができます
・ChatGPTでのプロンプト設定により、アイデア発想から資料のアウトライン作成ができるようになる
・Gammaで資料のフレームを自動生成し、短時間で構成を整えるスキルが身につく
・Canvaを使ったデザイン調整によって、視覚的にも魅力的な資料を仕上げる方法がわかる
・AIの力を活用して、資料作成の作業時間を大幅に削減できる
・企画書やプレゼン資料の「目的」「ターゲット」「課題」「解決策」など、構成の基本が理解できるようになる


［こんな方におすすめ］
●プレゼン資料や企画書の作成に時間をかけたくないビジネスパーソン
●AIを活用して業務効率化を目指している方
●資料作成のデザインに自信がない、またはデザインを効率的に仕上げたい方
●アイデアや構成の考案に悩んでいる初心者の方
●効率重視で視覚的なクオリティも妥協したくない方

［受講に必要な要件］
・基本的なPC操作スキル（テキストのコピー＆ペーストなど）
・インターネット環境
デザイン経験や資料作成のスキルがなくても問題ありません。AIツール初心者でも取り組みやすいよう、基礎から丁寧に学べる内容となっています。
target_audience: プレゼン資料や企画書の作成に時間をかけたくないビジネスパーソン
「忙しい中で何度も資料作成が必要。でも限られた時間内で、質の高いプレゼン資料を作りたい」とお考えの方
AIツールを活用して業務効率化を図りたい方
GensparkやGamma ai、ChatGPTなどの最新ツールに興味があるが、使い方がわからない、導入に不安がある方
効率を重視しつつも、視覚的なクオリティを妥協したくない方 「スピードを優先したいけれど、見た目のクオリティも大切にしたい」と考えている方。

courses.description:
„No Face YouTube Videos erstellen – Smarte Methoden mit und ohne KI“
Möchtest Du einen erfolgreichen YouTube-Kanal starten, ohne Dein Gesicht zu zeigen? In diesem Kurs zeige ich Dir, wie Du No Face Videos erstellst, die Deine Zuschauer fesseln – sowohl mit traditionellen Methoden als auch unter Einsatz modernster KI-Technologien. Egal, ob Du kamerascheu bist oder einfach den Fokus auf Deine Inhalte legen möchtest, hier erhältst Du eine Schritt-für-Schritt-Anleitung für professionelle Videos, ohne selbst vor die Kamera treten zu müssen.
Was Dich in diesem Kurs erwartet:
Grundlagen der No Face Videoproduktion:
Verstehe die Prinzipien und Vorteile von Videos ohne Gesicht.
Lerne aus erfolgreichen Beispielen auf YouTube.
Erstellung von No Face Videos ohne KI:
Nutzung von Bildschirmaufnahmen, Animationssoftware und Stock-Material.
Tipps zur Audioaufnahme und -bearbeitung für einen professionellen Klang.
Einsatz von Künstlicher Intelligenz:
Einführung in KI-Tools für die Videoproduktion.
Automatisierte Videobearbeitung und -generierung.
Nutzung von KI für Voiceovers und Texterstellung.
Content-Strategie und Planung:
Ideenfindung für ansprechende Video-Themen.
Zielgruppenanalyse und Kanalpositionierung.
SEO-Optimierung für maximale Reichweite auf YouTube.
Postproduktion und Veröffentlichung:
Effiziente Videobearbeitung mit und ohne KI-Unterstützung.
Gestaltungsrichtlinien für Thumbnails und Titel.
Erfolgreiche Veröffentlichung und Promotion Deiner Videos.
Für wen ist dieser Kurs geeignet?
Anfänger, die ohne viel technisches Vorwissen starten möchten.
Content Creator, die neue Methoden der Videoproduktion erkunden wollen.
Unternehmer und Marketer, die Produkte oder Dienstleistungen präsentieren möchten, ohne persönlich im Vordergrund zu stehen.
Warum dieser Kurs?
Praktischer Ansatz: Schritt-für-Schritt-Anleitungen mit nachvollziehbaren Beispielen.

Am Ende dieses Kurses wirst Du in der Lage sein, hochwertige No Face YouTube Videos zu erstellen, die Deine Zuschauer begeistern und Deinen Kanal wachsen lassen. Starte jetzt und werde zum Profi in der No Face Videoproduktion – ganz ohne Dich selbst vor die Kamera zu stellen!
Melde Dich noch heute an und beginne Deine Reise zum erfolgreichen YouTube Creator 2025

O CAMINHO PARA SE CONSOLIDAR COMO ATOR: O lado ruim de ser ator
O lado bom de ser ator
DRT - Registro para trabalhar como ator
A lei número zero para ser ator
A importância de um Agente para sua carreira.

requirements: Querer desenvolver suas habilidades de atuação
courses.description:
O mercado atuação é uma realidade que parece muito distante, mas que está presente no nosso dia a dia. Todos os dias assistimos a peças, novelas, filmes, videos na internet, que tem atores como sua matéria prima. Os streams tem crescido cada vez mais. Esse setor só funciona através do  profissional da atuação que dá vida a muitos personagens, passam informação e nos emocionam. O Ator transforma o texto e a ideia inicial em realidade. Materializa o texto criando algo novo e sagrado.
Tocam nosso coração nos fazendo ver a vida e a arte com outros olhos. Os atores são peça primordial para histórias bem contadas, clipes emocionantes, filmes, novelas, séries e vídeos  capazes de gerar comoção.
Para ser um ator é preciso estudar muito, ser articulado e saber aproveitar as oportunidades e mais de do que isso: Saber criar oportunidades quando elas não existem.
Este curso traz o conhecimento necessário para você caminhar nessa direção de ser um ator.
É bom saber que essa profissão é regulamentada desde 1978, e os atores profissionais devem se formar em curso técnico ou em um curso de artes cênicas superior. Estudar é uma importante etapa da formação do ator que depois de formado vai precisar tirar o famoso DRT. Todos atores profissionais possuem esse registro. Mas estudar em uma faculdade, ou fazer qualquer curso de ator não garante que você vai se tornar um profissional famoso e reconhecido. É preciso dar mais passos e agir de forma estratégica para não deixar seu sonho ir por água abaixo.


Tanto que, se você não estudou em uma faculdade mesmo assim consegue tirar o DRT.  Isso é possível porque se você já fez muitos trabalhos, pode provar que é um ator e tirar o registro.  Falaremos disso durante o curso..
Se você imaginou que daria para ser ator apenas com talento. Você está errado. O talento é muito importante, mas é preciso dar os passos certos nessa profissão regida pela competitividade em que é muito difícil conseguir as melhores vagas de trabalho.
Mas nada supera o bom trabalho.
Esse curso não vai fazer de você um ator profissional. Mas vai encurtar o caminho, se você estiver disposto a aprender tudo que está sendo ensinado aqui, ter perseverança, ousadia e alegria.


Vamos juntos?
target_audience: Estudantes, pessoas que querem viver de atuação

courses.description: 初めての発信は、不安や戸惑いがつきものです。このコースでは、私自身が1,000回以上の配信を重ねてきた中で体験した「最初の失敗」や「小さな成功」をもとに、初心者がつまずきやすいポイントをわかりやすく解説しています。特別な才能や経験がなくても大丈夫。実際に試して身についた工夫やコツを具体的にお伝えするので、今日から安心して一歩を踏み出せます。発信を通じて「できた！」を積み重ね、自信と成長を実感していただけるはずです。

courses.title: The Complete Podcasting Course with Brendan Davis
courses.bio: Features a detailed CASE STUDY of an actual show being recorded, edited, & published in (almost) real time!
objectives: Create a smart, well thought-out, and technically solid podcast from scratch.
Those with little technical or creative experience can use the course as a one-stop resource to learn or review all of the essential concepts and terminology needed to excel.
Savvy podcasters will learn new tricks and gain insights to make their work better, regardless of current experience.

Why Create A Podcast?: Overview: meet the Instructor, and let's have some FUN doing this
The Big Picture: An Overview of Everythi: Recording: quality and content are both important
Editing: use the best, lose the rest
Distribution: choosing and using a syndication platform
Marketing and Monetizing: get the word out, get paid
Creative Prep: Finding Guests, Research,: Guest search: start with your network, then expand outward
Research Part 1: learn enough about potential guests to identify the best ones
Making contact: how to reach out
Scheduling: the art and science of timing
Research, Part 2: do a deep dive and learn what makes the guest unique
Outlining: organize your questions into a STORY
Technical Prep: Your Recording Setup, Ho: Recording options: standalone recording, laptop, desktop, smartphone
Editing software: Mac vs. PC - Garageband, QuickTime, Audacity, others
Microphones: learn the basics + good options at every price
Case Study: The Interview: Precall: the importance of a good "pregame" chat with your guest
The Interview: a real-time talk with an actual guest. PLUS: doing pickups, wrap
Case Study: The Edit: Edit Prep: the universal editing concepts
Cutting the Case Study: our goals, the process, and the real-time edit
Mastering: a little EQ and compression to make it sound great
Outputting: creating your master audio file. PLUS: Proofing, revising
Case Study: Posting The Show: Assembling the elements: gather links, write Show Notes, create social posts
Upload: getting the show on LibSyn (example); also discuss other options
Final proof: download and listen like a consumer. What's their experience?
Triage: what to do if you've screwed up badly and need to pull the show
Marketing & Monetizing: Branding: determine the identity you want to establish
Logo: creating a visual signifier that matches the tone & content of your show
Social accounts: build and populate Facebook, Instagram, Twitter, and others
Getting Fans: start with friends, expand to their friends, then tell the world
Network: like and listen to similar shows, participate in their groups, be cool
Promote: Facebook ads, Google +, Google Ads, and the important of Google Search
Word of Mouth: your best advertising & how to effectively encourage it
Wrapping Up: Your \"Getting Started\" Gu: Answer The 6 Magic Questions about your show: Who, What, When, Where, How, Why
Your "Getting Started" Checklist: fill in the blanks, check boxes, make the show
In Conclusion: last thoughts and staying in touch

requirements: Basic computer literacy and some knowledge of podcasting is required.
courses.description:
Your instructor Brendan Davis shows you all the podcasting ropes in a conversational but highly focused style. Watch and listen as we create an episode of a show together, in close to real time, and learn how it's done - from the initial concept to distribution. Real-world examples use familiar, popular shows to make the course relatable, and Davis uses his radio and teaching chops to make it fun to watch and listen to along the way.
* July 2020 UPDATE: all those who purchase the course can request a private 20-minute Zoom call with the Instructor to answer specific questions! *
The course is designed to help the beginner get started, to fill in knowledge gaps for the developing podcaster who wants to get better, and to give new ideas and insights to help even an experienced host with their show(s).
The material is organized into 10 sections, outlined below and detailed in the videos, in order to lead you through the entire process with success. By the end of the course, you'll be able to produce and publish your very own podcast, too, or to significantly improve the show or shows you are already doing.
Some topics - such as the more subjective, philosophical ones, the “whys” - are covered in a very concise way, while many of the objective, technical parts - the “hows” - are given a much deeper look. In the Case Study sections in particular, we get VERY detailed. The raw interview and the subsequent edit are both presented in REAL TIME so that you can hear and see EXACTLY how every creative and technical decision was made, and learn how to apply this type of thinking to YOUR show.
target_audience: Beginning podcasters who are ready to get started, intermediate podcasters who want to get better, and experienced podcasters who want a new perspective to improve their existing show(s).
My mission is to provide comprehensive, memorable lessons in minimal time.

I've taught filmmaking in Masters programs for years and I know the value of keeping students engaged, so I also wanted to make the course as entertaining and honest as possible, so I do my best to keep things from getting too tedious.

So if you want to learn from someone who really knows what he's doing, who is sincerely interested in helping you make the best show you can make, AND who doesn't take himself overly seriously in the process, this is the course for you. I'm not playing a role here; for better or worse, this is really me. I hope you enjoy it!

レビュー記事にアクセスを集める方法が知りたいです

requirements: 特になし
courses.description:
■ブログのレビュー記事には「型」がある


ブログでこんな悩み、ありませんか？


レビュー記事を書いたのに全然売れない
収益記事を書きたいけど時間がない
記事構成でいつも悩んでしまう


このような悩みは、レビュー記事の「型（テンプレート）」を覚えれば解決します。


テンプレートを知れば、パズルのピースのように文章や写真・動画を当てはめていくだけ。
あっという間に、アフィリエイト成果の出やすいレビュー記事は完成です。


■なぜ「レビュー記事」なのか？


それは、Googleが個人ブロガーのレビュー記事を求めているから。


Googleは「質の高いレビューを書く」というトピックを立て、「ブロガー」と言及されるのは珍しいこと。
レビューに対し、Googleがいかに「個人の意見」を求めているか分かるでしょう。


レビュー記事は収益化を目指すブログの中で、最も収益に近い記事タイプです。


レビューを求めるユーザーは、商品購入を直前で迷っている状況。


彼ら彼女らの背中をポンッと押すことができれば、僕らは堂々とアフィリエイト報酬を受け取れるって…最高だと思いませんか？


｢良いレビュー記事を書けるかどうかで、ブログの成功は決まる｣と言っても過言ではないでしょう。


■「型」を知ればChatGPTなど生成AIを使って効率化できる


勘の鋭い方なら、お気づきでしょう。
レビュー記事の「型」があるなら、それをChatGPTに読み込ませ、本文のたたき台を作ってもらうこともできます。


あなたは商品やサービスの使用感を記録し、ChatGPTに伝えればOK。
文章より大事な写真・動画の撮影に専念すれば、競合と差別化できる魅力的で個性的なレビュー記事を作れるようになるでしょう。


本講座では、レビュー記事作成に特化したChatGPTなど生成AIの活用方法や、写真・動画の撮影方法、加工方法まで徹底的に解説いたします。
ぜひ本講座を見ながら実際に手を動かし、質の高いレビュー記事を作って、ブログ収益化への確実な一歩を踏み出してください。


■講師紹介


本コースの講師「さくちょ」です。


僕は2021年6月から「本業ありきの副業」としてブログをはじめ、いまでも現役サラリーマン＆副業ブロガーとして活動しております。


副業ブログは、開始後約1年で月10万円のハードルを突破。


それ以降、ほぼ放置でも月10万円以上の副収入を生み出し続けてくれる「ストック資産」になりました。


いまは現役サラリーマン＆副業ブロガーとしての立場と独自目線で、副業ブログの魅力を伝える情報発信活動をしています。


■こんな方が受講に向いています


レビュー記事の書き方で悩んでいる
レビュー記事を書いて収益を上げたい
レビュー記事の作り方で実践的な情報を知りたい
レビュー記事の｢型｣を知り記事執筆を時短したい
レビュー記事の正しい改善方法を知りたい


■このコースは全部で11セクションです


セクション01：はじめに
セクション02：SEOとレビュー記事の基礎知識
セクション03：レビュー記事を書き始める前の準備
セクション04：レビュー記事のテンプレート解説
セクション05：レビュー記事に載せる写真/動画の撮り方
セクション06：レビュー記事を作る過程の実演解説
セクション07：実際に収益化しているレビュー記事の紹介
セクション08：ヒートマップを使ってリライトする方法
セクション09：レビュー記事作成に関するよくある質問
セクション10：このコースのまとめ
セクション11：ボーナスレクチャー


以上、全部で9時間43分のコースです。


まずはじめに、レビュー記事を作るのに前提となる「SEOやレビューに関する基礎知識」を解説します。


次にレビュー記事を作るために準備すべきことや、本講座の核となるレビュー記事のテンプレート、レビュー記事で必須となる写真や動画の撮影・加工方法について詳しく解説。
ここでは講師の僕が、新たなレビュー記事を作っていく過程を実演しながら見せていきます。


コースの終盤では、収益を生み出しているレビュー記事はどのように作られているのか、公開中のレビュー記事を見せながら解説し、型にはめて作ったレビュー記事をヒートマップツールを使ってリライトするコツまでサポートいたします。


本講座では、レビュー記事作成で使えるChatGPTプロンプト集やワークシートを用意しています。
講座を見て学んだ知識を、ぜひその場でアウトプットしてください。


■最後に


本コースに興味をもっていただいた方は、動画終了後に「コース登録」へ進んでください。


もっと検討したいという方はプレビューで講座の一部が見れますので、ぜひ講座を覗いてみてください。


それでは、コースのなかでお会いできることを楽しみにしています！
target_audience: レビュー記事の書き方に悩んでいる人
レビュー記事を上手に書けるようになり収益を上げたい人
レビュー記事のSEO効果や成約率UPを目指したい人
レビュー記事の書き方について実践的な情報を求めている人
レビュー記事の構成にいつも悩み時間をかけ過ぎてしまう人

Herzlichen Glückwunsch - Du hast es gesc: Herzlichen Glückwunsch - Du hast es geschafft!
Bonuslektion: Bonuslektion: Grundwissen zur Veröffentlichung und Vermarktung

requirements: Der Kurs eignet sich für Anfänger, die ihr erstes Buch schreiben möchten
courses.description:
Im Kurs "Exzellent schreiben: So wirst Du ein wirklich guter Autor" zeigt Dir Erfolgsautorin & Schreibcoach Ulrike Schelhove, wie Du als Anfänger ein absolut gelungenes, professionelles (erstes) Buch schreibst. Wenn Du Dir für Dein Buchprojekt einen erfahrenen Coach und Ansprechpartner an Deiner Seite wünschst, dann ist dieser Kurs genau richtig für Dich.
Dieses Seminar passt zu Dir, wenn Du z.B. einen Roman, einen Krimi, Fantasy oder ein Kinderbuch schreiben und auf den Punkt gebracht erfahren möchtest, wie Du Dein persönliches Projekt so anpacken kannst, dass es zum Erfolg wird. Statt grauer Theorie lernst Du bei Erfolgsautorin Ulrike Schelhove anhand zahlreicher Praxisbeispiele die Techniken der Bestsellerautoren kennen und sie verrät Dir zudem exklusive Tipps und Tricks.           Die Dozentin hat mehr als 25 erfolgreiche Bücher geschrieben und veröffentlicht, die sich bis heute mehr als 200.000 Mal verkauft haben. Ihre Bücher sind bei Amazon alle in den Topbewertungen zu finden, viele sind zu Bestsellern geworden. Dieses geballte Know-how möchte sie in diesem Kurs an Dich weitergeben. Dabei spielt es keine Rolle, ob Du hobbymäßig gerne schreibst oder das Ziel verfolgst, als Autor*in zu arbeiten und Geld zu verdienen.
Der Kurs "Exzellent schreiben: So wirst Du ein guter Autor" überzeugt mit einer Fülle an praktischen Beispielen aus der modernen Literatur. Zu jedem Thema gibt Dir Ulrike Schelhove konkrete Ideen für Dein persönliches Buchprojekt an die Hand. Dabei steht sie Dir als Ansprechpartnerin bei Fragen jederzeit zur Verfügung. Du erhältst Aufgaben zu den wichtigsten Lektionen, die Dich bei der Arbeit an Deinem Buch wirklich weiterbringen und zu jedem Abschnitt ein umfangreiches Handout zum nachlesen.
Ziel des Kurses ist es, dass Dein Buchprojekt am Ende tatsächlich zu 100% steht. Du hast Deine Handlung detailliert geplant, Deine Hauptfiguren erschaffen, geeignete Schauplätze ausgewählt sowie einen gelungenen Spannungsbogen aufgebaut. Du hast die Struktur Deiner Kapitel festgelegt und weißt, wie Du einen spannenden Titel, einen gelungenen Anfang und einen passenden Schluss findest. Darüber hinaus hast Du gelernt, in Deinem persönlichen Stil besonderen Glanz und Leben in Deine Sprache zu bringen. Die Dozentin zeigt Dir am Ende des Kurses, wie Du Dein Manuskript so überarbeiten kannst, dass es vom Rohdiamanten zum feingeschliffenen Brillianten wird. Du wird es lieben, nun loszuschreiben, denn Du hast Dein Buch umfassend geplant und ausgearbeitet.
Selbstverständlich erhältst Du auch ein Kurszertifikat.
In einer Bonuslektion erfährst Du von Erfolgsautorin Ulrike Schelhove, wie Du Dein Buch, wenn Du es möchtest, veröffentlichen kannst. Hierbei zeigt sie Dir nicht nur den klassischen Weg über einen Verlag, sondern auch die modernen Möglichkeiten des Selfpublishing auf.
Ulrike Schelhove freut sich sehr, Dich in diesem Kurs begrüßen zu können!
Kursüberblick
In sechs Lektionen lernst Du:
Finde Dein persönliches Thema
Aufbau Deiner Story
Jetzt wird geplottet! (Story, Charaktere, Spannungsbogen, Schauplätze, Konflikte...)
So kommt Struktur in Dein Buch
Schreibe mit Stil
Am Überarbeiten erkennt man den Profi
Herzlichen Glückwunsch - Du hast es geschafft!
Bonus: Grundwissen zur Veröffentlichung und Vermarktung
Außerdem hast Du Zutritt zur exklusiven Facebook-Gruppe "Exzellent schreiben: So wirst Du ein wirklich guter Autor", in der Du Dich mit anderen Teilnehmern austauschen und der Dozentin natürlich auch Deine Fragen stellen kannst
target_audience: Hier hast Du die Möglichkeit, das Handwerk des Schreibens von einer Bestsellerautorin mit mehr als 25 erfolgreichen Buchveröffentlichungen zu lernen
Dieser Kurs ist das Richtige für Dich, wenn Du Dein (erstes) Buch schreiben willst (Roman, Krimi, Fantasy, Kinderbuch)

noteに興味や関心がある方

courses.description:
この講座は、noteを楽しんで書きたい、そして多くの方に読んでもらいたい、
また、有料記事を書いて収益を拡大していきたいと願う方のために
私がこれまで4年半に渡って実践してきた
「いかに多くの人に読まれる＆売れる記事を書いていくか」を解説する講座です。


テクニック的なことから大切にしたいマインドセットまで
私が心がけてきたエッセンスをお伝えしてます。


講座の成果としては以下のことが体得できます。
多くの人に最後まで読まれるnoteやブログの書き方
有料記事が２倍、３倍売れるnoteの書き方
あなたの書いた記事を１０倍多くの人に届ける方法
noteを楽しみながら長期的に書き続ける習慣形成
ファン化を加速するnoteの書き方と広め方など


私がnoteを4年半続ける中でフォロワーが２万人を超え、
多くの記事がメディアに紹介されたり、検索上位に多数上がるのと同時に、
有料記事も毎日売れるようになるまでの「成果があったことだけ」をお伝えします。


この講座は次のような悩みを持つ方のために作りました。


・noteで始めたけれどなかなかスキもフォローも増えない。
・どのような記事が多くの人に読まれるかわからない。
・記事を書いたけどなかなか読まれず、改善の方法がわからない。
・有料記事を書いたけどなかなか売れない。
・どんな有料記事を書いたらいいかわからない。


この講座に、その悩みを解決するためのノウハウを全身全霊で注ぎ込みました。


誰しもがnoteで記事を書き始めると「読まれない壁」に当たります。
それを乗り越えるには「正しい努力の方向性」を知ることです。
それを知って日々実践すれば、あなたの記事を多くの人に読んでもらい、
多くの読者をファン化したり、有料記事を多くの方に販売することができます。


私はその方向性を捉えてからは多くの人に読まれるようになり、
ほとんどの記事はカテゴリ別１位となり、多くのメディアに紹介され、
気づけばフォロワー数は２万人を超えていました。


また、有料記事では毎日数回、noteの売上が上がった時に
メールに届く通知を受け取るようになりました。


初めて通知を受け取った時の喜びは何にも代えがたく、
自分の書いた記事の価値がちゃんと認められたのも嬉しかったです。
今でも、通知が来るたびに心が小躍りする感覚になりますね。


私が4年半の試行錯誤の末に捉えた「noteの書き方・収益化戦略」を実践して頂ければ
あなたが試行錯誤する時間を大幅に省くことができます。


noteを独学で切り開こうとするとそれだけ時間がかかり、挫折するのも多いのです。


note攻略のカギやnote収益化の基本は
「いかに多くの人に読まれる記事を書けるか」に尽きます。


UDEMYやココナラなどでもnoteの講座はありますが、多くはいかに「売るか」という視点が多いのですが、いっときではなくて、長期的に継続してnoteで売上を上げていくためには、「いかに多くの人に読まれる記事を多く書き続けられるか」というライティングのスキルがどうしても必要になります。


今回の講座では多くの人に読まれるためにも、有料記事が多く売れるためにも必要な「書き方」に重点を置いて徹底的に解説します。4年半の試行錯誤の末に見出した内容を余すことなくすべてお伝えしています。


ただ一つ
この講座を受講して頂くに当たって気に留めてほしいことがあります。


それは内容を実践しなければ決して成果は出ないということです。


noteは誰でも簡単に始めることができますが、
記事を書けば簡単に多くの人に読まれて売れるほど甘くはありません。


１つの記事に込める熱量と、
継続して取り組む習慣と、
常に改善していく試行錯誤が必要です。


内容を読んで理解するだけでなく、是非一つ一つ実践して頂き、
新たに記事を作成したり、今ある記事を改善して頂き、
その上で確かな成果を実感して頂ければと思います。


是非内容を実践し、多くの人に読まれ、売れる記事を書いていきましょう！


あなたの時間は命の時間。


1日でも早く「試行錯誤モラトリアム」から抜け出し、
どんどん記事を楽しんで書いていきましょう！


この講座を受講頂くことにより、益々noteを書くワクワク感が増していくと思いますので、
是非、共にnoteを楽しんで参りましょう！


天豆 　てんまめ


※姉妹編の「AI活用講座」「Kindle講座」「Threads講座」も発売開始しました！
【noteライティングAI活用マスター講座】～AI活用文章術で収益拡大！副業にも最適！
note × AIで“あなたの言葉”が10日で1冊の本になる｜Kindle出版講座
Threadsでnoteが売れるようになる実践講座～Threadsから売上が生まれる導線のつくり方

A music composer needs to master the musical notes and instruments before he compose for a film; without basic knowledge of colors a painter can't paint; likewise a screenwriter or playwright should require certain tools to express his/her vision clearly. It is a difficult skill to acquire. To build scenes, sequences, acts, and the whole story is not an easy job.

So the answer to this quest is learning principles, tools that are required for screenwriting or any kind of storytelling, because screenwriting is film making on paper. The screenwriters' job is to visualize the story on paper before making into a movie or any kind of visual grandeur.
The main objective of the course is to provide you with the industry secrets to enhance your screenwriting skills to excellence.

courses.title: 6 Steps To Proofreading Jumpstart
courses.bio: Use your eagle-eye for typos to create your dream job reading enjoyable novels from your favorite authors!
objectives: Step 1: Set Up Your Business - We'll go over exactly what proofreading is and isn't, why the indie-author publishing industry is the key to your success, how to set up your business, and what you'll need in order to be ready to take on clients by the end of the course.
Step 2: How to Proofread WITHOUT Being an Editor - You'll learn the skills and tools required to proofread fiction (and what authors will expect).

Step 3: Learn My Proven Process - I'll teach you step by step my very own proven process to accurately proofread between 10,000 - 15,000 words per hour (approximately 40 - 60 book pages per hour) and give you the tools to practice and perfect the technique. This step is important because your earning potential is dependent on how fast and accurate you can proofread.

Step 4: How to Price Your Proofreading Service - We'll go over how to price your proofreading service (it's NOT per hour), how much you should charge, and how much money you can realistically expect to make proofreading fiction (it's more than you think!). You'll also learn about invoicing and delivering the finished proofread manuscript back to the author, and finally how to get paid!

Step 5: How to Find Proofreading Clients - I'll show you how and where to find authors who will pay you premium prices for YOUR proofreading skills WITHOUT needing a website or competing on popular freelance work bidding sites like Upwork (Fiverr) for proofreading jobs and clients.

Step 6: "Hanging Your Shingle" & Open For Business! - We'll go over how to present your proofreading service so authors will know how to reach you for proofreading jobs, what your service provides, your pricing, your turn-around time, and deposits and payments. a.k.a "Hanging Your Shingle." You'll finally be ready to open for business with the completion of this last step!
**Homework WILL be assigned for each step of the Jumpstart**
Your success in this Jumpstart is up to YOU!!!

requirements: A laptop or desktop computer
Microsoft Office
A love of books and reading!
An eagle-eye for typos in the books that you read for pleasure

courses.description:
How would you like to make GREAT money reading novels from home? Now you can! Do you notice every single typo in the books that you read? If you do, then you are exactly the type of person authors are looking to hire to proofread their books! You just need an eagle-eye for typos and a love of reading to start your very own freelance career proofreading novels.
What is proofreading exactly? It's the LAST SET OF EYES a manuscript gets before being published, so you're proofreading already edited (and almost perfect) books for authors. They just need YOU to catch the random typos that previous editors didn't catch. That's it!
The 6 Steps To Proofreading Jumpstart is the easiest way to learn how to earn money from home by reading books from your favorite authors!
YOUR SUCCESS IS UP TO YOU!!!
*Note* All course modules are available to you immediately after signing up for this Jumpstart. No need to unlock the modules weekly!

Stay at Home Moms
Retirees
English Majors
Writers

requirements: There are no prerequisites. This course is designed to anyone that likes to tell stories and would like to see their stories transformed into films, series, videogames, virtual realities, theatre plays... or any form of storytelling still to be invented.
courses.description:
Unlock the secrets of storytelling business and media production! This course bridges the gap between creativity and industry, teaching you how to develop, pitch, and sell your ideas in a professional context. Understand the business landscape of the media industry, learn the fundamentals of production, networking, and project development, and gain the skills to transform story ideas into viable media projects.


Learn to think like a producer and get your ideas made!


Great stories deserve to be told—but how do you turn your creative vision into a successful media project?


This course is designed for writers, filmmakers, and creative professionals who want to bridge the gap between storytelling and production. Inspired by Walter Benjamin’s seminal text The Author as Producer, this course provides the business, financial, and strategic knowledge necessary to develop, pitch, and produce your own projects.


Led by Rafael Leal, an experienced writer-producer behind international projects for Netflix, Disney+, and Medienboard Berlin-Brandenburg, this course goes beyond the creative process to teach you how the media industry works, how to secure funding, and how to make your ideas production-ready.


This course is your guide to thriving in the global storytelling market.


What You’ll Learn:
Think Like a Producer – Understand the role of producers and how they turn ideas into reality.
Pitch & Sell Your Project – Master the art of presenting your work to investors, studios, and decision-makers.
Navigate the Media Industry – Learn how the industry operates and how to position yourself within it.
Career Development – Build your network, organize your creative career, and explore opportunities worldwide.


This course combines real-world case studies, industry insights, and practical exercises to ensure you gain actionable skills that help you succeed in the media business. Whether you’re a writer looking to sell your first script or a creative professional seeking to produce your own projects, this course will give you the tools to make it happen.


Your story is your business—learn how to produce it!
target_audience: Screenwriters for film, series, games or XR

(This course covers both Windows and Mac versions of Scrivener from before Scrivener 3.)

Do you want to know how to use Scrivener to fulfill your writing dreams? Well Scrivener is not nearly as hard to learn as you have been lead to believe. I highly recommend binge watching the first four hours so that you have a good understanding of what Scrivener is capable of.

Once you know the basics you can go back, dig in to the Scrivener features that suit your writing style best and start creating your awesome content. If you forget how to use a Scrivener feature you can pop back and watch its clearly labeled lecture again.
Once your project is underway you can go on to investigate some really cool Scrivener features that you don't necessarily need — but are fun to use — like customizing your work spaces, importing from mind map software or backing up and storing your projects to Dropbox in the cloud.
Here's what an early reviewer had to say:
Melinda Kraft — "I learned several new things that are already helping me to make my project better organized and efficient and has given me some ideas on how I can be more creative in the process. I've watched a lot of online training videos, and Karen's is among the best. She clearly illustrates the differences between Windows and Mac versions. And where she elects to save information for later in the course, or leave it out altogether, she tells you why. Highly recommended!"

EDIT subtitles and captions with software and online tools

courses.description:
Captions and subtitles
[Remark: This course contains manually created/timed captions in English and German. Feel free to use this feature to follow along the course contents. Deaf and hearing impaired people as well as people whose second language is English (or German) can follow this course without any problems.]
You may know the closed caption icon from YouTube or Netflix. Captions are an important tool in video production to make videos and even entire movies or TV shows accessible to a larger - possibly even international - audience. Deaf and hearing impaired people can easily follow and understand your videos through subtitles. You help foreign language learners to learn a new language. Maybe you have even used subtitles in your favorite TV show yourself to improve your foreign language skills - especially if English is not your first language.
In this course I will teach you a lot about subtitles and captions. You will not only learn how to create and edit subtitles with free offline and online editors, but also some theoretical background on formats, guidelines to create great captions, transcriptions and even translations. This video course contains nine sections:
Introduction
In this section I present the course contents and give you a quick introduction to captions.
Theory
This section gives you some nice to have background knowledge on the difference between subtitles, closed captions and open captions as well as an overview on the most important subtitle formats. If you are already at an intermediate or expert level, you may skip this sections. Beginner, however, should definitely take a look at those videos.
Guidelines
This is one of the most important sections. Many courses and videos teach about how to create captions. However, a lot of them fail to explain how to design great captions that are easy to follow and that do not distract from the video content. Captions should support the viewer in his understanding of your video contents. While well designed captions add value to a video, bad captions may even disturb the viewer. I explain some of the most important guidelines to you and even show you a short example of good and bad captions. Please to not skip this section, even if you want to start creating captions right away!
Preparation
This section deals with transcriptions. Do you think you can create captions directly without a script? Maybe that will work. But maybe it won't. A transcription of the video can help you later on. Keep in mind that this is not an in-depth course about transcriptions. I just want to introduce you to the topic of transcriptions and show you some tricks, software and hardware to use.
The Offline Way
This section is the one you were all waiting for. In this section I teach you how to use offline tools like Subtitle Edit or Aegisub to create captions for your videos. To benefit the most, I advise you to also download these tools and try them out yourself. Create some captions for your own videos to train your captioning skills!
The Subtitle Track
After you have created your own captions in the last section, this section shows you how to use subtitles offline. I will explain how to embed subtitles into MP4 and MKV video files as a track and how to use captions with the VLC media player. This section is relevant for you, if you want to work with videos and captions offline. If you want to create subtitles for your online videos, take a look at the next section, instead.
The Online Way
This section presents different websites and online editors to create, edit and upload closed captions to your videos. I will explain why different formats are important and show you ways to use captions for your YouTube videos and Udemy courses. You need this section for any online videos, because websites cannot read the subtitle tracks you may have created in the sixth section.
Translation
Through captions you can appeal to an international audience and grow your community over time. This section presents processes and tools for an easy and cheap translation of your videos.
The End
In this last video I recap what you have learned in the course. Congratulations on coming this far!
target_audience: Video producers who want to appeal to an even greater audience
YouTubers and (Udemy) video course creators who want to create and use captions for their videos
(Explanatory/learning) video creators who want to translate their videos for their international audience

courses.description:
Watch the First Five Lectures for Free

More than 3,100 students have already enrolled.

FOR NON-FICTION AUTHORS

There are certain methods that really do make self-publishing a book easier and faster. Do you want to know what they are?

Learn highly effective methods and processes that allow you to get endless book ideas, write your book in an easier way than normal, and make it sell itself.
This is what a successful Kindle author has discovered.
My name is Ian Stables, author of more than fifty Kindle books, many of which became best-sellers.
When I published my first Kindle book on Amazon, I made very few sales. I had good content inside, but the sales just didn't happen. I had a lot to learn in order to get decent sales.
I had a hard time coming up with new ideas for future books. I would spend hours looking through books on Amazon trying to discover the subject for my next book. I didn't just want any idea, but one that sold.
Writing books was not easy. There was the long outline process. I would spends days and sometimes weeks planning it out. I was continually worried in case I had missed something important. The writing process was long and daunting. Hours of scratching my head wondering what to write next and how to word it.
After the hours of writing, came the editing process. This was really hard.
Despite all my efforts, my first books were short and lacked the quality they do today. Despite this, the content was welcomed and I received many reviews praising my ideas.
Through experience, learning, and innovation I discovered (some by accident) many very effective methods and systems. They have allowed me to have several best-selling books.
Today, I can easily come up with endless profitable ideas for non-fiction books.
The writing process is enjoyable and a lot easier. I follow a simple step-by-step process.
There is no long outline process. The structure takes mere minutes.
I never wonder what to say next using my Conversation method. (I discovered this by accident.)
The process includes what I call the golden nuggets. These are what turns a dry mediocre book into one of best-seller quality.
The editing is done in very easy short sessions. No long edit at the end. It consists of three steps. The second step is the breakthrough. It allows me to spot more errors than any other I have tried. The odd one still gets through. However, I know this method allows you to correct every single error. They stand out a mile.
After trial and error, I have discovered how to make books sell themselves. I know what works and the simple methods to do it. The rest is just getting your book published and visible to readers.
In this course, you learn...
- How to make it fun to write
- The one thing that makes your book unique

- Endless lists to pluck profitable book ideas

courses.title: How to be a Journalist - The Complete Guide to Journalism
courses.bio: All you need to know to become a freelance journalist or staffer and get paid for what you write.

courses.description:
So, you want to be a journalist? But you've never known where to start...
Perhaps you thought you needed to go to college or university and spend thousands on a degree first...
Fact is, whoever you are and whatever life and career stage you're at, this complete guide will equip you with all the skills needed to become a proper journalist.
And you'll learn how to earn a living writing great journalism too.
How to be a Journalist - The Complete Guide is written and presented by Tony Bosworth, an experienced international editor and journalist across newspapers, magazines and online. Tony's written for some of the world's best daily newspapers, including the Guardian, Times, Financial Times and Independent.
He's launched or relaunched 15 magazines and websites. He's had his own weekly radio spot on London's LBC, and he's appeared on TV too.
But Tony is also an educator who's trained hundreds of beginner journalists in practical journalism and media law at colleges and universities across the UK and Australia.
"So I know what editors are looking for," says Tony. "Either freelance writing or full-time."
"They are not looking for people with college and university degrees, believe me. Quite simply, editors want good, well written stories. They want people who can sit down and pull a good news story together. They want people who can craft a compelling feature. They want writers who can interview. And they want writers who know and understand media law too."
"You will learn all these crucial skills, and more through my course. And at the end of the course you will be able to confidently go out and pitch real stories to editors, and they will listen because they know you can write."
Tony Bosworth is an editor and journalist so he knows what editors are looking for and through this course he shares all his experiences, knowledge, and even tricks of the trade, so you learn all the skills you need to be successful. Whether you're young, old, experienced or inexperienced - this enjoyable practical course will help turn you into a real journalist.

Video lectures, assignments and quizzes keep you interested, motivated and learning quickly.
Through the Udemy Discussion boards, you'll also be able to ask me questions anytime.

Here's what the course covers:
• What is a journalist?

Sign up for my course and you will soon be on your way to becoming a real journalist.

インタビューは相手の話を聞くだけでなく、記事やレポートなど最終的に誰かに読ませるために行うものです。たとえ会話が盛り上がっても肝心なことが聞けていなかったり、良いお話をしてくれたのにもかかわらず聞き漏らしてしまったり、解釈がズレていたりすると、後から困ることもあるでしょう。また、取材中に思わぬトラブルに遭遇することもあります。
本講座は、紙媒体やWEB媒体で記事として公開するインタビューや、研究や調査等で行うインタビューを想定した内容となっています。動画のインタビューには触れていません。主に初めてインタビューをする方や初心者の方を対象としています。インタビューをする際に必要な基礎知識、準備から原稿を仕上げて取材対象者への確認を済ませるまでの工程、コストやスケジュールの想定の仕方など、インタビューに関わる一連の流れに沿ってレクチャーします。そのなかで、誰もわざわざ教えてくれないすごく細かいコツや注意事項までお伝えします。

初めてインタビューをする方や経験が浅い方を対象としています。
インタビューをして、最終的に他者に見せるレポート（書面）に落とし込むところまでを知りたい方に向けたの講座です。
動画のインタビューには触れていません。

Element Of Good Journalism: Journalism's first obligation is to the truth
Its first loyalty is to citizen
Its essence is a discipline of verification

The journalism professional has play a very important role for ages, their contribution to economic development of any nation is so much in this current dispensation, they play a very critical role on the executives to ensure that governance in any country is being follow as lay down by the constitution of that country. journalism can simply be define as the production and distribution of reports and information on the interaction of events, facts, ideas, and people that are the news of the day and that aid in informing the society or community some level or degree. We all agree in principle that journalism use specific methods in gathering information with variety of media such as television, print media, radio, internet etc. Journalist produce information in the nation that help the citizens to make informed choices especially when it come to choosing a leader of a nation its the information that is available that will be used to help the citizen choose from many candidates. Journalism also help in exposing the wrongs and ills of society so that we can all live in peace as a unify people with a common aim of developing our own country. Let not also forget that in this modern times many journalist ignore their journalism ethics and standards and conduct themselves any how by even taking bribe to twist the information or hide behind one political group that he support and give wrong information about others.
Every journalist must remember that no matter what, their first obligation is to the truth, and they should only be loyal to the citizens as well as ensuring that the information they put out there, is  well verified so that they will not destroy meaningful citizens reputation for their individual gains.The digital revolution has drastically change the shape and style of journalism a little, but l must say that technology is a great compliment to journalism. Good journalist have exceptional writing skills, and possess great questioning skills. We need to follow the right steps to write good article. Practice writing every day to build your writing skills, find our voice, and gain confidence.

courses.description:
Journalism for opinion news. Imagine yourself being interviewed on a major TV news network and you are coming across as strong, confident and full of fascinating insights. Wouldn't you love to be a regular pundit on major news programs offering your analysis on top news stories of the day?
In this Journalism -How to Be a TV Pundit course, you will learn the following:
* How to get the attention of news bookers
* How to speak in memorable sound bites
* How to look confident and comfortable on TV
* How to rehearse on video
*How to get into opinion journalism
This journalism course is delivered primarily through spoken lectures. Because the skill you are learning is speaking related, it only makes sense that you learn through speaking.
The skill you will learn in this class is not primarily theoretical or academic. It is a skill that requires physical habits. That is why you will be asked to take part in numerous exercises where you record yourself speaking on video, and then watching yourself. Learning presentation skills is like learning how to ride a bicycle. You simply have to do it numerous times and work past the wobbling and falling off parts until you get it right.
This journalism course contains numerous video lectures plus several bonus books for your training library.
TJ Walker has been coaching and training people on their presentation skills for 30 years. Now, through the power of Udemy's online platform, he is able to give you the same high quality training that he gives in person to CEOs, Fortune 500 executives, and Presidents of countries. Only you can now receive the training at a tiny fraction of the normal fee for in-person training.
How long this course takes is up to you. The longest part of the course involves you speaking on video, critiquing yourself, and doing it over until you like it. Seja bem-vindo ao Curso do OBS Studio! Meu nome é Ricardo, um especialista em gravação de vídeos. Este curso é perfeito para aqueles que estão ansiosos para mergulhar no mundo da criação de conteúdo ao vivo. Com explicações detalhadas e instruções passo a passo, você será apresentado aos principais recursos do OBS Studio, incluindo instalação, criação de cenas e fontes, utilização de plugins, configuração, transmissão de lives e gravação de vídeo.
O OBS Studio é um software gratuito e de código aberto para gravação de vídeo e transmissão em tempo real. É amplamente adotado por streamers, criadores de conteúdo, gamers e profissionais de mídia para realizar transmissões ao vivo e gravar vídeos. Com o OBS Studio, você pode capturar a tela do seu computador, adicionar várias fontes de áudio e vídeo, criar cenas personalizadas, aplicar filtros e efeitos, e transmitir seu conteúdo para plataformas como YouTube, Twitch, Facebook Live e muito mais.
Ao finalizar as primeiras sessões deste curso, você terá um entendimento abrangente do OBS Studio e estará equipado para elevar a qualidade e o impacto do seu conteúdo audiovisual. Ao atingir a metade do curso, você estará preparado para dominar as ferramentas necessárias para produzir conteúdo audiovisual de alta qualidade.
Ao concluir as últimas sessões do curso, você estará apto a transformar seu projeto no OBS de maneira profissional, utilizando diversos efeitos para tornar suas transmissões ao vivo e gravações mais atraentes. Além disso, você estará preparado para iniciar suas gravações e transmissões com maestria, criando um conteúdo de forma profissional e envolvente.
E não para por aí! Com cada atualização do OBS Studio, adicionaremos novas aulas na sessão Extra para que você esteja sempre atualizado sobre as novidades deste poderoso aplicativo de streaming.
Este curso oferece muito mais do que você pode imaginar. Com uma infinidade de recursos disponíveis no OBS Studio, estruturamos o conteúdo em várias aulas para facilitar sua jornada de aprendizado.
Com mais de 11 horas de conteúdo didático, este curso oferece explicações detalhadas e passo a passo, começando do absoluto zero. Nosso principal objetivo é proporcionar a melhor experiência de aprendizado para nossos alunos.
Este curso foi meticulosamente desenvolvido em um computador de última geração, equipado com tecnologia de áudio e vídeo de ponta. Isso resulta em aulas bem estruturadas e com uma estética de ensino elegante, facilitando a compreensão e a aprendizagem das ferramentas.
O fruto do seu trabalho e dedicação será reconhecido nos mais altos níveis do mercado de trabalho. Não perca mais tempo! Invista em seu conhecimento e destaque-se com seu profissionalismo.
Estamos ansiosos para recebê-lo na primeira aula. Vamos juntos nessa jornada de aprendizado!

At the heart of the course is a step-by-step guide to exactly how you should go about publishing your paperback book through Amazon’s KDP Print (formerly CreateSpace).

Specifically, you will:
Learn how to input the details of your paperback Book into KDP
Understand whether you should assign a FREE KDP ISBN to your book
Learn how to upload your book's interior manuscript
Evaluate the option of using the Cover Creator
Learn how to upload your book cover
Understand what to look for when previewing your paperback book
Familiarize yourself with your book's distribution rights
Understand pricing and royalties on KDP
Learn all about proof copies of your paperback book
So why not join me in this course today and discover just why Paperback Publishing should be the next step in your self-publishing career.
target_audience: Anyone, who is thinking about self-publishing a paperback book
Anyone, who is looking to further their career as a self-published author
Self-published authors looking to understand the changes since Createspace merged with Amazon KDP

Sevgili Yazarlar ve Yazar Adayları,

Belki bir kitap yazdınız belki de yazmak istiyorsunuz. Böyle bir niyetle yola çıktığınızda ilk yapmanız gereken şeyin,  kitabınızın kurgusal anlamda iyi bir teknikle yazıldığından emin olmak ve ardından bir yayınevi ile çalışma sürecine girmek olduğunu artık çok iyi biliyorsunuzdur.
Tüm şartlar yerine geldiğinde ve ilk kitabınız çıktığında da artık iyi bir yazar adayısınızdır.
Peki gerçek bir yazar olmak yalnızca bir kitap yazıp bastırmaktan mı geçer?
Tabii ki hayır.
Kitabınızı yazdıktan sonra bir “Yazar” olarak tanınmak ve kitabınızın pazarlamasını doğru tekniklerle yapıp okur kazanmak en büyük hedeflerinizden biri olmalıdır.

Yazar Kimliği Oluşturma ve Kitap Pazarlama Teknikleri kursu size bu yolda nasıl ilerleyebileceğinizi anlatan kapsamlı bir rehber niteliğindedir.


Eğitim boyunca öncelikle Yazar Kimliğinizi oluşturmak için hem gerçek hayatta hem de dijital dünyada neler yapabileceğinizi öğrenecek ardından hem yazar olarak tanınırlığınızı sağlamak  hem de sadık bir okur kitlesi edinirken kitap satışlarınızı arttırabilmek adına uygulayabileceğiniz pazarlama tekniklerinden bahsedeceğiz.


İster kitap yazmış olun ister yazma niyetinde olun  Yazar Kimliği Oluşturma ve Kitap Pazarlama Teknikleri Eğitimi size bu yolda tanınırlık açısından nasıl bir yol izlemeniz gerektiğini adım adım öğretecektir.


(Yaratıcı Yazarlık Eğitimi ve Yazar Kimliği Oluşturma ve Kitap Pazarlama Teknikleri kursları birbirlerini tamamlar nitelikte olduğundan yazarlık sürecinin geliştirilmesi için iki kursun da alınmasını tavsiye ederim.)

courses.title: Medienrecht, Urheberrecht und die DSGVO verstehen
courses.bio: Abmahnung vermeiden, Sicherheit im Netz gewinnen, ohne Stress Inhalte erstellen
objectives: Verständlich, auch für Nicht-Juristen
Urheberrecht - Meins oder nicht meins, das ist hier die Frage
Wettbewerbsrecht - Was darf ich und was nicht?
Datenschutz - DSGVO und Co
Vertragsrecht - Sichere Zusammenarbeit mit Freelancern, gültige Verträge mit Kunden
Persönlichkeitsrecht - Ey, das ist ja MEIN Bild!

Presse-, Persönlichkeits- und Medienrech: Zivilrechtliche Aspekte - Recht am eigenen Bild
Rechtsfall: Wenn man sich nicht benehmen kann
Rechtsfall: Wenn man sich nicht benehmen kann - Lösung
Grundzüge des Vertragsrechts: Störungen bei der Erfüllung von Kaufverträgen - Verkäufer ist schuld
Störungen bei der Erfüllung von Kaufverträgen - Kunde ist schuld

requirements: Der Kurs ist so gestaltet, dass du ohne Vorkenntnisse alles verstehen wirst
courses.description:
Die Mission dieses Kurses:
Dir einen Überblick über alle relevanten Bereiche des Medienrechts bieten, damit du ohne Angst im Netz unterwegs sein kannst.


Gerade Punkte wie die DSGVO machen es ja nun wirklich nicht leichter eine eigene Website mit Wordpress oder ähnlichen Programmen zu erstellen. Dabei sind Impressum und Datenschutzerklärung nur die Spitze des Eisberges.
Welche Bilder kann ich nehmen? Ist es sicher Footage-Materialien oder Stock-Fotos zu nutzen? Gerade wenn du Bildbearbeitung und Bildgestaltung aktiv betreibst oder betreiben lässt, solltest du wissen, welche Quellen du ohne Gefahren nutzen kannst.
Denn Programme wie Photoshop oder Adobe Premiere bedienen können ist eine Sache. Doch dafür sorgen, dass alles rechtssicher läuft ist eine ganz andere.


Egal ob du Facebook, Instagram, Xing oder linkedIn nutzt und dort aktiv Content bereitstellt: Gerade wenn du verschiedenste Medien und Bildquellen nutzt oder ob du Videos erstellst: Mit soliden Grundkenntnissen gehst du da viel entspannter an die Sache ran.


Befreie dich also aus der Hilflosigkeit und mache dich ein ganzes Stück unabhängiger, indem du einen Überblick über alle Gesetze, die im Internet relevant sind, gewinnst.


Anmerkung:
Ich bin kein Anwalt, daher ersetzt dieser Kurs keine Rechtsberatung. Ich stelle hier das Wissen, welches ich mir für meine Projekte von Experten und aus Gesetzbüchern geholt habe, so einfach wie möglich dar, kann aber keine Verbindlichkeit für Inhalte oder deren Änderung garantieren.








Musik im Trailer: (Natürlich rechtssichere Quellenangabe)

Music promoted by free-stock-music
Attribution 4.0 International (CC BY 4.0)
target_audience: Unternehmer, die eine Online-Präsenz unterhalten

courses.description:
Vous rêvez de monétiser votre présence sur TikTok mais vous ne savez pas par où commencer ? "Monétiser TikTok avec des vidéos automatisées par IA" est le cours idéal pour vous ! Destiné aux débutants, ce programme vous guide pas à pas pour créer des vidéos captivantes sur TikTok en utilisant des outils d’intelligence artificielle. Apprenez à générer des idées de contenu, créer des visuels professionnels et produire des vidéos sans être un expert en montage.
Au cours de cette formation, vous découvrirez comment exploiter les puissantes capacités de l’intelligence artificielle pour automatiser vos créations vidéo et maximiser vos gains. Vous apprendrez à choisir une niche TikTok rentable, à utiliser des outils d’IA comme ChatGPT, Leonardo, et InVideo pour créer des vidéos attrayantes, et à transformer votre contenu en véritable machine à générer des revenus.
Ce cours couvre toutes les étapes : de la conception de l’idée à la publication de vos vidéos, en passant par les techniques de monétisation. Vous comprendrez comment tirer parti de TikTok, de l’IA, et de la monétisation en ligne pour générer des revenus passifs.
Que vous soyez un créateur de contenu, un entrepreneur ou un passionné de TikTok, ce cours vous donne toutes les clés pour réussir. Commencez dès aujourd’hui à automatiser vos vidéos et à gagner de l’argent avec TikTok !

この講座では、今人気の副業である「Kindle出版」について、初心者でもKindle本が出版できるところまで分かりやすく解説していきます。


この講座だけで、Kindle作家デビューが果たせるだけでなく、これからKindle作家として活躍していくために必要なテクニックについても習得できます。


◯ 自分の本が出版できる
◯ ブログで挫折した人もマネタイズできる
◯ 作家としてブランディングできる


といった理由で、
２０２１年に入ってからかなり多くの人が参入しているビジネスがKindle出版です。


この流れに乗って、
あなたもKindle出版に興味を持ってくれたのだと思いますが、
参入するなら興味を持った「今」がチャンスです。


ぜひこの講座で、
Kindle作家としてのスタートを切ってください。




会員登録、外国税申請、出版手続きなど、
必要に応じて「pdfのレポート」を準備しておりますので、迷わず出版まで辿り着けるようにしております。


こちらも有効活用してくださいね。


Kindle出版のやり方については、
Udemyのコースや、Kindleの電子書籍などでたくさん公開されておりますが、基本的なやり方のみを解説しているものがほとんどです。


だからこそ本講座では、
◯ 本のわかりやすい構成を作り込む方法
◯ １冊目のテーマにすべき内容
◯ 執筆する文字数とバランス
◯ 読みやすい文章に編集する方法


などなど、
テクニカルな内容にもしっかり触れて
「Kindle作家」として必要な力が身につくようにまとめています。


インターネット上のいろいろな場所に散りばめられた情報をかき集めるよりも、本講座でまとめて学んだ方が時間効率も良くなります。


ぜひ一緒に学んでいきましょう！

Anyone can make a movie with modern technology, but most people get stuck in the process because it can be very complicated and overwhelming. There is a lot of work to creating a high-quality short movie and lack of knowledge about the process can make that work insurmountable. This course aims to overcome that challenge by providing mentorship and a clear 10-Step process to get you from beginning (desire) to end (finished movie).
Produce Your First Movie With Ease Using Fun Yet Methodical Step-by-Step Process
Before Pre-Production-Getting Mentally Ready and Finding Your Script
Pulling in All Elements During Your Pre-Production Process (Including things that lots of first-time producers overlook)
Being On-Set, Making the Movie, Post-Production Video Editing, and Marketing
Self-Empowerment in the Entertainment Industry Starts with Making Your Own Movies
This course puts YOU in control of what type of productions you give your time and energy. This course is geared toward anyone who has ever wanted to make a movie and is especially important to those that want to work in the entertainment industry and need a reel to do so (ESPECIALLY ACTORS).
Writers, Director, Cinematographers and Actors all need to show their abilities through a reel in order to get jobs, but often they need to get jobs before they can create a reel.
IT'S A CATCH 22!
This course will not only teach you to produce movies, it will give you the opportunity to pick the material that will be perfect for your reel, open you to the world of film festivals (fun, supportive and great for networking), give you a prestigious PRODUCER title, get IMDB credit and make you better at your current craft by understanding a producer's point of view, typically the person that does the hiring on productions.
How long have you been waiting for your movie career to happen? Now is time to make it happen!
All future updates to this course are free - you are "locked-in" at the current price - you will never pay more if you enroll today at the introductory low price.
And there's a 30 day absolutely no questions asked full money back guarantee - my personal promise of your happiness and satisfaction! You really cannot lose!

objectives: Comprendre les bases du sport entertainment, ses acteurs, son modèle économique et son évolution dans l'industrie du divertissement.
Analyser comment les marques et les athlètes utilisent la communication et le branding pour construire leur image et fidéliser le public.
Explorer l’impact des médias, des réseaux sociaux et de la culture populaire sur la transformation du sport en produit de divertissement.
Développer une pensée critique sur les enjeux sociaux, culturels et éthiques liés à l’essor du sport comme forme de spectacle globalisé.

Module 1- Une plongée dans l’univers du: Une plongée dans l'univers du sport entertainment
Module 3 - Stratégies pour transformer e: Le storytelling sportif : “l’art de créer l’émotion”
L’expérience fan : “vivre le sport au-delà du terrain”

Musique, mise en scène et scénographie

requirements: Aucun prérequis n’est nécessaire pour suivre ce cours. Ce programme est conçu pour les débutants comme pour les curieux du secteur du sport et du divertissement.
ntérêt pour le sport, les médias ou le marketing recommandé
L’objectif est d’ouvrir les portes du Sport Entertainment à tous, quel que soit votre parcours !
courses.description:
Ce cours propose une immersion dans l’univers du sport entertainment, à la croisée du sport, des médias et de l’industrie du divertissement. À travers l’étude de cas concrets, de stratégies de communication, de marketing expérientiel et de storytelling, les étudiants découvriront comment les acteurs du sport (ligues, clubs, athlètes, marques) transforment les compétitions en spectacles culturels globaux. L’objectif est de comprendre les leviers économiques, médiatiques et émotionnels qui façonnent cette industrie dynamique, ainsi que les nouvelles tendances comme les contenus digitaux, les partenariats créatifs, les formats immersifs et l’impact des plateformes de streaming.
Le cours aborde également l’évolution du rôle des fans dans l’expérience sportive, l’essor des contenus sur les réseaux sociaux, le développement de l’e-sport, la place croissante des influenceurs et des célébrités, et les enjeux d’image de marque liés aux événements sportifs. Une attention particulière est portée à la transformation des grands événements en produits culturels mondiaux, au croisement de la performance et du divertissement, mais aussi à la valorisation des identités locales.
À travers des ateliers pratiques, des projets collectifs, des études de cas, des analyses de campagnes internationales et des échanges critiques, les étudiants seront invités à développer une vision stratégique, innovante et créative du sport comme industrie de contenus, d’émotions et d’expériences.
target_audience: Ce cours s’adresse à :
Les étudiants en communication, marketing, sport ou management, souhaitant découvrir un secteur en plein essor
Les professionnels en reconversion ou en quête d’inspiration dans les industries créatives et sportives

* COURSE FULLY UPDATED JANUARY 2024 *
Want to produce audiobooks that catch attention and praise?
This online Audiobook Production and Narration course teaches you how to make audiobooks using proven techniques and approaches.
This course is designed to teach you audiobook production and narration by showing you how to plan, record, perform, and produce them.
It is taught by a professional documentary filmmaker who has also personally narrated and produced 26 audiobooks - principally long-form fiction - on Audible.
