Make money using the audiobooks you make using the techniques and methods you will master in this course.
What makes me qualified to teach you?
I'm Paul, a professional documentary film director with 25 long-form film credits. Some of these films I narrated personally. I have also solo-produced and narrated 26 audiobooks on Audible. Plus, I'm the creator of popular courses on Udemy - with over 60,000 students and hundreds of 5-star reviews.
Learn techniques that I have used along the way (and avoid mistakes I made) drawn from my experience making audiobooks and from decades of professional media experience.
Is this coaching or instruction from an 'audiobook industry professional'?
No. Such coaching and programs are often highly priced and may be better suited to those from a professional acting background or those with enough experience to know that audiobooks are a path for them.
There are free resources on the Internet. This course aims to serve as a helpful start and resource for those engaging in audiobook production and narration. It is based on my own experience and the best of what I learned elsewhere.
The course indicates ways of saving time and energy along the way.
My Promise to You
If you have any questions about the course content or anything related to this topic, you can always post a question in the course.
The software we use, Reaper, is available for a $60 one-time fee - the full version is a free demo for 60 days.
Dive Right In
Learn how to prepare and interpret books.

Start making audiobooks today!
With our 30-day 100% money-back guarantee, nothing is holding you back from jumping in and trying the course.
Click the enroll button, and I'll see you in lesson 1!
Cheers,
Paul

courses.title: Writing Tips and Tricks: How to Write a Winning Screenplay
courses.bio: A detailed, powerful and step-by-step guide: how to write commercially appealing screenplays. From an industry veteran.
objectives: Create solid, rounded, memorable characters.
Construct a story with a solid act structure and a strong emotional punch.
Write a script with strong commercial possibilities and appeal.
Use these skills across all forms of dramatic story-telling - the screenplay for TV or Film, the stage, or radio drama.

Set Up Your Story: Step 2. Find Your Hero And Villain

requirements: You'll need a word processor, some kind of spreadsheet software, and a screenplay writing software package. I give you recommendations, both free and commercial, in all three cases.
courses.description:
The average TV writer in the UK makes between £15,000 ($22,000 USD) to £35,000 ($52,000USD) per hour of TV they write. Writers in the USA make much more. They do this by creating professional scripts that tell strong stories and carry an emotional punch.
Enrolling on "Screenwriting For Beginners" will give you a well-tested system for doing precisely this. Becoming good at this system will massively increase your chances of success in one of perhaps THE most lucrative - and enjoyable - forms of creative writing.
I'm currently Acting Head of Drama Development at a well-established British independent TV production company. Since 1995 I've worked as a screenwriter and script-editor on some of the most popular British TV dramas. I've written or script-edited over 50 hours of broadcast TV, across genres such as crime, medical drama, science fiction and childrens' drama.
What do people say about my previous teaching methods?
"WONDERFUL. Concise, clear, and uber-informative, to coin a phrase."
- Joe Whyte, Walt Disney Feature Animation, Los Angeles, USA
"Phil has a comprehensive understanding of dramatic structure and genre, enthusiasm for developing and strengthening stories, extensive knowledge of the development process, an understanding of the inner workings of drama commissioning across all channels - and first hand experience as a writer of the tricks and traps of the trade."
- Kath Mattock, double Bafta winning producer of 'The Cops', 'Buried' and 'The Queen's Sister', London, UK
"As senior media executive in the states with over 20 years experience producing TV and running a major TV/Recording Studio I've recently dedicated myself to writing full time. With numerous awards and credits under my belt I see incredible value and insights in Phil's newsletters and book. You need not look further to find proven steps to help take your project to the next level. I'm incorporating Phil's work into my original feature projects, and already can see and feel an improvement. And this is just the start for me... I'm thrilled I found Phil... You will be too!"
- Andy Kadison, New York, USA
In this 90 minute (feature length!) course I distill all my experience into a simple-to-follow, step-by-step script writing process. This is a highly practical insider's guide to screenwriting as it is actually done in the real world.
The course uses video and downloadable extra written materials. It starts with the blank page, helps you brainstorm your story world and find your lead characters, then guides you gently through the whole story creation and writing process, leaving you happy and fulfilled and printing off your first draft.
The course used the exact techniques that I apply in my daily work writing and editing scripts for internationally sold TV shows. I developed the course from my successful "Screenwriting Goldmine" book.
All you need to do is follow the detailed instructions and you will write a screenplay that has commercial success hard-wired into it.
Among many other things, in this course you'll find:
The single most important principle of telling a story.
How to make sure that your story is the best possible story you could tell about your hero. (Every character has one supreme story and I explain how to find it.)
How you create your Villain – and how to make sure they are the best possible antagonist for your story.
How to find so much story material you'll have trouble deciding what to leave out.
The 4 Tent Poles of your story that you MUST find before you start writing.
The 14 beats you can use to grip your audience. (These are general beats, and work across any story, any genre.)
A specific plan for your Act 1 that means you never have to worry about how to start a story again. (Imagine how it would feel to know that all you have to do is follow the story shape here and you will have a universally appealing start to your story.
9 simple Rules of Thumb to help you write scenes and dialogue.
Plus ‘Action Step’ lists after every chapter to summarise exactly what you have to do next.
And so much more...
After taking this course you will know how to :
Create solid, rounded, memorable characters.
Construct a story with a solid act structure and a strong emotional punch.
Write a script with strong commercial possibilities and appeal.
Use these skills across all forms of dramatic story-telling - the screenplay for TV or Film, the stage, or radio drama.
Use these techniques to revive and improve a script that isn't working.
I’ve been there, and I’m going to show you the way. Think about it...
To your writing!
Phil Gladwin
P.S. At some point you need to stop dreaming, and start taking action. Life is short, and you’ve got scripts to get made. Just scroll up and click "Take This Course" now to start on your journey to becoming a bestselling screenwriter.
target_audience: This course is for any writer who wants to get into writing for the screen. It's a well tested, efficient system for writing a professional level screenplay that people will want to read. It's good for any writer from absolute beginner to intermediate level. In fact, anyone who hasn't sold a couple of screenplays and seen them produced will benefit from taking this course. Writers who have gone beyond that will probably know most of what's in the course - but they may be surprised!

courses.title: Publish your children's book in print: A Crash Course
courses.bio: Everything you need to know to create, proof, publish and list your children's book in print on Amazon for free.
requirements: A free user account at www.CreateSpace.com (this is an Amazon subsidiary)
Illustrations for your children's book
A manuscript for your children's book
courses.description:
In the next 60 minutes learn how to create, proof, publish and list your children's picture book and sell paperback copies of your book on Amazon. Order your first book proof this afternoon!
This course assumes that you are at the stage where you have a children's book written or are in the process of writing and illustrating one and an unsure of what to do when you finish it. How do you get it in print? How do you sell it?
This is a quick crash course on how to use a "Print-on-demand" service called Createspace which is completely free and is affiliated with Amazon.com. Print on demand (or "POD") book publishing means that when someone purchases your book on Amazon, one book is printed and shipped out. The printing company makes their money every time a book is sold which means there is no upfront cost to you to print 100 or 1000 books.
POD is a no-risk way to self publish your books. I am not personally affiliated with Createspace whatsoever, but have been using the service for years and would not choose anything else. I enjoy self-publishing and being in control of my books and would recommend it for any author who is starting out and trying to avoid risks or being taken advantage of by a publisher.
In order to get started, you should first create a free user account at www.Createspace.com and set up your royalty pay-out information. IE, link your account to your Paypal account or bank account so that you can get paid. You will need to set up this information prior to creating your book listing.
target_audience: Aspiring self-published children's authors
Artists looking to convert their artwork into a product.

心の奧でこんな声が聞こえていませんか？
「また今日も3時間かけたのに、結局エラー‥」

Wordを使った出版準備の基本：電子書籍やペーパーバッグのレイアウトや余白設定をサクッとマスター。

ノウハウ：出版サポートをおこなう講師が、つまずきやすいポイントをカバー！

実践的な手法：動画を見ながらなので、設定方法が分かりやすい。
すぐに取り組める：すぐに執筆に取りかかることのできる、設定済みフォーマットプレゼントがあります。
（A5、余白、見出しレイアウト設定済みのデータですぐに取り組めます。）

courses.title: Learn How to Format & Publish Your Book in Microsoft Word
courses.bio: Self-Publishers Guide to Formating "Print-Ready" Books for Createspace and Lulu (or anywhere else) with Microsoft Word
objectives: You will have greater creative control over the look of your documents or books.
You will be able to create print-ready books for yourself and others.
You will be able to prepare a document for publication.
You will learn how to use styles and heading tags to structure your document
You will be able create a Table of Contents.
You will be able to format headers and footers appropriately for a book.

Introduction to Typography: Font Families, Fonts, Glyphs, and Point Size
Line Length, Leading, Letter Spacing, and Kerning
Preparing Your Book File: How to Start with a Clean Document
Using Page Breaks to Organize Your Chapters
Identify Your Chapter Headings and Subsections
Formatting the Easy Way: Paragraph and Line Spacing and Dealing with Hyphenation
Creating a Table of Contents in Word

requirements: You will need to have written and edited your book prior to taking this course.
You will need to download and install PrimoPDF (the free version).
You will need access to Microsoft Word.
courses.description:
Self-publishing is the wave of the future for authors. With greater creative control there are greater levels of responsibility for the self-publishing author. While the traditional publishing route takes longer, many of the more difficult aspects of the process are taken care by the big publishing house. With the technology available today, publishing a book is easier, but the task of creating great looking books can become costly for independent authors with little to no design experience and limited funds.
This course is designed to help authors finish their projects. Many authors take a lot of care in writing and editing, but sometimes forget to invest as much in the overall look. This course will focus on how to create books that look great in a shorter amount of time.
If you have already written a book and are ready to move to the final stages of your books journey, this course will help you learn the basics of using the built in functions of Microsoft Word to maximum effect. Most people have Word on their laptops at home or desktops at work. The reality is that Word is the most accessible word processing software available. The step-by-step lessons in this course will walk you through the process of creating a “print-ready” document to provide to the many Print-On-Demand companies you can chose from.
Each lesson in the course includes information about the various aspects of the design process. You will walk with the teacher through each step, watching as they show you how to do each of the step. Even if you have never used some of the functions in Word before you will learn some important ideas about what it takes to create great looking books.
In the end we believe that the price of this course will save you hundreds of dollars in the long run and may even become a source of income for you!
target_audience: This course is for anyone wanting to have more control of documents and books created in Microsoft Word.
This course is for independent authors who want greater control of the look of their book.
This course if for those who are ready to prepare their book for publication.
This course is NOT for those who have not finished their book.

requirements: basic knowledge of video
courses.description:
Digital video has introduced all kinds of possibilities for do-it-yourself video and film.
Believe it or not, your videos can look almost as good as professionals without buying new cameras. The secret is in better lighting.
While broadcast television networks do use better quality cameras, the fact is the major difference between Uncle Joe's underexposed home videos and really excellent broadcast television pictures is principally lighting and exposure.
In this course, Video Lighting Basics, you get a crash course in the basics of video lighting, including a few tips to get around the most common problems you'll run into in your productions. You will learn how to use essential lighting equipment and techniques in order to accomplish desired aesthetic effects.
This course will teach you how to get the lighting perfect for any shot, in studio and out. We’ll teach you how to master the art of light rigs, so wherever you find yourself shooting someone, you can make them look great and produce a professional-looking video.
target_audience: Anyone interested in learning lighting for video and film

courses.title: Format in Microsoft Word and Convert to eBook in Calibre
courses.bio: Self-Publishing? Create your own Professional Looking EPUB and MOBI files to Upload to Major Retailers and Distributors.
objectives: Understand the fundamental differences between formatting for an eBook and formatting for hard copy.
What file size, aspect ratio and file type you will need for your book cover images.
Step by step instructions for formatting an ebook in Microsoft Word.
How to convert a Microsoft Word document into an eBook using the Calibre conversion tool.
How to download applications to preview your ebook and preview your .epub and .mobi files on them

Starting off With Correctly Sized Book C: Cover Image Size, Dimensions, Quality and File Type
Current Specifications for Catalogue and Embedded eBook Cover
Formatting Microsoft Word Document Speci: Adding Symbols or Glyphs Between Scenes
Heading Styles and Inserting Virtual Page Breaks
What to Add to Your Front and Back Matter
Formatting Your Front and Back Matter and Adding External Links
Generating a Clickable Table of Contents and Adding Bookmark Links
Converting Your Microsoft Word Document: Converting Your Microsoft Word Document to an EPUB or MOBI file in Calibre
Previewing Your eBook Before Publishing: Previewing Your eBook on Amazon Kindle Previewer and Adobe Digital Editions

requirements: You need to have Microsoft Word loaded on your computer and you need to sign up for a free account at Calibre-ebooks.com. I am demonstrating in Microsoft Word 2016 on a Mac, but you should be able to follow along in Windows or in previous versions of Microsoft Word.
courses.description:
In this course for self-published authors I am going to show you how to format your own eBook in Microsoft Word ready to upload it to each of the major online stores. I will be demonstrating in Microsoft Word 2016 on a Mac. Most people should be able to follow along in Windows or in previous versions of Microsoft Word but if you struggle with instructions that do not exactly match your particular version of software this is not the course for you.
No prior experience is assumed or required. I present simple, step-by-step instructions to help you produce a professional quality ebook that meets the requirements of major ebook retailers.
Even if you plan to hire out the formatting of your books, it is important for every author to at least know how to do it, incase you ever want to make a simple change or update to your book after publishing — like adding links to your new books or website.
And you don't want to wait days for someone else to schedule you in and charge you for each minor update.
First we're going to go over the specifications for the book cover images that you have to provide for display on the catalogue page on your retailer's website as well as for your internal ebook cover.
Then I'm going to take you step by step through the process of formatting specifically for ebooks — which is somewhat different from formatting for output as a physical document.
You'll learn both ways to generate a clickable table of contents and how to insert external links to your important places online like your other books and your website.
I'll also cover best practices for inserting images and compressing them so that your file size does not exceed the limit imposed by some of the retailers.
Once your Microsoft Word document is nicely formatted I'll show you how to convert it to an ebook file in Calibre.
Then I'll show you how to download Amazon Kindle Previewer and preview your .mobi file and Adobe Digital Editions to preview your .epub file before you upload them to any of the online stores.
If you're ready to format and convert your own manuscript from a Microsoft Word document into an eBook, go ahead and sign up and I will walk you through the entire process step by step so that you end up with a great eBook — but if you want to check out my teaching style before you decide, feel free to watch a couple of the free previews in the curriculum outline below.
target_audience: Anyone wishing to design and format their own eBooks including writers of both fiction and non-fiction. It would also be handy for marketers putting out reports and other promotional material.

courses.title: Scrivener | Back up to Dropbox and Jazz up Your Interface
courses.bio: How to Back up, Manage and Retrieve Your Work Using Dropbox and Customize Your Scrivener User Interface

Backing up and Synchronizing with Dropbo: Welcome and a Quick Overview of What's in the Course
Backing up your Scrivener projects to Dropbox
Customizing Your Visual Preferences in S: Adjusting The Colors of the User Interface in Scrivener Version 1 For Windows
Adjusting The Colors of the User Interface for Scrivener 2 version for Mac
Adjusting The Colors of the User Interface for Scrivener 3 version for Mac
Showing Label Colors in Your Binder and Your Outliner Rows
Customizing the Cork Board Interface in Scrivener Version 1 For Windows
Customizing the Cork Board Interface in Scrivener 2 version for Mac
Customizing the Cork Board Interface in Scrivener 3 version for Mac

requirements: Students need to have Scrivener software installed, but I am going to show you how to install and open DropBox
courses.description:
PLEASE NOTE That this is an excerpt from Scrivener | Everything You Need to Know from Idea to Launch. If you are enrolled in that course you have no need for this one.
Never lose your hard earned work again. Dropbox is a cloud storage system that allows you to access data over the internet instead of using your computer's hard drive. This means that you can back up your Scrivener projects inside your Dropbox account and access them from any of your other devices that have Scrivener installed even if your computer is lost or crashes.
In just 15 minutes I'm going to show you how to open a Dropbox account and get your Scrivener software to redirect your backup folders to it. Then I'm going to show you how to store your actual Scrivener projects on Dropbox so that you can switch between any of your computers that have scrivener installed whenever you want to work on your projects.
Then I am going to show you some of the useful ways you can adjust the colors of the Scrivener user interface for optimum readability as well as how to assign different label colors to your documents and have them show up in your binder, on your index cards and in your rows when you are in the list style outliner view
target_audience: This course is ment for anyone who is using Scrivener writing software who would like to know how to back-up their projects to Dropbox

objectives: Learn to effectively use Final Draft

Learn why Final Draft is the Industry Standard

Final Draft Course - Express Edition: Copying into Final Draft from Other Programs & Working with Two Versions
Find and Replace and Smart Type

requirements: There are no prerequisites for this course.
courses.description: Final Draft is the premier software for drafting scripts and screenplays in the entertainment industry. This course will demonstrate and teach the elements of the software. Students will become familiar with tips and tools that will ease the script creation process. Industry Expert Alejandro Seri is an award-winning, bilingual screenwriter and director.   While a nineteen year old UCLA college student and screenplay writer he approached studio executive David Garcia with the idea of starting an alternative film school.  With the help of ten additional students, they formed Cyberpix Film School in downtown Los Angeles. Alejandro later shot his first feature film starring the late Francesco Quinn (The Shield, 24, Platoon). The film was very well received winning awards at the NY Independent Film Festival, the Romanian-American Film Festival and the Lake Tahoe International Film Festival. After apprenticing as a trailer/poster copywriter at the renowned Intralink Film, Alejandro went on to work as a television promo and film trailer copywriter at New Films International.  He then served as a story analyst with Script P.I.M.P. (Pipeline Into Motion Pictures) development services before returning to writing and directing his own feature screenplays.  Alejandro wrote the award-winning screenplay, GRAIN and is represented by Mike De Trana of Anvil Entertainment.   Prospect Park, producers of WILFRED and CRAZY HEART, recently wrapped production on Alejandro's script, FiNAL GIRL. Alejandro joined Final Draft, Inc., maker of the world's number one professional scriptwriting software, in 2007 as the Marketing & Communications Director for both Final Draft, Inc. and Script magazine.  He has served as Final Draft, Inc.'s Director of Educational Relations & Marketing since 2011.  Alejandro teaches screenwriting and Final Draft tech classes online, in universities and at conferences and festivals.
target_audience: Screenwriters
Film Screenwriters
Television Screenwriters
Producers

courses.title: Data Visualization in Excel by Using ExTool
courses.bio: Now that you've conquered basic Excel functions, it's time to transform your data into beautiful visualizations!
requirements: Students will need the Excel software and will also need to download the ExTool Add-on Application from the ParaTool website. It would be helpful to know the basic Excel functions, but not necessary.
courses.description: This course will teach students how to master their Excel skills by learning both basic and extended data visualization and business intelligence related functions using the ExTool Application. In the first section of the course, students will learn how to create the following data visualizations: 3D Surface Plot, Force Arrow Chart, Plot Pins on a Google Map, Plot Data on a Google Map, and Biomedical Batch Analysis Chart, Loss Analysis Chart, Scatter Plot, Multiple Stock Analysis Chart, Risk Analysis Map. The second section of the course will demonstrate the following functions: Air Quality Heat Map, Candlestick Chart, Stacked Area Line Chart, Colored China Air Quality Chart, Multiple Funnel Chart, Basic Radar Chart, Bar Negative Chart, Sized Pie Chart, Migration Map, Sankey Diagram, Stepped Waterfall Chart, and Funnel Align Chart. Through the mastery of these functions, users will be able to transform their data into beautiful, animated graphics that are easy to work with and understand.
target_audience: Students that use Excel in their daily work or education should take this course, no matter his or her proficiency.

courses.title: 初めてでも・アナログでも作れる！ 新・自己紹介動画メソッド 【ドローマイライフのつくり方】 オンライン講座
courses.bio: 【無理をせず、自分らしく】を即実践 オリジナル作品が確実に手に入り たった５分の動画で お客さんから共感され信頼される
objectives: 自分が行きたい未来を明確にすることができる。
自分の強みを発掘することができる
過度な行動をとらず、心地よい生き方ができるようになる
自分と価値観を共有できるお客さんが、自然と集まるようになる
requirements: 特別なスキルは一切必要ありません。作る工程で必要な小道具や編集ソフトは必要になります。
courses.description:
あなたは今、こんなことで お悩みではないでしょうか
自分の強みが理解できていない、今のビジネスで生かせていない
情報発信が苦手で、自分や商品をどう表現していのかわからない
動画を使って、自分や商品をうまくPRしてみたいが方法が分からない
自己紹介動画を作りたいが、撮影費が高そう・・
人とは違うコンテンツを一つ持ちたい
過度なブランディングなどをせず、 自分らしく表現する方法を探している
沢山の情報を身にまとうことで成功するという常識
今の時代、スマホを開けばインターネットという世界が
溢れんばかりの情報を与えてくれます。
こんなに便利で素晴らしい時代に生まれてきた私たちは
本当にラッキーだと思います。
ですが、その反面情報に踊らされたり
惑わされることも少なくはありません。
成功するには
〇〇講座に参加するべき！
〇〇セミナーに
参加したら月７桁稼げました！
そんな言葉に翻弄され
情報や知識を何重にも身にまとう事が
成功につながると信じ
時間とお金を費やしている人も
少なくはありません。
ですが、その結果
自分の真の理想を手に入れることができた人は
どれだけいるのでしょうか。


なぜ人は、 外に意識を向けるのか
外に意識が向いてしまう原因。
それは
《自分軸》にフォーカスできていないから。
情報を沢山得ることでビジネスはうまくいく。
そんな想いから外に意識を向け、結果
セミナージプシーノウハウコレクターに
走ってしまう人も多いと思います。
本当に意識を向けなくてはいけないのは
全く別の場所にあるという事。
あなたは気づいていますか。




まずは自分自身に フォーカスしてあげてください
個人でビジネスしていく上で
最も忘れてはいけないことは
外に意識を向けるのではなく
まずは自分自身にフォーカスするという事。
今の時代を生きる私たちは、
環境がその時期その時期で変化していっても
うまく対応していこうとする性質があります。
だから
沢山の情報に触れ変化を求める事が
楽しいと思うことがあります。
それはもちろん素敵なこと。
でも
そこばかりに意識を向けてしまうと
置いてけぼりにされた自分に虚しさを感じ
このままでいいのかな。と
立ち止まってしまうのです。
だから私たちは外にフォーカスする前に
ちゃんと自分と向き合う時間が必要。
本当にしたいことは何？本当はどうしたい？と
自分に問いかけてみるんです。




自分に問いかける・・ 難しい・・・
とは言っても・・
自分にフォーカスするって
どういうこと？
そもそも何をしたらいいのか
分からない・・・
実際
自分で意識して見ることは
なかなか難しいかもしれません。
私自身も数年前までは自分をないがしろにして
情報に溺れながら、孤独感を味わっていた
経験があります。
ですがある時、
私は些細な出来事をきっかけに自分と向き合い
意識を180度変える事ができました。


私を変えてくれた １本の動画
暗中模索の状態をさまよっていた私を
救ってくれたのは
実はある１本の動画でした。
この動画を作ることで自分と向き合い、
私が本当にやりたかったことは何？と
自分と対話することができたのです。


それがドローマイライフという動画です。


Draw my lifeとは？
この動画はDraw my lifeという 自己紹介動画です。
Draw my lifeは YouTube独自のムーブメント。
2013年にアメリカからスタートし イラストとナレーションで
自分の半生を振り返る 動画コンテンツです。
より自分の事を深く知ってもらえる プロフィール動画として海外で大流行し
有名な歌手やアーティストも 作成しています。
日本でも少しづつ 広まってきている手法です。





Draw my life ～自分の人生を描く～
自分の生まれたときから
今に至るまでのストーリーを
動画で表現する。
実はこの自己紹介動画を作ることで
私の意識は変わりました。
なぜ？？？
と思いましたか。
実は
これはただの
自己紹介動画ではありません。
とっても深い工程を経て出来上がる
一つの作品なんです。


過去と現在を繋げることで 溢れてくる思い
Draw my lifeを私自身作ってみて
普通のプロフィール動画とは
明らかに違うことに気づきました。
幼少期から、学生時代
社会人、結婚、出産と
沢山の転機を迎えた自分自身と
向き合う時間が生まれます。
幼いころ時間を忘れるほど
夢中になったこと。
学生時代に没頭したあの時間。
その時々で感じたこと。気づいたこと。
そして
それぞれの時代で起きたターニングポイント。
今思えば、
実は必要だったと気づかされる出来事。
もう忘れてしまっていた大切な想い。
それらをゆっくり引き出すことで
過去と今が繋がり
今まで気づかなかった感情が
溢れ出てきます。


ふさいでいた蓋を開け 自分を解放してあげてください
この工程を経ることで、
過去と今。そして未来が繋がって
自分が本当にやりたかったこと。
大切にしたかったことが
見えてくるようになります。
そうすることで
不要なものは自然と手放し
大切なものだけを
抱きしめる事ができるのです。




私にはとてもじゃないけど 作れません。。。
「Draw my life、とっても作りたい。
でも私には技術的にハードルが高すぎます」
そう思われる方も多いと思います。
気持ちはとてもよくわかります。
私自身、
この工程を一人でこなすことは
少し時間がかかりました。
でも、
【私が変われたように皆さんにも
ぜひDraw my lifeを体感してほしい】
そんな想いから
私がお手伝いできることは
全てフォローさせて頂くことにしました。




私と一緒に創り上げませんか
この作品を創り上げるまでには
５つのステップがあります。
これらの作業をすべて
私からのフォローメールとオンライン講座で
学びながら行う事ができます。
一人ではなかなか重い腰が上がらないことも
やる環境が用意されれば
モチベーションが一気に上がり、
自然と行動できるようになります。




イラストを書くことに 自信がない・・・
もしかしたらイラストを描くことに
抵抗のある方も多いかもしれません。
大丈夫。
プロが書くイラストよりも
あなた自身が描く棒人間がいいのです。
そのストーリーの主人公である
あなたが描くことに意味があります。
見ている人も心動かされます。
実際私の動画を見てみてください。
前半の女の子の絵は完全に落ち武者です。
でも、
そんなイラストでも多くの方から
感動した！という
嬉しい言葉を頂けています。
～上手に描くことが重要ではない～
という事です。




あなたのストーリーは 人の心を動かし 共感が生まれます
ストーリーを作る目的は
誰かのためではなく、自分自身のため。
ですが私自身、
この動画をシェアしたときには
とても反響がありました。
「ささきさんの
自己紹介動画を見て、
会いたくなって来ました！」と
私の講座に来てくれた方もいます。
初対面の方から
「動画見ました。感動しました！」
と言ってくださる方も
沢山いらっしゃいます。
作成して３年がたちますが
いまだにそんな嬉しい
お声を頂きます。
あなたのストーリーをオープンにすることで
共感と感動が生まれ
見た人との距離感を一瞬で縮めて
ファンになって頂けることが
できるのです。
Draw my lifeは あなたの大切な想いを 引き出してくれます
自分のストーリーを描くことで
自分軸を創り上げる事ができる。
個人でお仕事する上で
目的をはき違えると
限界を感じる時が来ます。
あなたが本当に
やりたかったこと。
手に入れたかったものは
何なのか。
一度真剣に向き合ってみませんか。
私にそのお手伝いをさせてください。




まずは１本、 ご自身の作品を作りましょう
今回のオンライン講座で、 世界で一つの、
全く新しい自己紹介動画を 創り上げることができます。
自分の作品と向き合い、 内面を満たすこと。
お客さんからも共感され 自分と価値観の合う方たちに囲まれながら ビジネスをすること。
ぜひ、体感していただきたいと思っています。


～講座内容～
【基礎編】
・ドローマイライフを創る事で描ける未来とは
（自分自身・社会貢献・ビジネス展開）
・手に入れられるもの・全体像・具体的な実践方法を解説致します
・ドローマイライフを創るステップ
・事前に準備しておくもの（小道具・動画編集ソフト）
・ストーリーを書く事について
・イラストをえがくことについて （ストーリーとうまくリンクさせるポイント）
・作品をを仕上げる時の心のおきかた
・未来へのストーリーを創る時のポイント
【実践編】
・シナリオを仕上げる
・イラストを描く
・音声収録
・動画編集
・youtubeへのアップロード方法
※基礎編・実践編の行程を バランスよく組み込んだプログラム構成


オンライン講座を受講して 得られるもの
自分の強み・資質が理解できるようになる
自己開示することで、自分を表現することが楽になる
他にはない、 新しい自己紹介動画を作ることができる
敷居の高いと思っていた 自己紹介動画が作れるようになる
簡単な動画編集のスキルが身につく
価値観の合うお客様だけが集まってくるようになる
target_audience: ご自身の指標を明確にしたい方。
自分自身と向き合い、心地よいライフスタイルを送りたいかた。
ご自身のビジネスのステージアップを望まれる方。

courses.title: Learn Amazon eBook and Paperback Publishing from Scratch
courses.bio: Become a professional Amazon KDP/Kindle Publisher, and learn about all the steps involved
objectives: Learn about how your Amazon Book Publishing skills can benefit you in the Freelance world and learn how to turn these skills into a regular stream of income
For Authors, learn everything about self-publishing all book types on Amazon
Become an expert Kindle eBook and KDP Paperback formatter; learn all the tips and tricks involved in creating a modern Kindle eBook for mobile and PC devices
Ability to utilize the available features in MS Word, Calibre, Adobe InDesign, and Adobe Photoshop for every step involved in the Amazon Book Publishing Process
Learn everything about the Amazon KDP/Kindle requirements for both paperback and ebook and how to ensure books meet these requirements
Become a book formatting, layout, design, and typesetting expert for all book types
Learn how to properly format and prepare images in a book’s interior (quality DPI for print, bleed for children's book, etc.)
How to embed all fonts in a document
Learn eBook character encoding
Learn how to create clickable websites and hyperlinks for an eBook
Learn how to insert 'guide items' to an eBook to ensure easy navigation of your readers
Learn Indexing
How to optimize an eBook to ensure it works on all kinds of devices
Become well-versed on all Amazon KDP file format options
requirements: - No Prior experience is needed (The course has been adapted for even beginners)
- A Laptop or Desktop computer (Windows or Mac)
- Internet connection
- Downloaded and installed Microsoft Word 2013 or higher, Adobe InDesign, Adobe Photoshop, Calibre E-book Management, Kindle Preview, and Kindle Kids' Book Creator
courses.description:
Unlock new income streams and elevate your career with our comprehensive course designed specifically for Freelancers and Authors. Whether you're looking to earn extra income online or self-publish your book without the need for a publishing agency, this course has got you covered.
For Freelancers: Equip yourself with 5 to 7 valuable skills that you can immediately offer to clients as part of your freelancing career. This course will prepare you to confidently navigate the Amazon KDP Paperback and Kindle eBook publishing process.
For Authors: Take control of your publishing journey by learning how to self-publish your book on Amazon, without the need for any external help. From formatting and layout to design, conversion, and uploading, we've got you covered.
What's Inside:
In-depth lecture videos covering every aspect of Amazon's publishing requirements
Step-by-step guides to book formatting, layout, design, conversion, and uploading
Resources to ensure you have all the necessary software, accessible through a Dropbox link provided in the downloadable PDF syllabus
No prior knowledge of Amazon Book Publishing? No problem! This course is perfect for beginners, guiding you through each step of the process with ease.
Delivered through a lecture and discussion format, this course's sections are designed to provide you with all the knowledge you need to succeed in Amazon eBook and Paperback publishing.
target_audience: Freelancers interested in offering their Amazon Book Publishing Skills Online
Authors who wish to Self-publish on Amazon

courses.title: Produce Cinematic Videos for Free Using Gemini & Veo 2 API 2
courses.bio: Leverage free AI tools to generate cinematic videos using Gemini and Veo 2 API—no Veo 3 access required
requirements: A Google account to access Gemini and Google AI tools.
A basic computer with internet access (Windows, macOS, or Linux).
No prior coding or video editing experience required – we’ll guide you step by step.
Curiosity and motivation to explore AI-powered video creation workflows.
Optional: A free ChatGPT or Gemini Pro account for advanced scripting and automation prompts.
Optional: Basic familiarity with APIs or browser extensions (helpful, but not necessary – everything is explained).
courses.description:
Want to create stunning cinematic videos without access to Google Veo 3? This course shows you how to leverage free alternatives using Gemini, automation workflows, and API access to Google Veo 2—unlocking powerful video generation without the usual restrictions.
Whether you're a content creator, marketer, educator, or just curious about AI-generated video, this course gives you step-by-step guidance on how to automate the process of crafting cinematic visuals with AI. You’ll learn how to combine prompt engineering with Gemini's capabilities to generate compelling scripts, and then use API access to Veo 2 (Google’s still-powerful free version) to bring those scripts to life as cinematic video content.
This course emphasizes hands-on experience. We walk you through how to:
Access and use the Veo 2 video generation interface (via API or browser automation)
Write high-quality prompts and scripts using Gemini
Automate your workflow with free tools
Combine audio, subtitles, and generated visuals for a cinematic result
Even if you don’t have access to Veo 3, this method will help you produce professional-looking videos with almost zero cost.
No prior coding or video editing skills are required—just basic curiosity and a desire to explore what’s possible with today’s AI tools. Enroll now and start building your own cinematic universe, one free tool at a time!
target_audience: Content creators who want to produce cinematic videos using free AI tools without access to Google Veo 3.
Anyone with limited access to premium AI tools who still wants to create visually compelling, story-driven content.
Freelancers and entrepreneurs seeking to add AI-generated video services to their offerings.
Developers and automation fans curious about integrating APIs and scripting to streamline creative workflows.
Beginner video editors interested in learning how to automate video generation without prior editing experience.
YouTubers, marketers, and educators looking to generate high-quality video content quickly and affordably.
AI enthusiasts eager to explore practical applications of Gemini and Veo 2 for media creation.

courses.title: Crea una Estación de Radio Por Internet Icecast 2020
courses.bio: Un curso enfocado a medios de comunicación y público en general

Subir Música: Subir música en Centovacast y FTP
Listas de Reproducción: Configurar listas de reproducción por defecto
Crear sitio Web básico: Crear sitio Web básico y generar reproductor de radio personalizado

requirements: Este curso requiere adquirir un servicio de radio Streaming y de manera opcional adquirir un servicio hosting y registro de un nombre de dominio. En este curso te mostramos paso a paso como adquirir esos servicios y como configurarlos.
courses.description: En curso de crea una Estación de Radio por Internet con Icecast 2020 nos enfocamos a mostrar como crear una radio por internet  paso a paso con una de las aplicaciones mas populares del momento conocida como Centovacast. En este curso te mostramos como  configurar la radio, como crear listas de producción, como subir musica y como hacer transmisiones en vivo. Te hablamos también acerca de los derechos de autor y como editar MP3s con el metadata requerido para que tu radio muestre la informacion a las canciones incluyendo el álbum. Este curso no requiere experiencia previa, pero requiere de adquirir un servicio de radio streaming, y de manera opcional, también te mostramos como crear un sitio Web rápido, donde puedas colocar el reproductor personalizado de tu radio.
target_audience: Personas que les gusta transmitir en vivo y estar al aire por medio de una radio por Internet.

courses.title: Self-Publish Paperback Books With Images Using Createspace
courses.bio: A Detailed Step By Step Course Showing Exactly How to Convert Any Digital Book With or Without Images to a Hard Copy
objectives: Self publish a paperback book using the free platform Createspace
Quickly upload your book using my pre-formatted word template
Optimize image resolution for hard copy print books
Use free tools to create your book cover
Finally hold your own book in your hands
Link kindle book and paperback book
Set up MatchBook

Start here: Benefits of having a paperback copy of your book
Quiz: Benefits of publishing a hard copy
Formatting Your Book For Createspace: Converting your digital book to createspace format
Alternative method for converting ebook to Createspace template
Easy way to change trim size
How to Change Page Number Styles
What to do with Affiliate Links
Creating a Resource Page on Your Website
Uploading Your Book to Createspace: How to Use the Interior Reviewer within Createspace
Converting to PDF and uploading to Createspace
How to Optimize Images for Createspace: How to find an Images DPI
How to Change the DPI of an Image
Updating the Images in Word Document
Checking the Optimized Images in Interior Reviewer
Converting Color Images to Black & White
Adding a Book Cover: Creating a Cover Using Createspace Tool
Using a Createspace tool to create a book cover template
Downloading Editable Text Plugin For Paint.net
Editing Text of Your Own Cover
Saving Your Cover as a PDF
Adding Sales Channel Information: Using HTML for Your Book Description
Proofing Your Book: Changing to Modern Layout and Effect on Number of Pages
Linking Your Kindle and Physical Book: Publishing your kindle book via createspace
If you already have a kindle book
How to link your kindle and hard copy book
Setting Up Match Book in Kindle Publishing (KDP)

requirements: You should already have a copy of your digital book or manuscript.
In the course I will provide you with some Word templates to use so you will need access to Microsoft Word.
Later in the course we will be using Paint.net which is free to download. It would be helpful if you already had this installed on your computer.
We will also use some other free tools and will cover this within the course material.
You will need access to the internet.
courses.description:
Learn How To Self-Publish Your Book Using Createspace
Do you dream of being able to actually hold your own book in your hands? Are you concerned about the costs involved or just don't know how to go about it?
Self-publishing is becoming increasingly popular not just for digital books but also hard copies too. However, if you look at the self-published books on Amazon, you'll notice that the majority are not available as a paperback copy.
Why is that?

Formatting a book for print is just too difficult and time consuming.
If you have images it is impossible to optimize them without expensive software.
Those were my concerns too but I wasn't going to let that stop me!
I've developed my own quick way of converting kindle books to a format acceptable by Createspace (a free print on demand platform). Images can be optimized if you know how using free software.
This course is designed to help you quickly convert any digital book to a format that can be uploaded to Createspace. I Will Show You Everything You Need To Know To Finally Hold Your Own Book In Your Hands:
Quickly convert your digital book to the correct format using my template
How to optimize your book size and layout for maximum royalties
How to deal with images and obtain the 300 dpi resolution required
How to remove any potential issues before uploading to Createspace
The best format to upload to Createspace
How to use the Createspace platform to publish your book
How to create your cover and save it as a PDF using free tools
How to price your book
How to link your kindle book to the paperback copy
...and much more!
Watch Over My Shoulder As I Convert One of My Kindle Books To Createspace.
See in real time how to deal with any issues that arise.
If I make a mistake or things go wrong you'll get to see it and what I do to quickly sort it out! It's all on video to make this a realistic learning experience for you.
P.S. Click on "Take This Course" now to start publishing your own paperback book.
target_audience: This detailed course is suitable for anyone who wants to self publish their work using the print on demand service from Createspace and in particular for those who have images within their book.
This self-publishing course is ideal for authors who already have a digital book (whether published or not) and want to publish a hard copy version themselves.
If you plan to or have already self published a kindle book then using Createspace for your paperback copy will make the task much easier as it is also owned by Amazon.
This course is suitable for any would be author or writer looking for extra income with paperback books.
This course is not for those who want to use a different platform to self publish paperback books..

courses.title: Youtubeチャンネル登録者が0から1000を最短で達成する設計術 ‖ 初投稿20時間で1000人を実現したロジック
courses.bio: 初投稿して20時間で登録者1000人を実現し1ヶ月で収益化したチャンネル設計術をマスターできます。これを活用することで最小限でYoutubeを伸ばす事ができるでしょう。
objectives: 初投稿20時間で登録者1000人を実現したロジック
素人でのファンを獲得する方法
Youtubeで上手くいくor上手くいかないチャンネルの違いとは？
長期的・安定的に再生回数を増やしてチャンネル登録者を増加させる方法
飽きられないチャンネルの作り方

はじめに: このコースの目次
なぜチャンネル設計が重要なのか？
Youtubeで動画が再生される仕組み
このコースの注意点
STEP1 あなたの目的と目標はなんですか？: このセクションで学ぶ事
目的があるから目標を立てられる
STEP2 専門的なチャンネルを作る: レッドorブルーどっちがいいのか？
STEP3 自分の勝てるジャンルを見つけ出す方法: 自分の勝てるジャンルを見つけ出す方法とは？
上手くいってるチャンネルの特徴は足し算！？
STEP４ 自分の強みを理解する: 独自のポジションを獲得する構図とは？
あなたの強みを引き出すためには？
STEP5 ターゲットを決めペルソナを作る: ターゲットとペルソナはどう違うのか？

requirements: Youtubeアカウントを持っている
Youtubeに動画をアップロードできる
courses.description:
最近のYouTubeは動画をただアップロードしても収益化さえ難しいと言われています。


実際に
「YouTubeで動画を丁寧に作って毎日投稿をしているけどチャンネル登録1000人の壁を越えられない。」
「やる気でYoutubeはじめてみたけど再生回数は10人以下チャンネル登録も100人さえ超えられない・・」
「SNSからアクセスをもってきてもチャンネル登録者数が全然伸びない・・・」
などなど、


YouTubeをやってみたけどめちゃくちゃ難しいと思っていませんか？


Youtubeを始めたばかりの初心者から中級者の人でも悩む事だと思います。


Youtubeを初めて最初の壁は、、、収益化です。


収益化の条件はチャンネル登録者1000人と視聴再生時間4000時間です。
ですが、登録者100人さえ行かないチャンネルがほとんど、、、


それほど、Youtubeを始めたてのビギナーには収益化は難しいものです。


そのために、再生回数や登録者を伸ばす為に企画を凝ったり、動画のクオリティーあげたりと努力をしているかもしれませんが、それらの事は実は、、、


無駄に終わってる可能性があります。


それは、そもそもの土台であるチャンネルの設計ができていないのです。


僕は、元々Webプロモーションをメインとして活動してきていましたが、近年Youtubeなどの動画でのプロモーションなどの相談もいただいていて実際に試して教えて実践してきました。


その中で気づいたことは、Youtubeをチャレンジするほとんどの人が企画や動画内容にネタばかりに目がいってしまっています。


どんなに素晴らしい企画やトークスキルもチャンネルという土台がしっかりとしていなければ再生回数やチャンネル登録者を増やす事ができません。


さらに、いえば動画が伸びてチャンネル登録者が増えて、それなりの知名度を得たとしても、結果的にオワコンといった状態になりかねないです。


芸人で言えば一発家のような状態です。


そこで、僕がこれまで実験し実践をしてきた、ノウハウをこれまで全く結果が出なかった方にアドバイスをしてみました。


その結果


・平均再生回数が5.6倍
・チャンネル登録者増加率が6.2倍
・広告収入0のチャンネルが広告収入86万円
・広告収入以外の収益も10倍


などの成果が出せました。


Youtubeは動画内容が重要だと言われています。


もちろんその通りなのですが、チャンネル自体がポンコツだとせっかくの素晴らしい動画もポンコツになってしまうのです。


そうならない為にチャンネルの設計図を書き一からチャンネルを構築する事が重要です。


そのために必要な事は、、、


あなたの強みを理解し需要に合わせることが大切です。


このコースでは、実際にYoutubeチャンネルでテストしてきた経験からあなたがYoutubeの再生回数やチャンネル登録者数を増やして収益化をするために、一番最初にしなければいけないチャンネル設計の方法をお伝えします。


そして、、、


クライアントの実例
Youtubeの成功者の実例
をもとにあなたがYoutubeで最短で成果を出すための知識とスキルを学べるようにつくりました。


これを見れば、ただやみくもに動画を出し、運任せで自分だけが面白いと勘違いし再生回数とチャンネル登録者が一歳増えない、、、なんて事にはならず、あなたがYoutubeで目指している結果を得る為に必要なスキルが手に入れることができるでしょう。
target_audience: Youtuberの方・Youtuberになりたい方
Youtubeでビジネスをしてる方
影響力を手に入れたい方
再生回数を増やしたいと思ってる方
いい動画を作っても評価されない方
毎日投稿してもチャンネル登録者が増えない方

courses.description:
RapidAction Podcasting is the course for anyone who is interested in establishing their own online podcasting presence. The course delivers an easy to follow technical understanding of setting up a podcast, recording and editing it, publishing it to your own site and on iTunes.
The course also focuses on teaching you how to not just technically put together a podcast, but how to actually build a show that people want to listen to.
Sean shares tips and secrets gained from his years of podcasting on how to plan, run, maintain, market, monetize and promote an ongoing audience and authority-generating machine.
RapidAction Podcasting consists of a 4 module video series, with each module containing between 3 or 7 lectures. The total running time is over 6 hours. The course was originally broken into "Basic" and "Advanced" modules - when you purchase this course you get both modules.
Sean also includes all transcripts and MP3 files of each video. As an added bonus he also includes a running sheet for recording a podcast show.
RapidAction Podcasting is for anyone, from the beginner to the more experienced user, and anyone in between. Sean recommends the course for people who are involved in online or offline marketing, niche markets, or anyone who is interested in podcasting as a hobby.

Body Language and Deception Indicators 2 of 2

requirements: Have a thirst for knowledge!

courses.description:
This course is for novelists, screenwriters and general audiences who want to learn how to write authentic police interview and interrogation scenes. You will be taught by a retired, 22-year veteran of the San Bernardino County Sheriff's Department, who spent 6-years in one of the busiest homicide divisions in the country. Having worked nearly 200 murders, Sgt. Derek Pacifico will teach you what you need to know to write the most authentic and technically correct interrogation scenes.
Included in this course are video lectures, slideshow presentations and the answers to a common set of frequently asked questions the sarge has been asked from writers from around the world. This course will span several hours, starting with Miranda Law and ending with the interrogation. You will learn about the preparation that goes into interviewing a murder suspect, the process of building rapport, the correct interrogation room set up, body language analysis and so much, much more.
Take advantage of the opportunity to hear from a real cop, with real experience without having to fly across the country or around the world to take one of his seminars. You are in for a real treat!
target_audience: Fiction Writers
Novelists
Screenwriters
Anyone wanting to learn about real police interrogation systems, laws and practices

courses.title: Beyond the Basics of (Self) Publishing, Aspect 2: Editing
courses.bio: Your Path to Editing Your Book: An Important Step in Achieving Literary Success!
objectives: Learn all about ASPECT 2 of 6 of the publishing process, which is EDITING!
Learn the different types of editing and editors.
Get an understand of the editing process and different steps toward taking a completed draft and editing it into a polished final product.
Discover the benefits and etiquette of working with professional editors, as well as where to find them.
Learn different techniques, tools, programs, strategies, and tips for taking the words you've written and improving them.
Learn how long the editing process takes when done in a spirit of excellence instead of a spirit of rush!
Learn the true purpose and role of an editor as well as the style guides they should be following.
Learn how to pick the right editor for your editing needs.
Learn who is to blame - and why - for errors in a book.
requirements: Completing Aspect 1 of the publishing process (Writing) is recommended, but it is not required.
***Optional hardcopy and digital formats of the course slides are available. Please inquire about them with your instructor.***
courses.description:
This course is the second in a six-part series that takes you beyond the basics of (self) publishing to learn not only how to write your book, but how to turn it into a book business, leading to both literary and financial literary success.
You can go through the aspects one by one in sequence, or pick the courses that best suit what you need to learn based on where you're currently at on your literary journey.
Adapted from the popular “Act Like an Author, Think Like a Business” conference and companion book, this course is one of six that helps you get started on the writing and publishing process, as well as finish.
The first step is always the biggest, which is writing the book. But this course can help you to take the next step, which is equally as important; the editing of your written work. Ultimately, each step will lead you to your final destination of literary and publishing success.
After you complete this course, you'll be ready to move through the remaining aspects of publishing. Even if you've already written your book, you might find it important to go back and take Aspect 1. Regardless of where you are on your writing and publishing journey, editing is never a step you want to skip. Afterall, this is the step on your journey that will help you release a polished product out into the world.
This course will help you understand all the steps of the editorial process. It will also provide some information about self-editing, working with freelancers, and how to find the latter.
So, continue on your literary journey with your instructor and own personal literary chauffer—award-winning and bestselling author, Joylynn M. Ross—and learn about a book's editorial process today.
Whether you've written and published 0 books or 100, this course will offer new tips and strategies that will add value and benefit to your editing journey.


***The total value for all 6 aspects is right under $1000. Each aspect has been priced accordingly in order to equal the total value. It's not about the time/length of each course, it's about the quality, value, and the benefit they are going to add to your literary and publishing life!
target_audience: This course is for those who have already written their book, or are about to, and want to get a head start on the next step after writing the book, which is, you guessed it, editing!
This course is for someone interested in improving their knowledge about the book editing process.
This course is for someone considering becoming a book editor.
This course is for someone who may not have a book ready but wants to get ready for their book!

courses.title: 500件のデータから分析！読者が思わずクリックしたくなる記事タイトルの作り方
courses.bio: 記事制作のプロが「タイトル作り」に特化したコースを開発！独自の経験知と最新データをかけ合わせた"超"実践的なノウハウを、具体例と共に分かりやすくお届けします。記事制作やブログ運営に携わるライター、副業ワーカー、Web担当者は必見です！
objectives: 記事タイトルの役割
記事タイトルを構成する3つの要素
6W2Hを使った記事内容の分解方法
記事タイトルの組み立て方
読者の目を引く表現技法
記事タイトル作りのトレーニング方法

コース概要／タイトル作りに必要な6つの基礎知識: はじめに〜当コースのカリキュラムと講師のご紹介〜
【基礎知識02】タイトルを構成する3つの要素
【基礎知識03】タイトルの文字数
【基礎知識04】タイトルの言葉選び
【基礎知識05】タイトルを考案するタイミング
【基礎知識06】タイトルのNGパターン
記事内容の分解方法とタイトルの組み立て方: タイトルを組み立てる
アンケートで検証！読者の目を引く表現技法: アンケートの内容と検証方法
【検証01】具体的な数字を入れる
【検証02】簡単であることを伝える
【検証03】ネガティブワードを入れる
【検証05】権威性をアピールする
【検証06】安易な形容詞を使わない
【追加検証01】ローマ字表記 or カタカナ表記
【追加検証03】末尾に「とは？」を入れる or 入れない
【追加検証04】末尾に「！」を入れる or 入れない
【追加検証05】伏せ字を使う or 使わない
タイトル作りのトレーニング方法: タイトル作りトレーニングの3ステップ
さいごに: みなさまへのメッセージ

requirements: 受講に必要な条件はありません。PCもしくはスマートフォンが一台あればどなたでも受講できます。
courses.description:
タイトルの作り方が分からない。
タイトルを考えるのに時間がかかる。
タイトルがワンパターンになりがち。
クリックしたくなるようなタイトルが作れない。
記事タイトル作りについて、このような悩みをお持ちではありませんか？
「なんとなく」で記事タイトルを考案していると、このような悩みに陥りやすくなります。


記事タイトル作りは、簡単そうに見えて実はとても奥が深いのです。
パッと思いつくものではなく、パーツを一つずつ組み立てていく作業に近いです。
当コースでは、こうした「記事タイトルの組み立て方」について重点的に解説します。


また当コースでは、アンケートを用いて様々なタイトルテクニックに関する検証を行いました。
アンケート件数は500件。これらのデータを活用しながら、様々なタイトルテクニックについて
本当に効果はあるのか
どのくらい効果があるのか
どのように使えばいいのか
という部分まで突き詰めて解説します。


当コースのゴールは「読者の目を引くタイトルを作れるようになること」。
タイトルを構成する要素やタイトルの組み立て方などについて学び、自らの力で魅力的なタイトルを考案できるようになりましょう。


それでは、本編でみなさまとお会いできることを楽しみにしています！
target_audience: ライティング未経験の方
駆け出しのライター／ブロガー
企業のWeb担当者

courses.description:
Débloquez tout le potentiel de YouTube et de l'intelligence artificielle pour propulser votre présence en ligne ! Avec notre cours complet "Business YouTube et Intelligence Artificielle: Le Duo Gagnant pour 2025", vous découvrirez des techniques et des outils avant-gardistes pour transformer votre chaîne en une puissante machine à générer du contenu et des revenus. Voici ce que vous apprendrez :
Introduction à l'Atelier Business YouTube & IA - Comprenez les fondamentaux de l'utilisation de l'IA dans vos stratégies YouTube.
Utilisez mon Générateur de Script YouTube - Apprenez à créer des scripts captivants qui captent l'attention de votre audience.
Convertissez du Texte en Speech avec un Générateur Vocal IA - Transformez vos scripts en discours naturels et engageants avec les dernières technologies IA.
Créez un Avatar IA sur Adobe Express - Personnalisez votre présence numérique avec un avatar unique qui parle à votre public.
Création de votre Background avec Canva - Maîtrisez Canva pour concevoir des arrière-plans professionnels qui enrichissent vos vidéos (Parties 1 et 2).
Montage Vidéo pour votre Vidéo Finale - Apprenez les techniques de montage pour polir vos vidéos à la perfection.
Uploader votre Vidéo sur votre Nouvelle Chaîne YouTube - Suivez nos conseils experts pour optimiser vos uploads et maximiser votre visibilité.
Inscrivez-vous dès aujourd'hui pour prendre une longueur d'avance avec YouTube et l'IA, et commencez à construire votre empire numérique !


Ressources d’apprentissage complémentaires :
Atelier en ligne
Documentation
Consultez des exemples de tableaux de bord, de rapports et de fichiers de bureau.
Enfin, je m'engage à vous fournir la formation la plus complète possible sur Udemy pour vous permettre de réussir dans votre apprentissage.
Je m'engage à répondre rapidement à vos questions pour vous aider à comprendre les concepts de la formation.
Je vais ajouter des cas pratiques sur demande pour vous donner des exemples concrets de ce que vous apprenez.
Je vais vous accompagner avec des cas pratiques et d'autres ressources utiles pour vous aider à mettre en pratique ce que vous apprenez.
Ces ajouts de vidéos seront, bien entendu, gratuits si vous avez acquis la formation.
Comment me contacter ? Je reste disponible dans la rubrique Question/Réponses d'Udemy pour répondre à vos questions.
À la fin de ce cours, si vous le suivez en entier et réussissez l'ensemble des quizz : Obtenez votre certification électronique à insérer dans votre CV et profil LinkedIn.

Dr. Firas
target_audience: Améliorer leurs compétences en création de contenu vidéo.
Utiliser des outils d'IA pour automatiser et optimiser la production de contenu.
Développer une présence en ligne forte et engageante grâce à des techniques de marketing digital avancées.
Explorer de nouvelles stratégies pour monétiser leur contenu sur YouTube.

courses.description:
4th course in the self-publishing series
Please Note: This is for nonfiction authors.

I had a book that outsold every other book I published. It was a top seller for more than two years. It had certain ingredients. I'm going to show you what those are and how to do it.

If you focus on this, sales will take care of themselves. It will be like selling diamonds for $10.
There are so many different book marketing and promotion strategies being taught. Which ones should you use? Which method works best?
Wouldn't it be nice if you could just focus on your writing? If you didn't have to spend a lot of your time marketing, how much more time would you have for writing your books?
An author writes books? However, the belief is that, as a self-published author, you also need to set aside a large portion of your time for advertising, marketing, and promotion.
Advertising, marketing, and promotion methods do produce results. However, when you stop, so do the sales. There is a better way.
When you get this right, you really can concentrate on writing your books. Sales will take care of themselves. In fact, results will be better.
Why do certain books stay best-sellers for years? It's because they focus on the one thing that gets the most sales.
I'm going to show you what you need to focus on and how to do it.
- Top three things make books sell themselves.
- Improvements that turn books into best-sellers.
- How to create books that outsell others.
- Find long-term top-selling book subjects.
- Turn readers into raving fans that buy everything you publish.
Let me help you improve your book sales. Enroll now.
target_audience: Self-published authors who want more sales
People who want to self-publish a book

courses.description:
HAVE YOU WRITTEN/SELF-PUBLISHED A BOOK AND NOW...YOU ARE NOT SURE WHAT TO DO NEXT?
KEEN TO GET YOUR BOOKS IN GLOBAL, ONLINE RETAILERS?
WANT TO KEEP ALL THE PROFITS OF YOUR BOOKS...WITHOUT MIDDLEMEN EATING YOUR PROFITS?


IF Yes, read on...


I promise you, this course WILL save you time and stress.
Forget googling and duck-taping pieces of information and wondering why you are not getting the results you want!
Forget feeling overwhelmed or confused!


I will show you my super-easy, step-by-step instructions to get started.
I will teach you how to set up your self-publishing business so your books can get international coverage from leading online retailers, chains, specialist and independent retailers, libraries and other book buyers worldwide.
I literally walk you through the process of registering your publishing business with the UK's ISBN agency. During the course, I take you through my tried and tested, simple three-step process which I have used for years for my books, my clients and students. You will also learn how to add your new titles to the system, making them visible internationally in an instant.


So if you were planning to pay a freelancer to do this for you (for each book...meaning money) or were just going to give your power/control over to the likes of Amazon (meaning you cut your profits)...
STOP.


Take this course! You only need to do the course ONCE and you are set for life.


This course comes with articles and checklists to ensure you are prepared. I also share from my extensive experience in the publishing industry including my book marketing specialist role in a well-known, global publishing house.
target_audience: Individuals who want to set themselves up as a self-publisher and take full control of their books and keep ALL the profits
Authors who have been rejected by traditional publishers or have been on the slush pile with no hope of being published
Authors who want to gain international coverage of their titles from leading online retailers, chains, specialist and independent retailers, libraries and other book buyers worldwide.
Authors who want to get their book published quickly e.g. a few weeks or months and don't want to wait a life time for the a traditional publisher
Individuals, project managers or agencies managing book publishing projects
Anyone who was considering using third-party ISBNs such as Amazon meaning you are not the official publisher and do not get access to certain data and tools self-publisher do
Book coaches and consultants helping others with wrting/publishing their books
Anyone planning to run a book publishing business
Authors planning to self publish
Authors/writers planning a career in writing
Authors who do not want to get ripped off by 'publishers' or others who would claim this process will cost you ££££/$$$$s
Anyone who wants their own publishing company to appear in their books as opposed to third-parties like Amazon
Anyone planning to purchase their ISBNs to use for their books
Book Printers who want to purchase ISBNs for their clients to convert into ISBN barcodes
Suppliers in the publishing industry who want to offer ISBN registration and/or supply barcodes for authors

Anyone who wants to avoid wasting time reading/googling, feeling overwhelmed or confused. You just want a step-by-step 'Tell/show me how' course. In short, you want to hit the ground running in just over an hour

wie du Schritt für Schritt dein erstes eBook schreibst.

wie du mit hochwertigen Ratgebern anderen Menschen hilfst und dabei noch Geld verdienst.

Fang noch heute mit deinem ersten eBook an. Mit diesem Videokurs hast du das nötige Wissen, um deine ersten Ideen erfolgreich in einem eBook festzuhalten und dieses erfolgreich über Amazon zu verkaufen.
Worauf wartest du? Mach deine Leidenschaft zum Beruf. Egal, ob nebenbei oder hauptberuflich starten möchtest: Der eBook-Markt befindet sich immer noch in den Kinderschuhen. Wer zu lange wartet hat den Trend verschlafen.
Ich freue mich auf dich bei der ersten Lektion,
dein Leon Dawi

courses.description:
In this Kindle Publishing course for self-published authors, I will show you the steps you need to take in order to successfully publish your book on Amazon, through Kindle Direct Publishing.
***** Last UPDATED in November 2017 *****

You will learn how to Research the elements that make up a bestselling book in your niche or genre and then how to Write effective copy that will hook readers and entice them to buy your book.
You will learn step-by-step how to actually publish your ebook through KDP and also whether or not you should place your book exclusively within KDP Select.

Research the Bestselling Authors and Books in Your Particular Niche or Genre

Are there certain authors in your niche or genre that seem to be amongst the bestsellers, time and time again?
Perhaps they have a huge following or just write incredible books, but the chances are that there are a number of things that you can learn from both them and their books.
In the section on Researching, you will discover:
How to dissect the elements that make up a bestselling book in your niche or genre
How to mirror what the bestselling authors do to create a description that sells
How to choose the best two sub-categories for your book
How to research keyword phrases for your book, WITHOUT having to pay for expensive software


Write Compelling Copy that Will Sell Your Book on its Amazon's Sales Page
You may well have written your book, but that doesn't mean you still don't have some more writing to do. This particular type of writing is totally different to the creative writing you have been doing up until this point. And requires a totally different skill set.
In the section on Copywriting, you will learn:
How to write a good title for your book
What your sub-title should incorporate
What your book’s tagline should try to achieve
How to write a description for your book that will pique the reader’s interest


An Over-the-shoulder Look At How To Publish a Book on the Amazon Kindle Store
Once you have researched the ideal categories and keywords for your book and have also written the perfect copy, the next stage is of course to actually go onto KDP and publish your book.
And I thought the best way to show you how to do this was to take you step-by-step through the Kindle Publishing process.
In the section on Publishing To KDP, you will learn
How to enter your book details
How to expand on the book description you have written and create a description for your Amazon Sales Page
How to set up your book’s pricing
How to incorporate your keyword phrases
How to use HTML so that your book stands out from the crowd


Is Exclusivity the Correct Choice For You?
Before you click on that Publish button, you still have a very important decision to make, namely whether to place your book exclusively with KDP Select.
And in the section on Selecting, you will find out:
The advantages of KDP Select
The disadvantages of KDP Select
And when an author should or should not go exclusive


At the end of each section of the course, I have included:

a Quiz - to test your knowledge of what you have just learned
a PDF - with links to the resources and tools mentioned in the section, as well as some further reading on the topic.
a Task Sheet - which sets out a number of tasks for you to complete in order to practice what you have learned.
And by completing the quizzes, the extra reading material and the tasks I have set, I believe you will take even more from the course than if you just sit and watch it, so I highly recommend that you do so.
By the end of this Kindle Publishing course, you will have all the elements correctly in place to successfully publish your ebook on Amazon.
target_audience: Authors who have yet to publish a book
Authors who have already published books, but who would like to sell more books on the Amazon Kindle Store
Anyone with an interest in self-publishing
Authors who want an over-the-shoulder look at Kindle publishing

courses.description:
This course is the final part in the six-part course series that takes you beyond the basics of (self) publishing to learn not only how to write your book, but how to publish, market, and sell your book so that you can ultimately achieve both literary and financial literary success.
You can go through all six aspects of the publishing process one by one in sequence, or pick the courses that best suit what you need to learn based on where you currently are on your literary and publishing journey.
Adapted from the popular “Act Like an Author, Think Like a Business” conference and companion book, this course is one of six that helps you get started on the writing and publishing process, as well as finish.
The first step is always the biggest, which is writing the book. And then, of course, there is the professional editing of the book, followed by interior and exterior design, the actual steps that make up the process of publishing, and then marketing. But this course can help you take the next step, which is equally as important--the selling of your book, before and after it's written. The selling aspect is how you begin to get a return on the investment of writing and publishing a book.
After you complete this course, you'll be ready to move on to the "Build Your Book Business" course series. After all, once you've built your book, it only makes sense (and cents) to build your book business.
So, continue on your literary journey with your instructor and your own personal literary chauffer—award-winning and bestselling author, Joylynn M. Ross—and learn some unique and practical ways to sell your book.
Whether you've written and published 0 books or 100, this course will offer new systems and strategies that will add value and benefit to your literary and publishing journey.


***The total value for all 6 aspects is right under $1000. Each aspect has been priced accordingly in order to equal the total value. It's not about the time/length of each course, it's about the quality, value, and the benefit they are going to collectively add to your literary and publishing life!
target_audience: This course is for someone who has done the work and put in the time of publishing a book, and is now ready to sell the book!

This course is for someone who wants to learn how to sell a book before it's even written or published (this is what we refer to as not waiting for your book to get ready, but getting ready for your book!).
This is for someone ready to learn how to start getting an investment on the writing and/or book publishing process.

Am Ende des Kurses wirst Du alles wissen, was Du brauchst, um ein spannendes Drehbuch zu entwickeln.
requirements: Kreativität, Phantasie und vor allem Begeisterung für Film und das Schreiben
courses.description:
Willst Du deine Geschichten auf Bildschirm oder Leinwand sehen? Willst Du andere Menschen mit Deinen filmischen Ideen begeistern?
In diesem Kurs lernst Du, was Du brauchst, um professioneller Drehbuchautor zu werden. Dazu werden wir gemeinsam ein kleines Drehbuch entwickeln und Entscheidung für Entscheidung durchgehen, die wichtig ist, um den Film für die Zuschauer emotional und spannend zu machen. Außerdem werden wir alle Mittel und Elemente besprechen, die ein gutes Drehbuch braucht - ganz gleich ob es Vorlage für einen Kurzfilm oder einen Blockbuster sein soll.
Was Ihr hier lernt, ist die kompakte Essenz von 16 Jahren als Dozent für Filmdramaturgie. Dabei fließen die Lehren von Drehbuchpäpsten wie Keith Cunningham, John Truby, Frank Daniel, Robert Mckee, Mabley und Howard, Laurie Hutzler, Karl Dietmar Möller Naß und Paul Guilino ebenso ein wie meine eigenen Lehren und die Erfahrungen aus meiner Arbeit als Drehbuchautor, Producer und Regisseur.
Du wirst die Mittel des Drehbuchschreibens kennen und benutzen lernen.
Du wirst erfahren, wie Filme strukturiert sind und aus welchen Einzelteilen (dramatischen Einheiten) sie bestehen.
Du wirst lernen, wie Du unvergessliche Figuren entwickelst und welche Funktion sie in Deiner Geschichte einnehmen.
Was spannende Dialoge ausmacht und wie Subtext funktioniert.
In welchen Stufen Du Dein Drehbuch entwickeln und Deine Geschichte Produzenten und RedakteurInnen anbieten kannst.
Am Ende des Kurses wirst Du alles wissen, was Du brauchst, um ein spannendes Drehbuch zu entwickeln.
target_audience: Alle, die das Drehbuchschreiben lernen wollen
Alle, die erfolgreiche Drehbuchautoren für Film, Streaming oder TV werden wollen
Alle, die sich für Filmdramaturgie interessieren
Alle, die wissen wollen, was Filme so faszinierend macht und was sie beim Zuschauer bewirken
Drehbuchautoren, Regisseure, Kameraleute, Schauspieler, Cutter, die die Mechanismen von Film besser verstehen wollen

courses.description:
Voici enfin un cours qui aborde professionnellement la version gratuite de WordPress. Juste parce que tout le monde n'a pas envie de commencer par l'achat d'un espace de serveur et la gestion d'un cpanel dont il devra après s'occuper de la complexité.
Ce cours est idéal car il vous guide pas à pas pour créer gratuitement votre propre site web, avant de décider après si, oui ou non, vous devez acheter un espace d'hébergement et un nom de domaine personnalisé auprès des entreprises qui en vendent sur Internet.
L'instant design (de logo, flyer, poster et carte de visite) qu'il comporte rend ce cours encore plus intéressant, y compris pour des utilisateurs plus avancés.. Alors, inscrivez-vous et travaillez votre site à votre rythme.


DE QUOI IL S’AGIRA ?
Concrètement, ce cours vous apprend à créer des sites web en se servant du CMS Wordpress. A la fin du cours, chaque participant disposera gratuitement de son propre site web qu'il pourra promouvoir et continuer de mettre à jour.
Si vous hésitez encore à bâtir votre présence en ligne, pour des raisons techniques ou financières, alors ce cours devra vous faire changer d'avis. Il vous guide pas à pas afin de créer votre propre espace à titre gracieux. Pour commencer, il est bon savoir que vous n'avez besoin d'aucune compétence de base en programmation web.
POURQUOI WORDPRESS ?
Il existe évidemment de nombreux outils efficaces qui vous permettent de créer un site gratuitement. Mais en réalité, ils ne pas sont pas tous recommandés pour garantir une présence optimale sur Internet.
Dans ce cours, nous utilisons Wordpress qui est un outil à la fois simple et super efficace. En plus d'être gratuit, Wordpress vous permet d'imposer un look professionnel à votre site et de bénéficier des avantages liés à votre visibilité en ligne.
Si vous disposez déjà d'une page Facebook par exemple, vous pouvez facilement la lier à votre site afin de créer plus d'interactivité avec vos potentiels visiteurs.
AUREZ-VOUS BESOIN D'ACHETER UN HÉBERGEMENT ?
Certes Non ! Vous n'avez pas besoin d'investir dans l'achat de domaine et d'espace d'hébergement pour vous mettre en ligne. Ce cours vous donne une démarche simple et qui fonctionne très bien. Or à tout moment, si vous souhaitez acheter votre propre nom de domaine et franchir une autre étape de votre business en ligne, vous pourrez le faire en juste quelques clics. Vous découvrirez dans ce cours comment procéder, étape par étape.
FAUT-IL PROGRAMMER ET AVOIR DU TEMPS ?
Absolument pas ! Ce guide pratique vous convaincra que vous n'avez pas besoin d'attendre de devenir un as de la programmation pour vous jeter. Vous ne nécessitez pas non plus un temps long pour créer votre site. Il vous faut juste de la motivation et une idée claire de ce que vous avez envie de porter en ligne.
QU’EN EST-IL DE VOTRE IDENTITÉ VISUELLE ?
Disposez-vous déjà d'un logo ? Votre logo vous satisfait-il ou avez-vous envie de le changer ? Quelle que soit votre réponse à ces questions, ce cours vous montrera comment procéder pour créer un logo au design professionnel. Mais ne pensez pas que nous allons nous arrêter à cela. Vous allez également apprendre à créer vos propres supports de communication et les télécharger au format que vous souhaitez. Avec, bien entendu, des outils super sympas, disponibles en ligne et gratuits.
COMMENT PROCÉDER ?
Concrètement, vous aurez à faire des exercices pratiques que nous corrigerons ensemble. En fonction de votre besoin personnel, je vous demanderai de choisir un thème et de me soumettre votre travail de personnalisation, avec le logo, les pages, les articles et les supports de communication que vous aurez créés durant votre apprentissage.
ETES-VOUS PRÊT(E) ?
Alors, si ce cours vous parle, inscrivez-vous et commencez votre site web aujourd'hui même.


Informations importantes à savoir :

courses.description:
Kindle作家になることは実に簡単です。
Wordに１万字程度の文章を書き、
表紙を外注して、その２つをKindleダイレクト・パブリッシングにアップロードするだけだからです。
私の方法によれば、ゼロの状態から始めてたった６時間後に出版ボタンを押すことだってできます。
そして、それは、ちゃんと出版され、読まれています。


しかし、多くの人は、１冊出版して「作家になった」ことに安心し、
それで終わってしまいます。


まるで「Kindle作家」というステータスを手に入れればそれでOKと思っているかのようです。


しかし、多くの人がKindle出版に挑戦する時代において、
たった１冊出版したくらいでは、特別なことではなくなっています。
収益もほぼ得られません。
どんどん積み重なる新刊本にうもれていくからです。


このような状況の中では、「Kindle本を出版しました」と過去を向いて言うのか
「私はKindle本を出版しています」と未来を向いて言うのかで、収益も、ステータスも大きく変わります。


まだ一冊も出版したことがない人は、
まずさっさと一冊出版し、
そこで、得られた経験、スキル、知識でもって、一気に２冊め、３冊目を出版し、その後の多作家への道を進むことが望まれます。


このコースでは、
●　とりあえずさっさと１冊出版する方法
●　一気呵成に２冊め３冊目を出版して、多作家への道を歩み始める方法
●　それらを支える実戦的な考え方
を学ぶことができます。


５時間の講座ですが、今後さらに質、量ともにアップデートしていきます。


ぜひ、多作家への道を歩みだし、その先に見える世界を味わってください。
target_audience: まずは一冊目のKindle本を出版してみたい人

courses.description:
Great to have you in this course. These are the things we will cover in this course:
I created this course because I've seen a lot of authors and publishers disregard the design of their ebooks. There are just very few tools that supports creating epub and most of them have a high learning curve to use.
In this course, I will guide you how you can create professional looking Amazon Kindle Books, Apple iBooks or Google Books and Nook books with the use of a FREE tool - Sigil.
Most publishers just use plain MS WORD to create their books but the problem with that is when it is coverted into a digital book like epub or mobi format, it messes up a lot and it DOESN'T LOOK GOOD!
I have developed my own way of creating these epubs like a pro using SIGIL. I have even created templates which I will share to you in this course!
So if you're ready to step up your publishing business and make professional ebooks, then click the ENROLL in this course button on the right! Let's do it!
target_audience: I created this course to help self-published authors and publishers to build professional looking Kindle books. The ePub that you are creating is also compatible and has been the format of choice for most publishing platforms like Amazon KDP, Barnes and Noble, Apple iBooks, Google Books, Smashwords, Draft2Digital, etc.

I have seen a lot of publishers publishing their books and uploading them online and not providing much attention to the formatting. This course is not for you if you're looking for a drag-and-drop content and everything is formatted for you automatically. Although this is possible by creating a template. But if you want more flexibility in your design, this course is for you!

courses.description:
Learn how to produce and publish your own audiobook using Descript. This comprehensive course equips you with everything you need to create a professional-quality audiobook.

Releasing an audio version of your book is a great way to reach more readers — after all, some people only listen to audiobooks. But historically, it’s been costly and complicated. Expensive equipment, specialized software, and a drawn out process involving outsourced expertise made it difficult to start.
The good news is, that’s all changed. You can, and should, do it yourself. And this course will walk you through exactly how.
Guided by experienced authors Rob and Devin, you’ll get fifteen concise video lessons, covering everything from the basics to advanced techniques. And best of all, all you need is a single app: Descript.
What you’ll learn
From setting up your recording equipment to editing as you record, this course provides all the knowledge you need to create a professional-quality audiobook. Each video lesson includes all supporting materials and worksheets so you can focus on recording.
1. Setting the stage

4. Advanced editing and creative decisions
Creative decisions and deviations from the manuscript

The best part of it all is that it only cost me $100 to get started. The profit margins are insanely high in the audiobooks business since the cost is only the time you spend on it. With my unique editing method, you will be able to FLY through the editing process. Some say that for every 1 hour of audio, it takes 4 hours to edit. Happy Reading!
Olivia

بهاتفك فقط إنشاء قناة يوتيوب مليونية تصل للتريند وتحقق ارباح مذهلة - هتدعيلي ! كيفية بدء وإنشاء قناة يويتوب ناجحة بهاتفك فقط - وكيفية التصوير والمونتاج وتوزيع الإضاءة وتسجيل صوت احترافي جدا والوصول للتريند والصدارة في أسرع وقت واربع نصايح راح تنجحك باليوتيوب - دليلك الكامل
الكورس عبارة عن خلاصة سنين من الخبرة للمبتدئين تأخذك من بدايه فكرة عمل قناة إلى إختيار المجال ثم إنشاء القناة والتصوير وتسجيل الصوت بشكل احترافي بأقل الامكانيات وسأجيبك عن الكثير من الاسئلة التي تدور في ذهنك.
إليك خلاصة 11 سنة خبرة علي يوتيوب
أنشأت فيها العديد من القنوات واكبر قناة فيهم وصلت إلي 5 مليون مشترك سأقدم لك كل هذه الخبرة في كورس نصف ساعة فقط
نناقش معكم كل ماسوف تحتاج معرفته عن اليوتيوب من الصفر الي أن تصبح محترفاً فيه وليس هذا فقط !
