requirements: Có kinh nghiệm chuyên môn & mong muốn xây dựng thương hiệu cá nhân qua viết sách.
courses.description:
TỪ VIẾT SÁCH ĐẾN THƯƠNG HIỆU CÁ NHÂN: NÂNG TẦM CHUYÊN GIA
VỐN SỐNG – VIẾT SÁCH – XÂY DỰNG THƯƠNG HIỆU – TẠO DI SẢN
Trong thế giới của các CEO và chuyên gia, sách không chỉ là tác phẩm – mà là công cụ chiến lược để khẳng định uy tín, nâng tầm thương hiệu cá nhân và tạo dấu ấn lâu dài. Khóa học “Từ Sách Đến Thương Hiệu Cá Nhân: Nâng Tầm Chuyên Gia” sẽ dẫn dắt bạn biến từng trải nghiệm, tri thức và vốn sống thành một tác phẩm giá trị, đồng thời xây dựng thương hiệu cá nhân đẳng cấp.
Bạn sẽ được hướng dẫn qua 4 giai đoạn trọng yếu:
Vốn sống – Khám phá và hệ thống hóa kinh nghiệm, câu chuyện và tri thức cá nhân.
Viết sách – Chuyển hóa vốn sống thành bản thảo chuyên nghiệp, từ ý tưởng đến trang sách hoàn chỉnh.
Xây dựng thương hiệu – Sử dụng sách như công cụ chiến lược để nâng tầm uy tín và tầm ảnh hưởng.
Tạo di sản – Biến sách thành dấu ấn bền vững, giúp bạn được nghe, được nhớ và được kính trọng.
Sau khóa học, bạn sẽ:
Hiểu cách biến kinh nghiệm và tri thức thành tác phẩm giá trị.
Xây dựng chiến lược thương hiệu cá nhân thông qua sách.
Tạo ra bản thảo hoàn chỉnh sẵn sàng xuất bản.
Nắm trong tay công cụ để ghi dấu ấn và nâng tầm chuyên gia trong ngành nghề của mình.
Khóa học phù hợp cho:
CEO, chủ doanh nghiệp, chuyên gia muốn khẳng định uy tín.
Người muốn xây dựng thương hiệu cá nhân và tầm ảnh hưởng bền vững.
Những ai muốn biến vốn sống thành di sản thông qua sách.
Đây không chỉ là khóa học viết sách, mà là hành trình nâng tầm bản thân và thương hiệu. Hãy tham gia ngay hôm nay để biến vốn sống thành tác phẩm – khẳng định uy tín – và tạo di sản vượt thời gian.
target_audience: Chuyên gia, cố vấn, diễn giả muốn khẳng định uy tín.
Doanh nhân, nhà sáng lập cần xây dựng thương hiệu cá nhân.
Người làm đào tạo, huấn luyện, tư vấn muốn tạo khác biệt.
Người đã/đang ấp ủ viết sách để lan tỏa tri thức.
Người mong muốn để lại di sản giá trị cho thế hệ sau.

そんな悩みにお応えするために、初心者〜中級者向けのビジネス・副業を７つピックアップし、具体的なやり方、収益の構造、活動に取り組むイメージについて学んでいきます。

requirements: รู้จัก ภาษา html ในระดับต้น แต่ถ้าไม่รู้จักในช่วงแรกๆ ท่านต้องสังเกตให้มากกว่าปกติเพื่อแยกองค์ประกอบของภาษา html ให้ออกว่าส่วนไหนเป็น <tag> ส่วนไหนใช้เพื่อแสดงผล
courses.description:
Landing Page ถือเป็นเครื่องมือสำคัญสำหรับการดำเนินงานด้าน Digital Marketing เพื่อช่วยให้ตราสินค้า หรือ Brand สามารถนำเสนอผลิตภัณฑ์จนนำไปสู่ Call to Action สำหรับผลิตภัณฑ์นั้นๆ ต่อไป
ใน Course เรียนนี้ท่านจะได้เรียนรู้ในการปรับแต่ง Landing Page โดยใช้งาน Bootstrap Template ซึ่งท่านควรมีความรู้เบื้องต้นในการเขียนโค๊ด html มาบ้างเพื่อจะได้เข้าใจองค์ประกอบต่างๆ ของ tag ในภาษา html เพื่อให้สามารถแก้ไข Landing Page ได้ แต่หากท่านไม่เคยรู้จักภาษา html มาก่อน นั่นก็อาจจะไม่ใช่ปัญหามากนัก เพราะภาษา html เป็นภาษาที่อยู่ในรูปของ tag ที่ใช้เพื่อการแสดงผลและดูเข้าใจได้ไม่ยากเหมือนภาษาอื่นที่มีคำสั่งในการดำเนินงานค่อนข้างมาก แต่สำหรับผู้ที่ไม่คุ้นเคยอาจต้องใช้การสังเกตที่มากหน่อยในตอนเริ่มต้น
ท่านอาจจะไม่คุ้นชินกับภาษา html ในครั้งแรก แต่ถ้าได้ดูผ่านตาบ่อยๆ ก็จะจับจุดได้ว่าส่วนไหนเป็นส่วนของ Tag ที่ใช้บอกข้อมูลแก่ Web Browser ส่วนไหนเป็นส่วนที่ใช้ในการแสดงผล เนื่องจาก Course เรียนนี้พยายามทำให้ง่ายและอธิบายโดยละเอียดพอสมควรเพื่อให้ท่านสามารถแก้ไข Landing Page ได้ด้วยตนเอง

courses.description:
Master Conversational AI Art with Google AI Studio
Are you frustrated that your AI characters look different every time?
Tired of writing long, complicated prompts just to get the results you want?
What if you could talk to your AI art tool like a creative partner—guiding it step by step to design consistent, professional-quality images?
That’s exactly what you’ll learn in this masterclass.
Nano Banana is the codename for Google’s groundbreaking Gemini 2.5 Flash image model—a tool that lets you create and edit stunning visuals through natural, conversational prompts. And this course is your complete roadmap to mastering it.
This isn’t a theory-heavy course. This is 100% hands-on and project-based. By the end, you’ll have built a professional portfolio of 10+ real-world projects and gained practical expertise with one of the most powerful creative AI tools on the planet.
What You’ll Learn
Conversational AI Art – Go beyond basic prompting and learn iterative design: building complex scenes step by step with simple follow-up instructions.
True Character Consistency – Unlock proven techniques to design characters that stay consistent across different poses, moods, and scenes.
Nano Banana Mastery – Understand how the Gemini 2.5 Flash model works inside Google AI Studio and what makes it different from tools like Imagen.
Advanced Prompt Engineering – Learn how to write strong initial prompts that set a rock-solid foundation for characters, objects, and environments.
Real-World Workflows – Apply AI to branding, product design, fashion, and more.
target_audience: Artists & Illustrators looking to perfect character consistency and collaborate with AI as a creative partner.
Graphic Designers & Marketers who need original, high-quality content for branding, campaigns, and advertising.

Entrepreneurs & Product Designers aiming to prototype and showcase ideas quickly and effectively.
AI Enthusiasts ready to move beyond simple generation and master an innovative, next-level workflow.

courses.title: ERFOLGREICH FERNSEH-KRIMIS SCHREIBEN
courses.bio: Nimm dir Zeit für deinen Durchbruch zum Unterhaltungsautor
objectives: Du wirst Krimis von Thrillern und Crime unterscheiden – und so gezielt Geschichten schreiben können, die wirklich packen.
Du wirst aus jeder Umgebung ein spannendes Motiv spinnen und daraus eine fesselnde Vorgeschichte erschaffen können.
Du wirst komplexe Handlungen bauen – mit Leiche, Verdacht, falschen Spuren und einer überraschenden Auflösung.
Du wirst Ermittler, Partner und Verdächtige so lebendig einsetzen können, dass Spannung und Dynamik entstehen.
Du wirst Beweise deuten, Figuren zum Reden bringen und Täter so überführen können, dass dein Publikum atemlos folgt.
Du wirst eigene Krimis verfassen können, die originell sind und selbst hartgesottene Genre-Fans nicht mehr loslassen.

KRIMI - zwei Geschichten in einer: Warum der Ermittler immer als letztes in die Fantasie des Autoren treten muss
VORGESCHICHTE - Gegenstand der Entdeckun: Frische Umgebung als Voraussetzung und Quelle nachgefragter Krimi-Geschichten
Die "Leiter des Mörders" als Mittel zur Schöpfung spannender Ausgangsbilder
Was der Täter alles unternehmen kann, um den Verdacht von sich zu lenken
Fehler und Pannen, die dem Täter das Genick brechen können
HANDLUNG - Nachbildung der Vorgeschichte: Welche Teile der Vergangenheit vor allem wiederhergestellt werden müssen
Die Mittel der Wiederherstellung vergangener Sachverhalte
Wie man Leute zum Reden bringt
Wie ein Ermittler Geständnisse erwirken kann
THRILLER - die halbe Leiter des Mörders: Der Feigling und seine Selbstrettung als Thema des Thrillers

requirements: Dieser Kurs richtet sich an Anfänger:innen. Du brauchst keinerlei Vorkenntnisse, keine speziellen Skills, Tools oder Equipment. Alles, was du mitbringen solltest, ist Neugier – und vielleicht die Fähigkeit, lesen und schreiben zu können.
Es hilft wahrscheinlich , den ein oder anderen Krimi im Fernsehen oder auf der Leinwand gesehen haben.
courses.description:
Das Erfolgsformat im deutschen Fernsehen heißt Krimi.
Doch er ist zugleich die schwierigste Erzählform – mit dem kritischsten Publikum. In diesem Kurs lernst du, wie man sie meistert.
Du wirst verstehen, wie Vorder- und Hintergrundhandlungen ineinandergreifen: Was wann geschieht, wie es ans Licht kommt und welche Rolle falsche Fährten spielen.
Du entdeckst, warum die Vergangenheit im Krimi stets neu erscheint – mal richtig, mal falsch – und wie daraus Spannung entsteht.
Du lernst, das Stammpersonal von Ermittlern, Partnern und Fachleuten gezielt einzusetzen – und wie „Gäste“ und das Umfeld die Geschichte tragen.
Du erfährst, warum Rückblenden tabu sind, wieso es mindestens zwei Ermittler braucht, und wie Tatzeit, Alibi und Motiv das Gerüst der Erzählung bilden.
Du übst, Krimis praktisch zu entwickeln: vom Opfer, das wir zuerst kennenlernen, über die „Leiter des Mörders“ bis zum Ermittler, der zuletzt die Bühne betritt.
Mit diesem Kurs erhältst du eine klare Anleitung und eine „Rezept-Sammlung“ für deinen Durchbruch zum erfolgreichen Krimiautor. Dabei wird Theorie direkt mit Beispielen verbunden, sodass du sofort erkennst, wie Profis arbeiten – aber auch wie du selbst Schritt für Schritt Geschichten entwickelst, die dein Publikum nicht mehr loslassen. Am Ende wirst du nicht nur Strukturen verstehen, sondern auch Vertrauen in deine eigene erzählerische Stimme gewinnen.
target_audience: Wenn du schon immer Krimis schreiben wolltest, aber nicht wusstest, wie du den Einstieg findest – hier bekommst du die Rezepte für deinen Durchbruch.

requirements: No prerequisites for taking this course
courses.description:
In the realm of casting, there are so many processes from casting industrials, television, and film to meeting with actors, reading scripts, and negotiating with producers. This class is for anyone planning to work within the casting profession and also gives tremendous perspective to anyone that wants to enter the entertainment industry. In addition to casting agents, it is recommended for actors, talent agents, managers, producers, and all others that work in conjunction with the casting process.

Industry Expert
Toni Suttie Casting Director
As President of Integrity Casting, Toni Suttie has over 25  years experience in Hollywood castings.   With over 250 feature film, commercial, television, industrial,  live event, and trade show castings, she has  become a sought after expert for workshops, lectures, and speaking engagements  around the country.   Toni is the writer  of the book Slate Please: The Ultimate  Actors Guide to Audition Preparation.   She also has established the exclusive Elite Mentoring Program for  actors.
Her credits include films such as Love Ranch (Joe Pesci, Helen Mirren), Beverly Hills Cop III (Eddie Murphy), and Made in America (Will Smith, Whoopi Goldberg).  Corporate video castings include those for  Microsoft, Kaiser Permanente, IBM, and CompUSA and television castings for The Apprentice, Beverly Hills 90210, and Ellen  DeGeneres Show.  Toni has also  produced and/or cast events for celebrity talent such as Carmen Electra, Andy  Dick, Mario Van Peebles, and Pamela Anderson.
target_audience: Actors
Aspiring Casting Directors
Those aspiring to work in production
Entertainment Industry Enthusiast

1. Welcome to our journey: Is this the right course for you?
Pixelmator vs Photoshop? Or you want to ditch Photoshop and marry Pixelmator?

requirements: A working copy of Pixelmator ($30) – one of the best photo editing software for Mac.
8 hours without Facebook, Instagram, Whatsapp, Youtube, cuddling your dog etc.
No previous editing experience is needed.
courses.description:
ARE YOU AT THE RIGHT PLACE?

Are you tired of digging through Photoshop’s complex tutorials that "take forever to get it done” and you still “can’t get it”?
Do you want a simple way to enhance your photos or more practically, design your social media picture without spending money for ad agency or taking a week-long photo editing course?
Are you a Mac user who loves photography, or an Instagram person and want to learn to edit photos effortlessly?
If you answer Yes then this is the course for you!
Join me to a 8 hour virtual journey in which I hold your hand and take you from a Photoshop-averse photo-editing wannabe to a confident power editor of pictures and a proficient master of graphics. With all the skills set learn, you will be in best place to jump start your creative projects, either as a hobby, or freelancing or even a big career change!


SO WHY ME?

Just like you, I started out fighting my way through the Photoshop’s jungles.
The software is not designed for beginners. It’s for high level people in graphic industry.
It’s powerful, but its complex interface and non-intuitive functions quickly turned me off.
Too many options, too many tools, too many small little boxes!
I like photography, and I want to get the idea of how the picture should be in my head quickly presented on the monitor screen.
I like things that is simple.
I want to pay an affordable price to use the software, and not get stuck with Creative Cloud’s subscription forever and fork out $10 per month for features 70% of which I would never use.
I was almost lost for a while researching for another better and easier way.
I found out about Pixelmator. I paid $30 for it. I never look back.
I have played with Pixelmator, tried to understand how it works.
And I have ultimately taken all trial and errors of Pixelmator for you and packaged it into a bite sized, easy to follow course that you can learn to jump start your editing skills from zero to pro level in only 8 hours!

I am not a professional designer. I am a graduate student from a business school. I am starting my own business.
Just like you, I am starting out, and I know for a fact that photo editing is an useful skill that is important in this media dominated world.

In my lessons, I use a simple language style so you are not inundated with unnecessarily complicated jargons. I have been there and done that, and I have simplified everything for you.


AND WHY PIXELMATOR?
It is a good alternative to Adobe Photoshop for Mac users. If you are a Mac person, you like simplicity. Pixelmator is about simplicity.

It’s a fairly light app to quickly edit graphic images with its robust built in effects, tools, textures to help editors bring their imagination to paper.
Thanks to its design simplicity and clean interface, it cuts the usual Photoshop learning curve down a tons, making it super easy for someone without a lot of Photoshop knowledge to crank out some good looking photos.
You do not need high end powerhouse with a tons of hidden features to it photos like a pro. At the end of the day, who cares which photo editing apps you use.
You need to get your photos done and shining that you are proud of, without too much complexity and headache.


WHAT MAKES THIS COURSE DIFFERENT?
-You will understand and practice the basics to advances of photo editing with Pixelmator in a matter of 8 hours (a working day), not weeks or months to get around the basics with Photoshop. All technical details that are not needed to get maximum results are left out.

-Unlike other photo editing courses in general or Pixelmator courses in specific, you will not learn concepts and tools separately (one per video). In this course, you get to focus on practical cases where several editing tools are grouped and introduced at the same time, so you can learn those tools quickly and see the differences in terms of the final image immediately.
-Each lessons build up in terms of difficulty, but can be watched separately in any order and at your own pace
-Built-in guide boxes in each lesson show clearly which keyboard shortcuts to hit, which tools or effects are used. You do not need written cheat sheets, as these guide boxes are already added along the way for you.
-This course is taught in an unscripted way, and show you after each step real small problems you may come along when editing and quickly show you the fastest work around.
-Support files that include all photos used in the course and brief introduction files to content of the lessons are included so you can follow along in the hands-on lessons
-Instructor support: I answer to most questions within 24 hours.


WHAT WILL YOU LEARN?
-How to jump start your photo editing conquest without getting lost (It's hard to get lost in Pixelmator): navigate the interface, customize palette, open/create new file, print, save, export, share, turn on ruler, grid, guides
- How to not let layers and masks (they are simple!) scare you: learn dynamics of (clipped) masking and stacked layering and blending modes to create a show-through look, apply color adjustment to a specific part of an image, on a specific layer, correct blown out or overexposed area, create a gallery canvas, create a music event's poster, create a simple fading text box, fix crooked photos, create a realistic vignette and creamy bokeh look,…
- How to select precisely parts of images you want to edit: understand modes of selection, refine/deselect/reselect/invert selection, selection based on shape and color
- How to use painting tools to create pattern, icon and painting: how to draw with pen, explore cool brushes, create your own brushes, understand settings, use various painting tools,…
- How to use vector shape to create graphics like a pro: get familiar with common shapes and create a chat mobile application icon from shapes
- How to make your text stunning quickly: bring more texture and depth, stylize text
- How to remove unwanted part in your images QUICKLY: remove any parts, not least red eyes area
- How to distort certain parts of your image in a purposeful way: stylize images, generate pattern from images, soften edges, create a wet painting look, quickly sharpen,…
- How to master using colors so you can tweak them effortlessly: tonal and color balance, tonal range, color vibrancy, colorization, masking, adjust saturation, hue,…
- How to draw viewers to the main object of the image: create a focal point, create a miniaturize effect
- How to retouch portrait photos like a pro: reduce wrinkles, smoothen skin, boost colour vibrancy, create a soft focus look, with advanced blending of light effects
- How to create special cool "looks" that you are proud of: selective black & white, blueprint magazine cover, multiple exposure, comic look, authentic vintage, artificial HDR, high vibrancy, blockbuster movie, dreamy retro look, decoupage look, customized sepia look, composite background


WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR?
Don’t wait any longer.
Join me and other fellow students and start your creative journey by exploring the nuggets inside Pixelmator, an amazingly powerful photo editing software!
target_audience: Learn easy photo editing skill sets that make you confident, even if you are forced to use another editing software.
Web designers and developers who wants to edit banner, ads, icons, logos quickly without a big learning curve.
Social media manager who creates social media pictures, covers on a regular basis.
Marketing professionals who work in small companies or startups who are tasked with creating brochures, posters, flyers and do not have budget for ad agency.

Small entrepreneurs or startup owners who want to take control of their brand designs, and do not want to pay $50-$200 for professional services to simply get their portraits cropped, straightened, boosted in color, corrected for skin blemishes,.. all of which, and even more, can be done in less than 10 minutes.
Freelancers who just start out and want to improve photo editing skills to get a better rate.
If you are at beginner level or know nothing about Pixelmator or photo editing, this is the ultimate course for you to get into proficiency!
If you are at intermediate level, you will pick up certain fine editing techniques (such as layering, masking, tone blending) and quick workflows to achieve a same result that may get you surprised.

If you are at advanced level, there should not be too much new techniques that you can get from this course. You may want to check other in-depth courses on Udemy that go deeper into smaller topics of photo editing.

It’s been said many times in many ways, “the most effective way to learn to write is to WRITE.”In this class, writing is what you’ll do.
As with most things in life, writing for any venue takes a lot of practice.
There is, however, another element, one which is elusive.As Somerset Maughm said, “there are three rules for writing the novel.Unfortunately no one knows what they are.”This kind of leaves the field wide open and since, as any writer will tell you, anything one tells you may be countermanded by another writer’s method, it’s all about finding your own voice.
So this particular course is designed for those who are already writing or wish to write a romance novel.

courses.title: Journalism Baby Steps #1: Elements of Journalism
courses.bio: To Dive Into Journalism, Start Here: News, Journalists, Elements of News, News Beats, and Information Resources
objectives: Define news
Briefly describe what a journalist, reporter, anchor, photojournalist, feature writer and editor do.
Define newsworthy
Understand the ten elements of news
Define the beat system, understand what makes a good beat reporter and understand how stories are assigned using assignment sheets.
You'll have an idea of where to find sources.
requirements: A positive attitude.
An interest and desire to learn.
courses.description:
Welcome to this short and simple introductory course—the perfect starting point for anyone interested in the world of journalism! Whether you’re considering a career in the media, are a student of journalism, or simply want to understand how the news industry works, this course will give you a clear and accessible foundation. This course serves as the first in a series of courses about journalism, gradually building your knowledge as you progress.
In just a few concise lectures, you’ll get a taste of the fundamentals of journalism:


Lecture 1 introduces you to the core concept of news, providing a straightforward definition and helping you understand what sets news apart from other kinds of information.
Lecture 2 explores the essential roles within the newsroom, including the reporter, anchor, photojournalist, feature writer, and editor. You’ll discover what each of these professionals does, how they contribute to the news process, and what skills are most important in their daily work.


Moving forward, the next part of the course delves deeper into what makes a story truly newsworthy:


Lecture 3 explains the meaning of “newsworthy” and breaks down the key elements that make a story worth reporting. You’ll learn about criteria such as timeliness, significance, proximity, and human interest, gaining insight into how journalists decide what stories to cover.
Lecture 4 introduces the “beat system”, a classic method by which newsrooms organize coverage and assign journalists to specific topics or areas. You’ll see how beats help ensure comprehensive and specialized reporting, as well as how they can help journalists develop expertise and trusted sources.


As the course wraps up, you’ll receive a brief overview of some of the many resources that journalists rely on to gather accurate and up-to-date information. From public records and press releases to digital databases and interviews, you’ll see just how varied and resourceful journalists need to be.
Finally, the course closes with a reminder that journalism is not just a job, but a calling that requires dedication, ongoing research, and a significant commitment of time and effort. You’ll gain a realistic sense of the challenges and rewards of working in this fast-paced and ever-evolving field.
By the end of this introductory course, you will:


Have a basic understanding of what news is and why it matters
Know the different types of journalists and what they do
Grasp the concept of newsworthiness and the main elements that shape a news story
Be familiar with the beat system and its role in the newsroom
Appreciate the range of resources journalists use and the importance of diligent research


This course is designed to be approachable for beginners, with clear explanations and practical examples. If you’re curious about journalism or thinking of pursuing further studies, this is the ideal place to begin your journey. Get ready to dive into the fascinating world of news and storytelling!
target_audience: Professional Journalists
Aspiring Journalists
Personal Interest Learners

courses.title: Podcasting 101 - Launch your Podcast for FREE on Buzzsprout!
courses.bio: Master the art of podcasting and start your own podcast channel in 2021. FREE Podcast Production Masterclass!

Start your own podcast TODAY!: 10 reasons why you should start a podcast

requirements: No requirements needed
Just a good internet connection
A microphone and webcam for recording (Optional)
courses.description:
There are two big questions you need to ask yourself here, and they're joined at the hip. First…
1. What's Your Podcast For?
So firstly, why do you want to make a podcast?
Are you a freelancer? A business? Or a marketing manager? If so, you might have identified podcasting as a great way to build authority, and provide your customers and target audience with valuable and entertaining content.
Or are you looking at podcasting from a hobbyist perspective? This might mean you'll be creating a show in your spare time. And the subject will be something that you're passionate about.
In either case, you can identify your “why” here. That's important to keep in mind, so that you can stay motivated, even when you're finding it difficult to get a show out.
Next, what about your “who”?


2. Who is Your Podcast For?
So first day, get the big question in: Who are you making this podcast for?
The thing is, unless you know exactly who you’re making your show for, and why you’re doing it, you’ve got no chance of growing an audience.
If you're coming at it from a business point of view, and you're (for example) a personal trainer who wants to make a health and fitness podcast, then your target audience might be people who are interested in healthy eating, weight loss, exercise, or bodybuilding.
So once you know who you want to reach, how do you reach them?
You need to give people a reason to listen.
This means creating content that they will get something out of when they hit play.
target_audience: Anyone interested in learning about podcasting

Being the CEO of iOgrapher, and well, having unrestricted access to all the amazing filmmaking cases and accessories also made for absolutely interesting times. For old Wirecast users, there is no need to go on and on about the amazing features of Wirecast. Hey, you already know. So, even if you are used to the app, you still need to sign up to my comprehensive training to get a total grasp on the software, and utilize it to amazing effects. Well, apart from the inherent fun, and well, the joy of being appreciated for executing perfect presentations, livestreaming or recordings; with Wirecast, you can infuse professionalism and polish into your broadcast with transitions, live switching, lower thirds, titles, and a host of other features. Apart from this, streaming to integrated streaming services becomes easy with the use of the built-in multi format encoding capabilities. By using Wirecast, you can professionally livestream your services, events, lectures, workshops, interviews, concerts, and conferences, switching cameras to amazing effect.
If you are really serious about Wirecast 7 and injecting a much needed professionalism and ease into your projects, then you need to learn to effectively and maximally use the software. What are you waiting for? Sign up for the Zero to Hero video training course now.

courses.description:
This course will help you quickly master the skills you need to produce high quality video to use in your business, blog or social media. It is designed specifically for business owners meaning it is jargon free and tightly focused to cover all the key components of production in just three hours of training.
The course is divided into 9 tutorials that cover the following topics:


1. Planning for filming session.
2. Effective use of the camera
3. Sound recording and choosing the right environments for audio.
4.  Lighting with both artificial and natural light.
5. Presentation skills and camera confidence.
6. Video editing tips and techniques.
7. Uploading content to the web.


My name is David and I'm a qualified tutor with over ten years teaching experience at graduate level. I have also run my own video production business for nearly 10 years.
At the end of this course you will be able to produce low cost, professional videos that will help you build a convincing online presence or brand.


Please note that this course was produce over 7 years ago and whilst the core skills for video production haven't changed much, some of the technology and processes have evolved.


For this reason the course has been reduced to the lowest paid tier.
target_audience: This course is for business owners and entrepreneurs.

This course is not for advanced film makers.

courses.description:
Unlock the future of filmmaking with our comprehensive course, "AI-Powered Short Film Creation: From Script to Screen." This cutting-edge program guides you through the entire process of creating a captivating short film using artificial intelligence tools and techniques.
Course Overview:
In this journey, you'll learn to harness the power of AI to bring your creative vision to life. Starting with script, you'll craft a compelling story and develop engaging characters. You'll then use AI-powered image generation tools to create stunning visuals, transforming them into dynamic videos with AI-driven video creation software.


Key Topics:


1. Scriptwriting: Creating or choosing engaging stories and defining characters
2. Image Generation: Creating visuals with AI-powered tools
3. Video Creation: Bringing images to life with AI-driven video software
5. Music Selection: Choosing the perfect soundtrack with AI-powered composition tools
6. Video Editing: Editing & Exporting your film


Course Benefits:


- Learn to leverage AI tools to streamline your creative process
- Develop a comprehensive understanding of short film production
- Create stunning visuals and videos
- Bring your unique story to life with AI-driven filmmaking


Who Should Take This Course:


- Filmmakers and content creators looking to leverage AI in their workflow
- Writers and directors interested in exploring new storytelling techniques
- Artists and designers seeking to expand their skillset in AI-powered visual creation
- Anyone passionate about filmmaking and eager to learn the latest AI-driven techniques


Course Format:


By the end of this course, you'll have:
- Created a captivating short film using AI-powered tools and techniques
- Developed a comprehensive understanding of the filmmaking process
- Mastered AI-driven creative skills to enhance your storytelling


Enroll now and unlock the full potential of AI-powered short film creation!

requirements: 特になし
courses.description:
こんにちは、AKIRAといいます。私は、関西の大手電機メーカーに永年勤務し、2024年7月に定年退職しました。企画部門をマネージャーとして担当した期間が長く、マイクロソフト系のソフトを使用し様々なビジネス文書を作成しました。在職中はビジネス文書のマンネリ化や作成効率の悪さを課題として感じていましたが、具体的な解決策がなく同じツールを使い続けていました。

プレゼン資料作成においては、納期が短いなか、何となく制作を始めて途中で構成の変更の必要性に気づき一からやり直したりしたことも何度とあります。デザインを工夫しようとしても限界があり妥協して資料を完成させていました。

退職後、自営業として生成AIを集中して探究しているとAIネイティブで文書をゼロから作成し、後で人間が必要な個所を修正していく流れが効率がよいと気づかされました。

AI時代をむかえ、プレゼン資料の作成も新しい方法に切り替える時期にきていると考えます。このコースでは、私がフルパワーで探究してきた生成AIの活用方法を解説します。


このコースは、プレゼン資料作成に悩むビジネスマンの負担を軽減し、より効果的なプレゼンを実現するために作成しました。AIツールを活用することで、時間と労力を大幅に削減し、クオリティの高い資料を制作することが可能です。

複数の生成AIを組み合わせで使用することで効率があがります。ChatGPTはスライドの構成案をロジカルに提案してくれ、Felo、Gammaやイルシルはビジュアルなデザインでスライドを自動で作成してくれます。パワーポイントへのデータ移行も簡単です。

フォントとか飾りとかでデザインに凝りたければCanvaという直感で操作できるデザインツールで修正できます。又、Feloは、検索AIツールですが企画調査からビジュアルなスライド作成まで一括でおこなうことが可能です。
ぜひこのコースで、AIツールを駆使したプレゼン資料作成スキルを身につけて、ビジネスの成功につなげてください。


■コースを受講することで…
・プレゼン資料作成の時間を50%以上削減することができる。
・スライド作成のスピードアップとデザイン力向上を両立する方法を知れる。
・各生成AIツールの強みを生かした活用方法を学べる。
・論理的で説得力のあるプレゼン構成で、聴衆の共感と行動を促す。
・プレゼン資料作成スキルを向上させ、社内での評価を高めキャリアアップにつなげる。


■こんな方が受講に向いています）
・プレゼン資料作成を効率化したい
・資料作成に自信がなくAIの力を借りたい
・パワーポイント作成に時間がかかる
・デザインに自信がない
・AIの活用の仕方がわからない
・突然の短納期のプレゼン資料作成に困っている


■このコースは全部で10セクションです。
セクション１：はじめに
セクション２: なぜAIツールを使う必要があるのか？
セクション３：プレゼン資料作成の全体的な流れと使用する各AIツールの概要と特徴
セクション４ : アカウントの作成から初期設定、立ち上げまで

セクション５：Feloで企画調査からスライド作成まで一括作業
セクション６：Gammaで美しいスライドを自動作成
セクション７：イルシルでスライド構成と上質なデザイン自動作成
セクション８：ChatGPTでプレゼン構成案を効率的に作成
セクション９：Canvaでビジュアル強化
セクション１０：まとめと参考情報

全部で2時間23分のコースです。
その他、必要に応じてワークシートが用意されています。ワークシートに沿って実践していただくことで、AIを活用したプレゼン資料の作成を進めることができます。

■最後に
本コースに興味をもっていただいた方は、「コース登録」へ進んでください。もっと検討したい方は、プレビューで講座の一部が見れますので、是非講座を覗いてみてください。
それでは、コースのなかでお会いできることを楽しみにしています！
target_audience: プレゼン資料を効率的に作成したい人
最新のAIツール（Gamma/イルシル）を使ってプレゼン資料作成したい人
企画調査から資料作成までをAIツール（Felo）で一括でおこないたい人

courses.description:
Quer aprender a criar imagens e animações incríveis, geradas por IA, de forma simples e eficiente sem gastar dinheiro?


Se sim, este curso é tudo o que você precisa para dominar o Leonardo AI!


Use suas criações para ilustrar produtos, criar apresentações impactantes, aumentar seu arsenal de ferramentas de design e criação de arte digital, ou simplesmente divirta-se criando o que você quiser!


Domine o uso das inovadoras ferramentas de criação de Arte e Design usando Inteligência Artificial Generativa!

Leonardo AI é uma poderosa ferramenta baseada no Stable Diffusion, para criação de qualquer tipo de imagem digital.


Diferente do Stable Diffusion, que demanda muito estudo e customização para criar as imagens que você quer de forma rápida, o Leonardo AI oferece workflows eficientes, permitindo criar imagens incríveis em pouco tempo.


Este curso oferecerá oportunidades incríveis para expandir seus horizontes criativos, seja você um artista digital, fotógrafo, designer ou um amante da criatividade visual.


Tenha acesso imediato a:
Vídeo aulas produzidas profissionalmente por um instrutor quase 400 mil alunos online.
Exemplos práticos da aplicação do conhecimento do curso.
Suporte premium caso tenha alguma dúvida.
Acesso vitalício ao curso e as atualizações semanais.


Seu Instrutor:
Professor Paulo Andrade é Professor Universitário e Coordenador de Graduação. Coordenou, durante mais de 15 anos, graduações e pós-graduações nas áreas de:
Design Gráfico;
Design de Animação;
Animação 3D;
Cinema e Audiovisual;
Produção Audiovisual.
Além de ter uma carreira acadêmica de sucesso, o Professor Paulo Andrade é Doutor em Computação e por criou mais de 70 cursos online que já impactaram mais de 400 mil alunos em mais de 150 países.


Não perca tempo!
Saia na frente na criação de arte digital!

Are you ready to set your YouTube channel on an unstoppable trajectory of growth, skyrocketing your views and subscribers to unprecedented heights? Welcome to the "Explosive YouTube Growth Blueprint: Catapult Your Channel Views and Subscribers in 2023." This isn't just a course; it's your launchpad to becoming a YouTube sensation.
Ignite Virality, Command Authority:
Imagine having a YouTube channel that not only captures attention but commands authority in your niche. In this dynamic course, we'll unveil the strategies that propel videos to viral status, positioning you as an influential figure while exponentially expanding your viewer base.
Strategic Content Domination:
Gain mastery over content creation that not only captivates but converts. Discover the art of creating videos that leave viewers eagerly hitting the subscribe button and anxiously waiting for your next upload. Learn how to hook, engage, and mesmerize your audience from the very first second.
Leverage the Power of Trends:
Stay ahead of the curve by harnessing the energy of trending topics and capitalizing on viral challenges. We'll show you how to seamlessly integrate trends into your content, ensuring your channel remains at the forefront of what's buzzing.
Audience Magnetization Tactics:
Learn the techniques that magnetize viewers to your channel, turning casual viewers into dedicated subscribers. Unearth the secrets to fostering genuine connections, sparking conversations, and building an active community around your content.
Monetization Mastery:
Monetization is not just a goal; it's a stepping stone to full-time YouTube success. We'll guide you through diverse revenue streams, from ad revenue to merchandise, sponsorships to premium content, enabling you to turn your passion into a thriving income source.
Data-Driven Triumph:
Dive deep into analytics and decode the numbers that matter. Our data-driven insights will empower you to optimize your strategy for maximum growth. Uncover the hidden gems in your metrics, refine your approach, and watch your channel explode.
Exclusive Access to 2023's Innovations:
Stay ahead of the game with exclusive insights into the latest YouTube algorithms, features, and best practices. Our up-to-the-minute updates ensure you're equipped to capitalize on every opportunity this year offers.
Join the Elite Circle:
Be part of an elite community of creators who are turning their passion into profits. Connect, collaborate, and share your journey with fellow learners, fostering a support network that propels everyone to greatness.
Get ready to defy expectations, break through plateaus, and blaze a trail of YouTube success that's uniquely yours. Our industry experts will guide you step by step, providing insider knowledge that's been tested and proven in the dynamic landscape of 2023.
Enroll now and let's ignite the YouTube revolution together. Remember, the spotlight is waiting – it's time to claim it.
(Course enrollment includes lifetime access, real-time updates, and a satisfaction guarantee.)
Secure Your Spot
Please note that this course focuses on legitimate strategies for growing your YouTube channel and engaging with your audience in 2023. It does not endorse any unethical practices or shortcuts.

courses.title: Thriving in an AI future
courses.bio: Leaning into the opportunity with a firm foundation and clear eyes
objectives: See the scale and impact of upcoming career shifts due to AI
Embrace an attitude shift from tasks to projects
Learn to put AI to work for you instead of working for AI
Shift your mindset

Shifting our thinking about AI: Tasks are overrated (and change is certain)
Value creation and the power of the impresario
Data changes everything and the data is changing
Answering your questions: Q&A part 1: attitude shifts, a practice and assets
QA part 2: Enrollment and making things better
Building a practice that doesn't include AI

requirements: This is perfect for people who are beginners, which when it comes to AI, is all of us.
courses.description:
Seth Godin has been living on the cutting edge of media and technology for more than forty years. In this short and powerful course (more of a rant, actually) he'll share an attitude shift that's open to each of us.


AI is coming, faster than any powerful technology in human history. It's natural and appropriate to be hesitant and even fearful, but once again, this shift is going to create a gap.


Right here and right now, we each have a chance to lean into the opportunity that the change offers us.


Instead of tips and tricks, this lecture takes you through the building blocks of shifting your approach to AI.


Either you work for AI or it works for you.


And working for AI is no fun.


When the internet was new, people thought it was a sideshow. The early projects weren't of much import, but as it became clear that something real was happening, sites like Amazon, Yahoo and Google arrived. All of these were tiny at first, just a few people chasing a big idea.


AI is more decentralized than this. You don't need venture capital or a building or a team. All that's needed is access to tools (which is already happening--if you can read this you already have the tools) and a shift in our attitude.


That's where this course comes in. All the courses in the world about the tactics and tech of AI are worthless if we're not ready to embrace the change that they bring.


There's a very brief window of time. In this moment, right here and right now, some folks are eagerly starting projects, building assets and creating values. Others, in a pattern we've seen again and again, are waiting, fearfully, ignoring what's happening and hoping for the best.


You can do this. Right here, right now. Make a ruckus.
target_audience: Freelancers, entrepreneurs, shift workers, project managers, impresarios, artists and creators.

courses.description:
You are looking to self-publish your first book or E-Book or you actually have just written your first manuscript and you are wondering how to get it published and how to promote it and make money from it once the publication process has been completed. That is exactly why this book was written. Self-publishing the first time can be a daunting task, but this book will give you step by step instructions on how to get the job done and it will outline to you both different publishing options that you have and also various marketing strategies that you can employ to effectively get people looking at and thinking about your book.

For the couple of dollars this book will cost you, you will get literally hundreds of dollars of value. So if getting a book published and promoted is something you desire to do, buying this book to assist you is pretty much a no-brainer.
This is a course that will take you approximately two hours to complete.  it is built primarily as a Microsoft PowerPoint lecture series with an audio overlay and published as videos.
This is a course you should take if you are even thinking about writing a book and self-publishing it as just by taking it, you will become much more comfortable about undertaking the work ahead of you.  The course will give you a road map to follow to get the job done and it will remove most fears and anxieties about starting in the first place if you have some.  If you are going ahead with this project, this road map will guide you to a successful conclusion so be sure to check it out.
See you on the inside.
Best wishes,
Dan Grijzenhout - Course Creator
target_audience: Anyone interested in self-publishing a book and earning revenue from it who has not done this before should consider taking this course. It will walk you through the things you need to do to succeed.

courses.description: تُركز الدورة على تعليم التمييز بين التعليق الصوتي والتمثيل الصوتي، مع إتقان تقنيات الإسقاط الصوتي وتسجيل الأصوات المتنوعة في مجالات مثل الكتب الصوتية والرسوم المتحركة وتمثيل الألعاب. تشمل الدورة أيضًا فهم العناصر الأساسية التي تجعل الكتاب الصوتي مميزًا واحترافيًا، وتعلم كيفية تحديد الأجور وصياغة العقود بشكل فعّال في مجال التعليق الصوتي. بالإضافة إلى ذلك، تقدم الدورة تدريباً عملياً على تقنيات تنظيم التنفس وتحقيق بيئة تسجيل مثالية لضمان تقديم أداء صوتي سلس واحترافي. يتم استعراض برنامج Audacity بشكل سريع، مما يمكن المتدربين من تسجيل وتحرير الصوت بكفاءة. كما يتناول البرنامج كيفية التفكير في المستمع الفردي لإيصال الرسالة الصوتية بوضوح وفعالية. يتم أيضاً تدريب المتدربين على إحياء الشخصيات صوتيًا، وتصحيح الأخطاء الصوتية، مع تقديم نماذج عملية لأعمال احترافية لاكتساب الخبرة العملية والتعرف على أفضل الممارسات في المجال. بالإضافة إلى ذلك، تشمل الدورة استراتيجيات لتسويق الذات وبناء محفظة أعمال قوية، مما يساعد المتدربين على التميز في السوق التنافسية وتحقيق النجاح في مجال التعليق الصوتي. كما يتضمن البرنامج فرصًا للتفاعل مع محترفين في المجال وتلقي توجيهات شخصية لتحسين الأداء. سيتمكن المتدربون أيضًا من تحسين مهاراتهم في إدارة مشاريعهم الصوتية وتوسيع شبكة علاقاتهم المهنية، مما يعزز فرصهم في الحصول على مشاريع جديدة وتوسيع نطاق عملهم في هذا المجال المتنامي. تهدف الدورة إلى تزويد المتدربين بكل المهارات والمعرفة اللازمة لتحقيق النجاح في عالم التعليق الصوتي.
target_audience: المبتدئين الذين يرغبون في دخول مجال التعليق الصوتي واكتساب المهارات الأساسية.
أي شخص لديه شغف بالصوتيات ويرغب في تحسين أدائه وتطوير مسيرته في هذا المجال.
الأفراد المهتمين بتعلم تقنيات إنتاج وتسجيل الصوت وتحقيق جودة احترافية في مشاريعهم الصوتية.

courses.title: Sonorização e automação para rádios
courses.bio: Softwares de automação e equipamentos
objectives: Panorama atual do rádio

Curso de sonorização e automação para rá: Módulo 04 - Softwares de automação para rádios

requirements: Não há pré-requisitos para iniciar este curso.
courses.description:
O curso de sonorização e automação para rádios é uma oportunidade aos estudantes de conhecerem toda estrutura técnica de uma rádio com uma linguagem simples e objetiva.
O que você irá aprender?
Setores de uma rádio, equipamentos (microfones, mesas de som, consoles), softwares de automação (players de áudio), edição básica de áudio (spot de rádio).
Esse curso é para quem tem afinidade pela área audiovisual e deseja atuar como locutor, técnico de áudio, sonoplasta ou em outros departamentos, e ter conhecimento abrangente de todos os setores que compõem o quadro técnico e administrativos de uma emissora de rádio.
Neste curso, formado por 5 módulos divididos por tópicos o aluno poderá determinar qual o assunto que irá estudar e repetir quantas vezes for necessário para um melhor entendimento e ainda consultar a apostila ilustrada com todo conteúdo.
O curso de sonorização e automação para rádios é uma excelente porta de entrada para um mercado que se reinventa com o passar do tempo, oferecendo oportunidades de trabalho aos mais diversos profissionais.
Objetivo
Ao final do curso o aluno terá conhecimento necessário para iniciar estudos mais específicos na área de radiodifusão e será capaz de fazer uma edição básica de áudio utilizando o Adobe Audition.
target_audience: Curso destinado a pessoas que querem dar início aos estudos em radiodifusão.

courses.description:
Zoom H6 Audio Recording Essentials explores many of the essential features and tools available within the Zoom H6 Recorder. As a podcast editor, producer, and host, I record all 3 of my shows using the Zoom H6 recorder. It's versatile, powerful, compact, and loaded with useful features. I liken it to a recording studio in the palm of your hand. This course will boost your confidence and increase your skills and knowledge in using the Zoom H6 recorder as part of your podcast or recording arsenal. There are no prerequisites for this course. This course consists of 26 lectures distributed across 2 sections:
Section One: Introduction to the Zoom H6
Section Two: Navigating the Zoom H6
In Section One, we spend our time getting familiar with the hardware side of the Zoom H6, the button layout, navigation techniques, and the detachable mic adapters. In Section Two, we turn our attention to the software side of the H6 as we navigate through the different display windows, turn features on and off, and learn the folder structure of the H6. It's in this section that we explore features of the H6 like phantom power, plugin power, SD card size types and limits, compression and limiters, updating the firmware, backup recordings, recording formats, the low-cut filter, recording in stereo, MS-RAW, using the H6 as a pass-thru mixer, and updating the firmware. NOTE: I am not affiliated with the fine folks at Zoom in any way. I have not been asked to endorse their product and I receive no compensation from them. I simply like this product which I've been using for over 4 years now and I wanted to dive deeper and teach a course on it. Thank you for your interest in this course and I hope to see you inside.

courses.title: Ultimate Way to Get Kindle Book Reviews... That Sell

courses.description:
8th course in the self-publishing series
Get the type of reviews that really sell books.
You've no doubt seen all the different methods for getting book reviews. Some are highly risky to your Amazon account. There are methods that promise a boat load of reviews in a short space of time.
All of these methods may well get you book reviews. However, there is a problem:
The resulting reviews are often not compelling.
I'm sure you've read these type of reviews. They are often written by someone who has not read the whole book. They probably had no personal interest in the content.
These reviews are not as convincing as a genuine reader review. It's the difference between someone bubbly over great a movie they enjoyed and another who hasn't watch it.
I too was seduced by the promise of these review methods. They usually involved some sort of inducement or persuasion to leave a review. In most cases, it was obvious the person had not read the whole book.
I mean: how can you genuinely recommend something you haven't read?
There are better ways. Since I've used them, the reviews have been much more persuasive in getting people to read my books. In this course, I will teach you these few simple tried and tested methods.
I will show you:
- Why reviews affect your book sales.
- Things you should never do that risk your Amazon account.
- Why forced reviews don't get persuasive reviews.
- The effective way to increase natural reviews.
- A great way to increase the usual review count.
- The highly  effective way to get reviews on new books.
- The key to five star reviews.
- How many reviews you really need. (This may surprise you.)
- How to improve your results from negative reviews.
- What never to do about negative reviews.
Enroll now and let me show you how to get the type of reviews that will increase your book sales.
target_audience: Self-published authors
Fiction authors
Non-fiction authors

courses.description:
Want to write a mystery/thriller/detective novel and publish in the quickest amount of time possible?
I thought so. ;)
Do you have an idea for a full length novel, but don't know where to start?
Do you want to write full-time, quit your day job, and follow your passion, but the dream seems so far away?
Have you ever said to yourself, I could write a novel but I don't want it to take me all year!
Oh man, you're so in the right spot.
I freaking get it.
See, I used to be in your shoes. Spending hours per day on writing and seeing little to no progress day after day. Staring at pages and pages of notes full of good ideas, but having virtually no idea what to do with them. Wishing I could write this darn novel already, but feeling overwhelmed at the investment of time and sacrifices to get there.
But then, things changed.
I developed a system - one that actually worked - in order to turn my ideas in a complete novel outline and eventual manuscript in the shortest amount of time. In less than a year, I was able to write 3 full length novel outlines and manuscripts. In less than two years, I had seven full length novel outlines and manuscripts.
Now, I've taken that system, a system used by Hollywood writer's for decades and compiled it into a step by step novel outline called Fiction Writing: A Complete Novel Outline Chapter by Chapter.
Brett Bacon published his book after taking this course and the genre will surprise you!
Brett took this course and published his first novel titled: The President's Neighbor: Comedy Script.
Yes, you read that right. It's a comedy and it's getting great reviews on Amazon! Go to Amazon and search for the title and you'll see Brett took this course and it was a success! Buy it while you're there ;) I did and its a great book, plus you can see how Brett built his story around this outline!
What this course is all about, my friends!

Announcing Fiction Writing: A Complete Novel Outline Chapter by Chapter

Forget about how to structure the plot. Don't worry about characters and subplot. Because once you know the outline secrets inside this exciting course, you'll never again have to deal with how to structure your book.
Why? Because this course is a detailed, step-by-step, chapter by chapter, no-fluff story arch that will show you exactly how to put that novel idea swirling around your head, to use. Just imagine:

Listen, if you're looking for some rehashed theory or a pile of fairy dust, this isn't it. But if you're ready to roll up your sleeves and find a surefire way to complete your novel outline, then this is the last course you'll ever need to get it done!

Hundreds of hours of study time!

毎月１００万円以上稼ぐような『ブラックランクアフィリエイター』は、日々どんなことを考えながらどんな作業をしているのでしょうか？


実は『記事を書くこと』以外にも、たくさんの工夫をしているんです。


アフィリエイターに与えられた時間はみんな同じ。同じ２４時間を『どう使うか』によって、アフィリエイトの結果に大きな差がつきます。


このコースは、ブラックランクアフィリエイターの野口が担当します。ブラックランクアフィリエイターとして何を考えどんな作業をしているのか、私の体験談を踏まえて解説していきます。


＜このコースで学習すること＞
・なぜブラックランクアフィリエイターになる必要があるのか
・ブラックランクアフィリエイターの全体像
・ASPと良い関係を構築する方法
・広告主と良い関係を構築する方法
・ジャンルNo.1になる方法
・ひとり３サイトを効率的に運営する方法
・コミュニティ化する方法
・マルチメディア戦略を実践する方法
・コンテンツの品質と一貫性を担保する方法
・トップアフィリエイターの基準値


＜注意点＞
・アフィリエイトの基礎やライティングの基礎は解説していません
・抽象的な『考え方』や『戦略』が多く出てきます
・学んで自分なりに考えて実践できる方が対象です
・アフィリエイト初心者には難しい内容が含まれます


せっかくアフィリエイトを始めたなら、トップアフィリエイターまで駆け上がってください。特別な才能は必要ありません。あなたにもできます！今日から、トップアフィリエイターへの道を歩み始めましょう。


では、コースのなかでお会いできることを楽しみにしています。

courses.title: "Write. Publish. Repeat" Conversations
courses.bio: The No-Luck Required Guide to Self-Publishing Success (updates and clarifications on the #1 bestselling writing book)
objectives: Make a living writing (HINT: it's about hard work and math, not luck!)
Avoid getting lumped in with the "self publishing ghetto" by taking a few small steps to look like a professional

requirements: You will need a means to write. We highly recommend Scrivener software, but any word processor will do

You must be willing to set aside dedicated time to write and work on your writing business. It doesn't matter how much at first, but you must make it a priority and be willing to close your door to the world while you work. (Basically, you must be willing to take writing seriously, and sometimes make other things wait.)
You must possess a strong work ethic, a thick skin, and a willingness to work hard at writing even at the inevitable times in which results aren't immediate
courses.description:
At the end of 2013, the crew behind the top-rated Self Publishing Podcast released their book Write. Publish. Repeat. WPR went on to become a #1 bestseller, hailed as an addition to the "must have" book list for writers. This 30-part video series, in which the three authors (Johnny, Sean, and Dave) expound on all of WPR's key pointsa year later, is the next step for forward-thinking, smart indie publishers.
Write. Publish. Repeat. Conversations is the video companion to Write. Publish. Repeat. We not only go into more depth on the book's content as it applies to our day-to-day business, but the series also updates the book with all we've learned after another year publishing at Sterling & Stone, our cutting-edge company that runs six imprints across the publishing spectrum.
Students of this course will learn how to take take their art and make a viable business from it. The e-book age is a golden time for writers ... and Write. Publish. Repeat. shows you how to take advantage of it, and profit from your creativity.
target_audience: This is for writers who are willing to work hard to produce and sell quality books
This is for writers willing to think of writing as a business as well as an art
This is for writers who love to write, rather than those who see writing as some sort of a way to get rich quickly
This is NOT for anyone seeking a "get rich quick" scheme or anyone who believes an "ebook gold rush" mentality
This is NOT for hobbyists (who don't really care about selling their work) or pure artists who feel that "adding business to art" somehow sullies it (HINT: it most certainly does not)
This is NOT for lazy people, people who complain, or people who make excuses. Basically, it's not for any writer unwilling to take responsibility for her own success

courses.description:
This comprehensive course is designed to equip you with the essential knowledge and skills needed to navigate the intricate world of film festivals, including film markets, funding and distribution. From strategically positioning your film for success to crafting an effective submission that stands out, you'll learn the ins and outs of festival promotion, funding, and distribution processes. Through practical exercises, discussions, and real-world examples, you'll gain invaluable insights into building and maintaining professional relationships within the film industry.


Who This Course is For:


Film students intrigued by film festival submissions and distribution
Emerging and Intermediate filmmakers aspiring to enter the industry
Junior filmmakers aiming to refine festival strategies and explore distribution options
Independent producers and directors who have recently finished a film and are preparing for festival submissions, and scouting funding, and distribution alternatives
Independent producers with some festival recognitions, eager to finding investors, and securing distribution deals.
Independent producers actively pursuing film distributors for their projects


What You Will Learn:


Strategically Position Your Film for Success: Explore the film festival circuit and learn how to identify and target the right festivals for your film. We'll review and scout some of the top festivals together, providing you with a comprehensive understanding of the landscape.
Finding and Approaching Key Industry Players: Understand the importance of networking and relationship-building within the film industry. Gain practical tips and techniques for establishing meaningful connections with industry professionals, international sales agents, production companies, financiers, and distributors.
Understand Traditional and Online Film Distribution: Delve into the world of film distribution and learn how cinema venues operate. Gain insights into the various distribution channels available to filmmakers and how to navigate them effectively.
Craft an Effective Film Submission: Master the art of crafting a compelling submission that captures the attention of festival programmers. Learn step-by-step strategies for creating submission materials that stand out and avoid disqualification.
Cinema-Ready: Exporting Your Film for Screening: Understand the technical requirements for final screening, including exporting high resolution files, such as Digital Cinema Package (DCP) files. Learn how to ensure your film is presented in the best possible quality on the big screen.
Build the Ideal Electronic Press Kit (EPK): Discover the importance of promoting your film effectively and learn how to create an electronic press kit (EPK) that showcases your work in the best light. Gain practical insights into designing and presenting your EPK to attract attention from festival programmers and the media.
Equity Finance, Film Funding, and Distribution Strategies: Delve into film financing, from equity finance to crowdfunding. Understand the various funding options, how to attract investors, and devise strategic distribution plans.


Skills You Will Acquire:


Strategic planning and positioning your film(s) for festival success
Networking and relationship-building within the film industry
Understanding of film distribution channels and cinema venues
Crafting compelling submission materials and avoiding disqualification pitfalls
Technical proficiency in providing optimal film files for final screening
Creating effective electronic press kits for film promotion
Approaching key industry players, sales agents, film investors, and financiers with confidence
Exploring a variety of film funding alternatives, equity and reward-based crowdfunding


Join us on a journey through the exciting world of film festival promotion, funding, and distribution strategies course, and empower yourself with the knowledge and skills needed to take your filmmaking career to new heights!

courses.description:
In this course, we'll cover everything you need to know to market your books effectively. Whether you're just publishing your first novel or you're a seasoned pro, the tips and strategies in this course will work for you. We'll provide tips and strategies around three fundamental marketing principles:
Get traffic - After all, you can't gain readers without traffic, and fortunately there's no shortage of people looking for good books to read!
Convert - Once we get traffic, we need to make sure they buy our books or sign up for our mailing list.
Nurture - Once they've become a fan, we need to build a relationship so they'll buy from us again in the future.
The course will help if you've struggled to get readers, or if you can't get them to leave reviews of your books, You'll learn how to explode your author platform so you can climb up those bestseller charts for years to come. And the best news?... These strategies don't take up a lot of your time, and you can start seeing results within weeks instead of years. This definitive marketing course will free you up so you'll have more time to do what really matters most... write more books!
target_audience: This course is meant for anyone who has a published (or soon-to-be-published) book and wants to have more sales. These tactics work whether it's your first or hundredth book and the lessons apply to both fiction and non-fiction authors. Although, my experience and tips are more closely geared toward the fiction writer in mind.

courses.description:
Seit mehr als 15 Jahren  schreibe ich Bücher. Mit dem Angebot des Verkaufs eigener Bücher auf Amazon stellte sich mir die Frage, wie kann ich ohne großartige Kenntnisse von HTML und CSS ein eBook erstellen, das dem Leser Freude bereitet.
Nach langem Probieren von diversen Programmen, unter anderem Sigil, aber auch Scrivener (was ich heute noch zur Planung und Ordnung meiner Ideen nutze), bin ich auf Jutoh gestoßen. Dieses Programm hat es mächtig in sich, ohne jedoch den Nutzer zu überfordern.
Ich habe für Sie den Kurs über Jutoh erstellt, damit Ihnen der Einstieg in das Programm erleichtert wird, damit Sie sehen, was alles möglich ist.
Lernen Sie in dem vorliegenden Kurs das Programm Jutoh näher kennen. Das Erstellen von eBooks wird damit wesentlich einfacher und das Ergebnis ist ein professionell erscheinendes Buch, welches auf den Lesegeräten Ihrer Leser einfach klasse aussieht.
Sie benötigen keine Vorkenntnisse und können sofort starten.
Teil 1: Warum Jutoh
Teil 2: Jutoh installieren
Teil 3: Vorbereitungen
Teil 4: Unser Projekt
Teil 5: Fortgeschrittene Tipps
Teil 6: Profi-Tipps
Legen Sie Zettel und Stift bereit und notieren Sie sich wesentliche Schritte, schauen Sie mir über die Schulter, wie ein neues eBook entsteht.
Gemeinsam erstellen wir im Kurs ein neues eBook mit Jutoh. Sie werden sehen, dass keine Vorkenntnisse an HTML oder CSS notwendig sind.
Viel Spaß beim Ansehen.

courses.title: BÍ MẬT CỦA NGHỀ TÁC GIẢ
courses.bio: "10 tư duy khác biệt nhất giữa Tác giả thành công và Tác giả bình thường"
objectives: Khám phá "SỨC MẠNH CỦA TÁC GIẢ" - và cách sử dụng cuốn sách để giúp bạn thăng tiến trong sự nghiệp
Con đường của sự thành công "không giới hạn" khi chúng ta trở thành một Tác giả
Khám phá cách sử dụng cuốn sách "được sáng tạo của bạn" để GIA TĂNG THU NHẬP
Tạo ra BƯỚC ĐỘT PHÁ CHO SỰ NGHIỆP KINH DOANH của bạn
Tìm kiếm một cách thức hiệu quả để viết sách - xuất bản sách - và phát hành sách thành công!
requirements: Không cần kinh nghiệm. Bạn sẽ học được những gì bạn cần biết!
courses.description:
10 tư duy khác biệt nhất giữa Tác giả thành công và Tác giả bình thường – được chia sẻ từ Tác giả có Sách được bạn đọc yêu thích bình chọn hàng đầu Việt Nam.
TƯ DUY 1 – KẾT THÚC
Tư duy thứ nhất: “Tác giả thành công kết thúc một cuốn sách ngay trước khi viết nó. Tác giả thất bại viết một cuốn sách khi chưa biết lúc nào kết thúc. "
Nguyên tắc về sự thành công – và đó cũng chính là 1 trong 10 THÓI QUEN ĐỂ THÀNH CÔNG BỀN VỮNG đó chính là “Bắt đầu với sự kết thúc trong tâm trí” – hay nói cách khác đó chính là TƯ DUY KẾT THÚC.
Bạn thành công (hay sẽ phải học được một học) – vào NGAY THỜI ĐIỂM BẠN RA QUYẾT ĐỊNH LÀM MỘT ĐIỀU GÌ ĐÓ. Nếu bạn thành công – thì bạn đã thành công rồi, nếu bạn thất bại – bạn học được một bài học – và như thế bạn cũng thành công.
Tư duy KẾT THÚC – đó chính là KẾT THÚC QUYỂN SACH ngay khi bạn bắt đầu viết bất cứ con chữ nào. Tư duy này sẽ giúp bạn trở thành Tác giả thành công.
TƯ DUY 2 – BIẾT TRƯỚC
Tư duy thứ hai: “Tác giả thành công biết trước độc giả là ai trước khi viết một cuốn sách. Tác giả thất bại viết một cuốn sách mà không biết trước độc giả là ai?”
BIẾT TRƯỚC là biết trước độc giả của mình là AI?
BIẾT TRƯỚC là biết trước thị trường
BIẾT TRƯỚC là biết trước vấn đề mình giải quyết và tiên liệu được mọi thứ khi nó xảy ra.
TƯ DUY 3 – ĐỘC GIẢ
Tư duy 3: “Tác giả thành công viết một cuốn sách cho độc giả. Tác giả thất bại viết một cuốn sách để trở thành một tác giả.”
VIẾT MỘT CUỐN SÁCH hướng đến ĐỘC GIẢ.
XUẤT BẢN MỘT CUỐN SÁCH hướng đến ĐỘC GIẢ.
PHÁT HÀNH MỘT CUỐN SÁCH hướng đến ĐỘC GIẢ.
BÁN MỘT CUỐN SÁCH hướng đến ĐỘC GIẢ.
Đó chính là tư duy thứ ba: ĐỘC GIẢ là trọng tâm của quyển sách.
TƯ DUY 4 – THỊ TRƯỜNG
Tư duy 4: “Tác giả thành công tập trung vào một thị trường. Tác giả thất bại tập trung vào một cuốn sách.”
TƯ DUY 5 – GIẢI PHÁP
Tư duy 5: “Tác giả thành công viết một cuốn sách để giải quyết vấn đề. Tác giả thất bại viết một cuốn sách như là một cuốn sách.”
TƯ DUY 6 – TƯ TƯỞNG
Tư duy thứ 6: “Tác giả thành công viết một cuốn sách để tiếp thị một tư tưởng và tiếp thị một cuốn sách như là một tư tưởng. Tác giả thất bại viết một cuốn sách và sau đó tiếp thị nó.”
TƯ DUY 7 – CÂU CHUYỆN
Tư duy 7: “Tác giả thành công kể một câu chuyện vĩ đại. Tác giả thất bại kể một câu chuyện bình thường.”
TƯ DUY 8 – ĐỊNH VỊ
Tư duy 8: “Tác giả thành công định vị mình là một tác giả thành công trước khi viết một cuốn sách. Tác giả thất bại viết một cuốn sách và kết thúc nó.”
TƯ DUY 9 – KẾ HOẠCH
Tư duy 9: “Tác giả thành công bán một cuốn sách và đó chỉ mới bắt đầu một kế hoạch. Tác giả thất bại cố gắng bán một cuốn sách và kết thúc một kế hoạch.”
TƯ DUY 10 – CỐ VẤN
Tư duy 10: “Tác giả thành công có một Nhà huấn luyện – một Cố vấn dẫn đường để đi. Tác giả thất bại tự tìm ra đường để đi.”
VẬY TÔI PHẢI LÀM GÌ BÂY GIỜ…
“Kết thúc một khóa học là bắt đầu một hành trình!”
“Trở thành một Tác giả thành công là tất cả những việc bạn cần làm ngay bây giờ để tạo ra sự thành công cho chính mình, không phải bởi vì bạn muốn kiếm tiền từ sách – mà là bởi vì bạn muốn TẠO RA GIÁ TRỊ và có thể kiếm rất nhiều tiền từ sách”.
///---
Thông điệp từ TRẦN TRUNG KIÊN (TK) | ROYAL AUTHOR | ROYAL ADVISOR
target_audience: Nhà văn - Chuyên gia

Doanh nhân - Danh nhân

courses.title: יצירת סרטונים לקידום העסק ויציאה לעצמאות כלכלית
courses.bio: עריכת וידאו בסמארטפון ודסקטופ ללא השקעה מטורפת

עריכת סרטונים באפליקציה בסמארטפון כמו עו: אפליקציה לעריכת סרטונים עם מוסיקה בסמארטפון
עריכת סרטונים מתמונות בסמארטפון ללא צורך: אפליקציה נוספת ליצירת סרטונים קצרים במהירות
עריכת וידאו לסטורי והנפשות לקידום העסק
מעסק שקוף לעסק עם חשיפה: הסרת רקע מוידאו ויצירת וידאו גיף
אתר ואפליקציה ליצירת כתוביות לסרטונים: אתר להוספת כתוביות באופן אוטומטי בחינם! להנגשת הסרטונים
לרוצים להישאר מאחורי הקלעים: אתר לצילום מסך והטמעת קריאה לפעולה
תוכנה מקצועית בתשלום לצילום מסך ועריכת סרטונים
כל אחד יכול סוגי וידאו שונים: סוגי סרטונים שכל בעל עסק חייב להכיר לפני תחילת עריכת הסרטונים

requirements: מחשב ואינטרנט
courses.description:
יש היום כל כך הרבה אתרים ואפליקציות לעריכת סרטונים לאייפון ולאנדרואיד, שאין סיבה שלא תתחילו לערוך ולעלות את החומרים שצילמתם בחופשה או בעסק אפילו בדרך לעבודה לפני שאתם מעלים אותם לפיד או לסטורי.
כמעט 100% מהאנשים מצלמים היום בעזרת הסמארטפון עשרות אם לא מאות סרטונים בשנה, ומשתפים אותם ממש כפי שהם, בלי לערוך. האנדרואיד או
האייפון בעזרתו אנחנו מצלמים אותם מסוגל לערוך וידאו באיכות גבוהה תוך שניות. חלפו הימים שבהם עריכה הייתה מטלה למקצוענים בהוליווד
באמת שכל אחד יכול לעשות זאת, וכדי להכניס אתכם לעניינים בחרנו עבורכם את האתרים והאפליקציות הטובות ביותר שיעזרו לכם ליצור סרטונים מושלמים
בקורס נשתף אפליקציות, אתרים ותוכנות לעריכת וידאו רובן חינמיות. לא צריכים להשקיע באביזרים נוספים חוץ מהסמארטפון שלכם והמחשב.
בקורס נעבור יחד תהליך עריכת וידאו עד יצרת סרטונים שיווקים שיעזרו לכם לקדם את העסק אונליין. המטרה ללמד בצורה חוויתית ונעימה בכדי שאתם תוכל ליישם.
בזמנים קשים אלו אנחנו בעלי העסקים הקטנים לא מעוניינים לרכוש ציוד מקצועי או לשכור עורך וידאו במאות שקלים. לכן, ראינו לנכון לצלם קורס זה המשתף בצורה פשוטה וברורה אפליקציות, תוכנות ואתרים שבעזרתם יצרנו סרטונים לעסק שלנו והבאנו תנועה לנכסים הדיגטליים שלנו.
איך נעזור לכם לערוך וידאו לבד?
אפליקציות לעריכת וידאו בסמארטפון.
אתר ואפליקציה ליצירת כתוביות לסרטונים.
אתרים חינמיים לצילום מסך.
אתרים למוסיקה ומאגרי וידאו.
אפליקציה לחיתוך קטעי וידאו.
סוגי וידאו שכל בעל עסק חייב להכיר.
למי הקורס מתאים?
לבעלי עסקים, יוצרי תוכן, בלוגרים, מרצים או אנשים פרטיים.
המועניינים לערוך וידאו בסמארטפון או בדסקטופ.
בשימוש באפליקציות, אתרים ותוכנות חינמיות.
target_audience: בעלי עסקים

courses.title: 클링(Kling) AI 하나로 끝내는 영상 제작 – 기획부터 SNS 배포까지 90분 완성
courses.bio: 텍스트 한 줄로 만드는 감각적인 영상 콘텐츠! Kling AI로 시작하는 쉽고 빠른 SNS 콘텐츠 제작 입문
objectives: GAN, VAE, Diffusion Model 등의 주요 개념과 도구(Sora, Krea)를 통해 생성형 AI 원리 학습

모핑, Motion Brush, Lip Sync 등 다양한 연출 효과를 AI로 구현하는 실습 구성

생성형 AI 개념 이해: 생성형 AI 개념 및 주요 기술 (GAN, VAE, Diffusion Model)
최신 AI 도구 소개 (Sora, Krea 등)

requirements: 실습 위주의 강의이기 때문에 강의 화면과 실습 화면을 분리할 수 있는 듀얼 모니터 또는 여분 기기를 함께 준비해주시면 좋습니다.
또한 Windows OS 기반으로 실습이 진행되므로, Windows 환경에서의 강의 수강을 추천해드립니다.
courses.description:
"어제보다 성장하겠습니다. 그리고, 어제보다 성장하려는 사람을 돕겠습니다."


마소캠퍼스의 진심과 소망을 담은 Actionable Content로,
2013년부터 온오프라인으로 함께해 온 누적 강의 1억시간!
이 소중한 경험과 시간은 언제나 마소캠퍼스와 수강생 모두의 성장의 원천입니다.


-
“영상, 어디서부터 어떻게 만들어야 할지 모르겠다면?”
Kling AI로 달라지는 콘텐츠 퀄리티를 직접 확인해보세요.
제대로 된 영상 한 번 만들어볼까 싶었지만,
툴도 낯설고 어디서 시작할지 막막했다면?
Kling AI와 함께 처음부터 가볍게 시작하세요.

– 단순 생성이 아닌 기획 기반의 영상 구성 배우기
– 프롬프트로 스타일 ∙ 카메라 무빙 ∙ 연출까지 조절하는 감각 익히기
– 이미지→영상 전환, 모션 ∙ 립싱크 등 AI 연출 기법 실습
– 다양한 종류의 AI 도구를 활용한 실전 콘텐츠 제작 루틴 경험


Kling AI로 완성하는 요즘 콘텐츠,
이제 이 강의에서 직접 배워보세요.


Kling AI란?
Kling AI는 텍스트 기반 프롬프트만으로 고해상도 이미지와 동영상을 생성할 수 있는 생성형 인공지능 플랫폼입니다.
사용자는 카메라 무빙, 스타일, 조명, 모션 효과 등 다양한 연출 요소를 자유롭게 설정할 수 있습니다. 이에 전문적인 영상 편집 기술 없이도 고품질 비주얼 콘텐츠 제작이 가능한 것이 강점입니다.
텍스트 한 줄로 펼쳐지는 다채로운 영상, 지금 Kling AI로 콘텐츠 제작을 시작하세요!


Kling AI 하나로 끝내는 영상 제작 – 기획부터 SNS 배포까지 90분 완성 커리큘럼 특징
Kling AI로 더 효율적인 영상 콘텐츠 제작을 시작하는 생성형 AI 영상 제작 입문 강의입니다.
1. 생성형 AI 개념과 영상 제작의 기본 원리 이해
GAN, VAE, Diffusion Model 등의 주요 개념과 도구(Sora, Krea)를 통해 생성형 AI 원리 학습
2.프롬프트 작성 및 이미지 편집 실습
스타일·앵글 설정부터 Google AI Studio를 활용한 이미지 편집 방법 안내
3. AI 기반 고급 영상 연출 기법 소개
모핑, Motion Brush, Lip Sync 등 다양한 연출 효과를 AI로 구현하는 실습 구성
4. 다중 툴 기반 활용력 증대
Kling AI, ClipChamp, Wrtn, Buffer 등의 도구들을 유기적으로 연결하는 실전 프로세스 구성
5. 실전 결과물 중심의 커리큘럼 제공
실습을 통해 직접 영상 콘텐츠를 완성하고 퍼블리싱까지 이어지는 결과 중심 구성
내가 쓴 글이 곧 영상이 되는 순간,

courses.title: ١٢ خطوة لكتابة رواية أدبية لا تنسى - كورس متكامل
courses.bio: 12 steps to write an unforgettable novel
objectives: سيتعرّف المتعلّم على مفهوم الفصول والمشاهد الأساسية، وكيفية توزيعها بذكاء عبر مسار القصة، مما يجعل البناء الروائي أكثر تماسكًا وإمتاعًا للقراء.
سيتعلّم المتعلّم أن وجود بطل مثالي يجعل القصة مملة؛ لذا سيستوعب أهمية عيوب البطل وسبب كونها محرّك الأحداث الأساسي، مما يعزز تفاعل القراء مع الشخصيات.
سيكتشف الدارس كيف يبدأ روايته بمشهد يلفت الانتباه ، وكيف يزرع مواقف أو أسئلة تثير الفضول، فتجعل القارئ متشوقًا للمتابعة حتى النهاية.
سيدرك أهمية أن تدور القصة حول رحلة تغيير البطل من حالته الأولى إلى حالة جديدة، وكيفية إبراز الدرس الذي يتعلّمه على مدار الأحداث.
سيتعلّم كيف يختم الرواية بصورة تخلّف أثرًا عاطفيًا وفكريًا لدى القراء، وتظهر التطوّر الحقيقي للشخصيات وتحقيق الأهداف.
سيدرك الأخطاء الشائعة في السرد، مثل الإطالة غير الضرورية أو عدم وضوح الدوافع، وسيتعلّم طرقًا لتفاديها وجعل النص أكثر جاذبية واحترافية.
سيتعرّف على طرق للتغلب على "توقف الابداع" ، ويكتسب ثقة أكبر بقدرته على إنتاج نص سردي متماسك، مما يحفّزه على مواصلة الكتابة حتى إنجاز روايته.
بعد فهم الأسس القوية للبناء السردي والشخصيات، يصبح المتعلّم أكثر جاهزية لأخذ خطوة عرض روايته على دور النشر أو النشر الذاتي، مع وعي أفضل بالجوانب التسويقية

ثلث الرواية الأول: الخطوة الثالث - الحل المحلول + التدريب الثالث
الخطوة الرابعة - القرار الأول + التدريب الرابع

requirements: ورقة وقلم فقط
تمتلك حلم لصناعة عمل روائي أو سيناريو لا ينسى
courses.description:
هل لديك فكرة لفيلم أو مسلسل أو رواية، لكن لا تعرف كيف تحوّلها إلى سيناريو متماسك وجذاب؟ هل ترغب في تعلّم أسس كتابة الحوارات ورسم الشخصيات وبناء الحبكة الدرامية بطريقة احترافية؟ في هذا الكورس الشامل، سنأخذك خطوة بخطوة في رحلة ممتعة لاستكشاف عالم كتابة السيناريو وفن الحكي البصري.
ماذا ستتعلم في هذا الكورس؟
أساسيات الرواية : لماذا يُعدّ الحوار عنصرًا مساعدًا فقط، وكيف نعتمد على الصورة والحركة كأدوات أساسية؟
رسم الشخصيات بعمق: كيف نُبرز الدوافع والعيوب، ونخلق شخصيات ثلاثية الأبعاد تلامس قلوب المشاهدين.
بناء الحبكة والصراع: استخدام Beats أساسية لتحريك الأحداث، وترسيخ عناصر التشويق والتوتر الدرامي.
أسرار الحوار الواقعي: كتابة حوارات تعكس البيئة والمستوى الاجتماعي للشخصيات، مع تجنب المبالغة والتقريرية.
الانطباع الأول والأخير: كيفية جذب الجمهور من المشهد الافتتاحي وحتى اللقطة الختامية.
لماذا تنضم إلينا؟
يجمع الكورس بين الجانب النظري (مفاهيم كتابة الرواية وقواعده) والتطبيق العملي (تمارين وأنشطة تفاعلية).
ستستفيد من أمثلة متنوعة مأخوذة من أفلام عربية وعالمية، إضافة إلى نصائح لكتاب سيناريو مخضرمين.
ستحصل على خريطة عمل واضحة لكتابة الرواية من الصفر حتى النسخة النهائية، مع دعم في كل مرحلة من المراحل.
سنناقش الأخطاء الشائعة وكيفية تفاديها، ليكون إنتاجك في أفضل صورة ممكنة.
انضم الآن واحصل على أدواتك لتصبح كاتب سيناريو محترف، تكتب قصصًا تشدّ المشاهد وتجعل عملك لا يُنسى!
هذا الكورس مناسب لكل من المبتدئين الذين يرغبون في دخول عالم الكتابة الابداعية، والمتمرسين الراغبين في صقل مهاراتهم وإثراء أفكارهم. ابدأ رحلتك الإبداعية معنا اليوم!
target_audience: من يعلم أن يصبح كاتبًا

courses.title: 積み上げ式「オンライン講座」の作り方｜コース制作テンプレート付
courses.bio: 1つ1つ丁寧に情熱を込めてオンライン講座を制作する。約17,000名の方にオンライン講座を受講いただいた講師が「オンライン講座制作の本質」をシェアします。コース終了時には「オリジナル講座」が完成している状態を目指します。情熱を講座に。
objectives: オンライン講座の作り方
オンライン講座の夢中になれるジャンル選定方法
オンライン講座の結果を最大化するためのファネル/マーケティング方法
オンライン講座のスライド作成から録音方法まで

はじめに: オンライン講座制作で目指す未来
迷わない実行シートの使い方
なぜ積み上げ式オンライン講座制作なのか: オンライン講座をテンプレで作る理由
自己紹介と学習効果を高める３つのコツ
ロードマップ/全体像確認: ゴール達成までの全体像
夢中になれるジャンル選定: 情熱を見つける問いかけワーク
選ばれ続けるコンセプト設計: コンセプト３要素＆コンセプト設計テンプレ
コンセプト設計の本質
コンセプト設計ワーク
テンプレに沿ってわかりやすい構成を作る: 感情を起点にした構成とは
マインドマップ構成テンプレ解説
構成作成ワーク（マインドマップ）
提案をピカピカに磨き上げる: 提案で世界観を作る方法
サクッと理解できるスライド作成: スライド作成最重要３要素
参考スライドの活用方法
違いがわかる高音質で録音する: 録音で大切な３つの意識
講座制作のおすすめガジェット
おすすめの画面収録ソフト
オンライン講座の売上を最大化する: バリューラダーの考え方でオンライン講座を作る
講座マーケティングファネル作成ワーク

requirements: オンライン講座を制作するために活用するPCやマイク等の基本機材
courses.description:
ゼロからオンライン講座完成までの「具体的なステップ」を網羅的に学習できるコースです。
約17,000名の方にオンライン講座を受講いただいた講師が「実践的なスキル」をシェアします。


個人がオンラインで活躍するAI時代に
あなたオリジナルのオンライン講座を積み上げていきましょう。


選ばれるオンライン講座の「本質」は共通しています。
その本質を「コース制作テンプレート」に厳選してまとめました。


テンプレートを使ったワークを実践しながら
コース終了時には「あなた独自のオンライン講座が完成」している状態を目指します。


◇カリキュラム
01 夢中になれる「ジャンル」を見つける
02 選ばれ続ける「コンセプト」を作成する
03 わかりやすさ重視の「構成」をテンプレ通りに作成
04 圧倒的に伝わる「スライド作成」を実践（参考テンプレ有）
05 違いが分かる高音質で「収録」する（ガジェットリスト付）
06 オンライン講座の売り上げを最大化するファネル作成
07 最も差がつく「マインドセット」で次の段階へ
target_audience: オンライン講座を資産として積み上げたい人

objectives: Você aprenderá como se tornar um modelo profissional, baseado em estratégias reais.
Você aprenderá como se preparar adequadamente e conseguir pegar bons trabalhos.
Você aprenderá passo a passo para seguir uma carreira internacional.
Você verá resultados reais colocando em prática todo tema do curso.
Você irá aprender como escolher sua agência nacional e internacional e saber quais são fraudes e como não cair em conversas fiadas.

Introdução: O que você sabe sobre ser modelo?
Como fazer sua polaroid- tipo de local e iluminação adequada

Você deve estar pronto para agir, colocar em prática e ver resultados reais
courses.description:
Olá, sejam bem vindos a minha página, sintam-se em casa,
Bom, primeiramente podem me chamar de Gabi, sou do interior de Minas Gerais , modelo e atualmente trabalho no mercado internacional, sou formada também em bacharel em Educação física e hoje proprietária da marca Models Life que oferece cursos preparatórios para modelos, também sou sócia de uma fabrica de licores artesanais
Este curso é feito para você que sonha em ser modelo e não sabe como e onde começar, esse curso é feito por profissionais da área e que vivenciam a profissão, isso já é um diferencial dos cursos tradicionais, outro fator importante, todo conteúdo e composto por experiências reais e claro experiência na área com grandes resultados. Se você tem sonho em se tornar modelo profissional, a hora é agora.
O objetivo é preparar adequadamente para a profissão sendo transparente e verdadeiro com todos para que conquiste o sonho almejado e seja um modelo profissional e de sucesso, seja no campo nacional ou internacional.
Lembrando que neste curso não teremos interação no app Telegram para tirar dúvidas referente as aulas pois o curso na Udemy é promocional e não está liberado esta função até o momento.
Agradeço a compreensão de todos e qualquer dúvida estamos à disposição.
Um grande beijo e aguardo vocês!!
target_audience: Qualquer pessoa que tem sonho em ser modelo
Para pessoas que já estão na carreira mas não conseguem ir mais além
Qualquer pessoa que deseja ser um profissional na indústria da moda

Embark on your journey to become a Web 3.0 influencer, embracing authenticity, community engagement, and blockchain possibilities to unlock the full potential of influence and income in the decentralized realm of social media.
Enroll in this course today to equip yourself with the knowledge, strategies, and tools needed to navigate the transformative landscape of Web 3.0 influence and accelerate your success in the digital era.
