requirements: 特に必要な条件はありません。パソコンかスマホが一台あればどなたでも受講できます。文章を扱うすべての方に習得いただければと思います。
courses.description:
「書いている途中で迷ってしまい、執筆に時間がかかる・・・」
「時間をかけて丁寧に書いているのに、読者の反応が悪い・・・」
「そもそも、どうやったら文章を書けるのかわからない・・・」
「Webライターとして活躍したい・・・」


現状を変えたいのに、その方法がわからなくて悩んでいませんか？


多くの人は
"はやく良い文章が書けるのは特別な能力がある人"で、
普通の自分には"時間をかけないと良い文章が書けない"と思いがち。


でもこれは大きな勘違いです。




まず、文章をはやく・うまく書くコツとして知っておいてほしいのが、
記事のクオリティは準備の段階で8割方決まってしまうということ。


ライティングを生業としている人の中にも
いきなり本文に手をつけてしまう人がいますが、


記事を書く前に情報収集などの
準備がしっかりとできていなければ、


そこからどれだけ頑張っても良い記事にはならないし、
書き上がるまでにも余計に時間がかかります。




加えて、良い文章・うまい文章とは、
読者に伝わる文章であるという意識を持つことも必要です。


読者の目を引くキャッチーな言葉選びや
凝った文章を考えることも必要な要素ではありますが、


それよりもまずは、読者が知りたい情報が
わかりやすく漏れなく書いてあることが重要なのです。




つまり、記事を書く前に正しく準備ができていて
なおかつ「読者に伝わる文章」を意識して執筆すれば、
誰でもはやく・うまく文章が書けるようになります。


このコースでは、7,000人以上の登録者を擁するライタープロダクションを運営し、
編集者歴10年で3,000人以上の駆け出しライターを見てきた講師が


・文章をはやく書くためのマインドセット
・はやく文章を書くための正しい準備の仕方
・文章をはやく書くために活用できる型の種類と使い方
・読者の感情の動きに沿って書く方法（伝わる文章の書き方）
・文章をはやく書くための最高の執筆環境


といった、はやく書けるライティング技術のメソッドを丁寧に解説しています。




・フリーライター、Webライターを目指す方
・なかなか結果が出ないと悩むアフィリエイターの方
・ブログの更新を大変に感じている方


など、このコースでの実践を経ていけば
結果に結びつくことが実感できるはずです。


それでは、講義でお会いできることを楽しみにしております。
target_audience: 早く書けるようになりたいと考えているライターの方
ブログやメルマガの読者を増やしたい方
ライターとして独立したい方
ライターとしての稼ぎを増やしたい方
SNSを使って情報発信をしている方
アフィリエイトで収益を上げたい方
SNSを通して講座やセミナーに集客したい方
WEBライティングを学びたい方

courses.title: Playwrights Practice: Playwriting Made Easy
courses.bio: Self-guided. Write, edit and workshop original short plays. Examine and change your life. Train the playwright in you!
objectives: Learn the skills to create your own short stage plays from idea inception through polished final draft execution, ready for contests, readings, and workshops.
Master short stage play structure.
Discover formulas, shortcuts, methodologies and creative insights to help jumpstart your journey as a playwright.
Identify and overcome major flaws found in both new and professional writers today.
Understand what makes an idea right for theatrical exploration (versus cinematic exploration or literary exploration).
Study and master the art of nuanced dialogue creation.
Manage character and audience expectations.
Create and manipulate rising tension.
Uncover tips and tricks to help you avoid cliche in your writing.
Demonstrate and duplicate proper stage play format.
Enable you to examine and change your life through playwriting.
Valuable feedback provided when you pay full price for this course. No feedback is provided when this course is purchased at a discount.

Course Overview: Tools of the Trade & Mining the World for Ideas
There is no writer's block. Only procrastination.
The Bare Minimum: Everything You Need to: Which medium is right for my idea? Movies vs. Novels vs. Theater
What makes great theater? Can you define event, plot and story? The MDQ.
1st Impulses are Cliches (or "Your Kung Fu is not strong.")
Tell Me of My Problems: What Makes Good Criticism?
Writing Assignment: Record and Transcribe Dialogue #1
Writing Assignment: Draft One of 10-minute Play
Download: Proper Play Format Example - 'Retribution' by Jack Sullivan
Getting Better: Tackling the First Rewri: Lecture and Writing Assignment: Become Tennessee Williams
Stage Directions: What They Are and Why You Don't Write 'Em
Download: Cat On A Hot Tin Roof excerpt
Writing Assignment: Identify Your Play's MDQ
Writing Assignment: Rechecking the One-Sentence Outline
Writing Assignment: Record and Transcribe Dialogue #2
Writing Assignment: The First Major Rewrite
Defeating the Problems of the Pros: The: Download: 'It's Only A Play' Beats PDF
Writing Assignment: Record and Transcribe Dialogue #3
Writing Assignment: Identify Beats In Your Play
Writing Assignment: Play Draft Three - Enhance Your Character Dialogue
The Final Draft. Now what?: The Value of Historical Plays like "Antony & Cleopatra"
Writing Assignment: Play Final Draft - Punch Up Specifics
Stay In Touch. Share Your Success Stories.

requirements: With Library Access, you can read the 4 (Four) Plays discussed in course lectures for free. These plays are: Tennessee Williams, SUMMER & SMOKE; David Mamet, AMERICAN BUFFALO; Harold Pinter, THE CARETAKER; Samuel Becket, HAPPY DAYS. To the best of my ability, I do try to cover these plays in the following lectures with enough depth that, even if you are unable to read the play itself, you will still benefit from the concepts presented in the lectures. Please don't take that statement as permission to not read the assigned plays: you will benefit far more from the lectures if you have knowledge of the actual dialogue created by the playwrights in each work.
You should have access to some sort of portable audio recording app/device, as well as a small notebook, a pen and a pencil.

You should have access to a computer and/or a word processor (programs like Final Draft or Movie Magic Screenwriter are industry standards and preferred; free alternatives are suggested in the course).
courses.description:
Playwrights Practice: Playwriting Made Easy
"The act of playwriting feeds the soul unlike anything else in the theatre arts." ~Unknown
This is a comprehensive course designed to teach aspiring playwrights the methods and skills necessary to create their own short stage plays from idea inception through polished final draft execution. We will reference and study theatrical masterpieces as examples.

Playwriting is about the journey of the play.  That journey offers you the chance to change your life through examination. It enables you to take a problem and look at it in ways you may never have considered before.  This can, in turn, present previously unseen options to you.
Herein, I offer to you the shortcuts, methodologies and creative insights taught to me during the first semester of MFA-level playwriting in Carnegie Mellon University's Dramatic Writing program. These fuzzy memories have been married to a myriad of professional tips, tricks and secrets I've learned through the experiments, successes and failures of both myself and fellow alum during our journey into the businesses of theater, film and television.
If you follow this course through from beginning to end and execute all of the readings and exercises, you will be armed with the tools necessary to transform yourself into a short-form playwright of note while becoming a better writer and a more thoughtful human being.
You will learn about short play structure, writing formulas, various types and levels of dialogue creation, managing character expectations, managing audience expectations, rising tension, avoiding cliche, and proper stage play format ... and in the process of practicing you will develop your own personal writing style and flare.
If you complete the instruction provided along with the assignments and optional online table reading, you will complete this course with a minimum of:
1) one ten-minute play, and
2) the foundation necessary to prepare you to write your first full length stage play for the purpose of winning notoriety, influencing people, mastering advanced structure, applying for a possible residency, or submission to short-form playwriting competitions.
This course is dedicated to the memory of my playwriting mentor, Milan Stitt, February 9, 1941 to March 12, 2009 (The Runner Stumbles).
target_audience: This introduction to the craft of playwriting, along with its online table reading component, is designed to be helpful and beneficial to writers of any level.

Screenwriters can benefit from this course through mastery of the art of dialogue creation. Extensive exercises have been created to help you write brilliant, nuanced dialogue that stands out and gets noticed.

This course is ideal for Low Budget Filmmakers and Scripted Content Creators, anyone who wants or needs to improve their speech/dialogue writing skills, anyone interested in developing their writing through constructive criticism [for online table readings], anyone who wants an opportunity to examine and change parts of their life, anyone who wants to make an audience pay attention and influence opinion, or anyone who needs a better understanding of their place in the world.

Mit Leichtigkeit zum eigenen Fachbuch
Du bist Expert:in auf deinem Gebiet und möchtest ein Fachbuch schreiben? Als langjährige Verlagslektorin bei Klett-Cotta kann ich dir mein Know-how mit auf den Weg geben, wie du dein Buch konzipierst, einen Verlag findest oder auch im Selfpublishing erfolgreich wirst. Was ist eigentlich ein Fachbuch vs. Sachbuch vs. Ratgeber?

Wie wird dein Fachbuch erfolgreich? Welche Rolle spielen dabei der Buchtitel, dein Schreibstil und das Marketing?

Der Kurs ist chronologisch aufgebaut, so dass du ihn mit auf deine Reise zum eigenen Buch nehmen kannst. Schritt für Schritt. Außerdem erhältst du viele Checklisten, die dir alles übersichtlich und einfach machen.

Von Herzen viel Freude und Erfolg mit deinem Buchprojekt!

Dr. Nadja Urbani

courses.description:
The news media plays a very key role in shaping public perception about artificial intelligence, lets all understand that artificial intelligence has its own advantages and disadvantages.There is panic in the total acceptance of artificial intelligence but in my opinion, artificial intelligence will help work to be completed effectively and efficiently, but it will not take away people jobs as its being speculated. As the media ecosystem is going through major changes, it has sparked concerns about how and to what extent artificial intelligence can be used for journalism and rightly so. The several cases encountered so far and gloomy outlook of the future on the subject, disinformation seems to be a running theme. We must understand that misinformation unlike disinformation may or may not be deliberate. But given accuracy is one of the fundamental elements of quality journalism, artificial intelligence getting its basic factual data incorrect on multiple times can threaten the trustworthiness of journalism, in the long term.
There are many social media artificial intelligence tools that makes generating post easy. This tools can also recognize context from a larger piece of content and create social media posts for promotion.  Artificial intelligence driven social media strategy involves the use of cutting-edge artificial intelligence technologies to automate, analyze, and enhance your media effort. In films, artificial intelligence not only allows for quicker production times but also enhances interactivity between viewers and movie makers, making it easier than ever to create great visual content.
target_audience: media professionals, educators, media agencies, press centers, media employees, governments, media owners, media associations, students, public, business people, lawyers, everybody etc.

courses.description:
"Learn from one of London's top production companies"
Whether you are interested in becoming a TV Commercials director, a corporate video director or an online content director – we want to share everything we know with you about how to establish yourself as a successful director.The course lays out the step by step process to building your career. We will be showing you our tried and tested methods which have worked for us time and time again for winning directing projects.Once you’ve finished you’ll know everything there is to know about how to establish yourself as a successful director
About the course creators
This course is one of many in ESA’s Masterclass video series. Our series is the only one produced by an international production company that is currently producing award-winning TV Commercials and corporate videos for some of the world's leading brands such as SONY, Barclays, Kelloggs, BBC, Microsoft and Nokia to name just a few.
So if you want to know real world techniques, then we can help you.
Why are we making this video
From our years of experience we have developed a wealth of practical knowledge and a passion for creative expression. That is why we are now looking to give back to the industry by supporting and promoting budding directors and film makers to express their creativity and reach a wider audience.
Who is this course for?:
Whether you have directed your own film projects before, or you’re starting from scratch with absolutely zero film making knowledge, then this course will help you build a successful career in the industry by understanding what you have to do to win lucrative and exciting directing jobs. We have found time and time again that its not necessarily the best director who gets the job, its the one who understands how to play the game and how the industry works who gets all the success.
We’re really looking forward to sharing some of the secrets of our industry with you and helping you in your goal to direct great content.
Don't waste any time. Kick start you directing career now and ENROLL TODAY.
Quizzes and Exercises
This course includes quizzes and exercises throughout to help you to really get to grips with the content and become a better film maker.
ABOUT YOUR INSTRUCTORS:

Angelique Rodrigues
Creative Producer, Course Co-Author and Presenter
My interest in film was born from my love for acting. I discovered the art of screen acting whilst studying for my Performing Arts diploma and Film Studies course. It was only then when I realised how exciting it could be to be behind the camera as well as in front of it!
As Creative Producer at ESA I manage the creative production process from start to finish; including idea creation, script writing, casting, locations and production. I am also involved with the on-set filming, as well as post production such as editing, sound and motion design.
I can’t wait to share my knowledge and experience with other filmmakers and directors to help them reach their goals to success!
Mitchell Brown
Principle Filmmaker and Course Co-Author
I have a passion for telling stories and creating my own films! As a Principle Film Maker at ESA I am a part of the creation process from start to finish.
I develop content from ideation to scripting, and I also do the lighting and camera for many of our productions. What really excites me is the editing and post production and seeing all our work come together.
I want to share the knowledge and skills I have developed through the years about what its takes to be successful in this industry, and am looking forward to sharing that with you, and helping you on your journey to create amazing, world class video and film.
Dave Irving
Head of Digital Marketing, and Course Co-Author
My main goal in life is to help people have their voices heard. Through digital marketing I have found that I’m able to help people stand out amongst the competition and find a platform for their passion. I want to do the same for you.
Since childhood, I have had an active interest in the arts. I first picked up a guitar at the tender age of 7, and have hardly put it down since. That flair for the creative has stuck with me ever since and plays a major role in almost every aspect of my personal and professional life.
As an adult, I have worked as a video content creator over a span of 15 years – but the one thing all of my work has in common is a desire to be seen and heard by as many people as possible. It was through this necessity that I developed an interest in digital marketing.
Although it might not seem as rock-and-roll as picking up a guitar and shredding to a room full of people, my skills as a digital marketing strategist have given me the ability to broaden my audience base far beyond what I previously thought possible – I sincerely hope I can help you do the same.
Zah Ahmad
Film Director, Course Co - Author
Zaheer is an award winning Director, Writer and Producer at ESA Films where he has directed and produced content for some of the world’s leading brands such as Sony, Microsoft, Shell, HSBC and AMEX, General Electric, IBM, Colgate and Kelloggs.
During his career, he has attracted notable industry accolades and awards: Winner ‘Gold Award for Best Short’ at the WorldFest 2013 for his film ‘Beautiful Impurity’, which followed an Honourable Mention Award at Richmond International Film Festival 2013 and being selected as a Finalist at Crystal Palace International Film Festival. The film has received recognition at the Berlin Independent Film Festival, and also achieved Official Selections at some of the most prestigious festivals in the world, including Oscar affiliated Montreal World Film Festival. Most recently the film has been honoured at the American Online Film Awards.
Prior to this, his film ‘Runaways’ was awarded 'Winner Gold Remi’ at the Houston International Film Festival 2007, 'Best Short Nomination' at the Salento International Film Festival 2007 and ‘Highly Recommended' category winner at Leicester International Film Festival 2007. He is also past winner of the LFS Script Competition for the drama 'Love After Death' 2005.
After graduating from Warwick University with a BSc (Hons) Management Science he studied film at London Film Academy before progressing to a Post Graduate degree in Film Making at the prestigious London Film School.
target_audience: Anyone who wants to become a director
Anyone with an interest in film, TV or corporate video direction

DID YOU KNOW THAT ACCORDING TO NBC NEWS 75% OF PEOPLE SUFFER FROM THE FEAR OF PUBLIC SPEAKING, OR FACING THE MEDIA?

MANAGE YOUR NERVES AND MASTER YOUR PRESENCE

courses.description:
Important:  This is an Intermediate Scrivener course.  Although someone new to Scrivener can learn how to use Scrivener from this course, it assumes some basic knowledge of things like creating a Scrivener Project file, creating folders and files, navigating in a Scrivener project, etc.


Save Time & Frustration Writing your Book by Easily Creating, Referencing & Tracking Character Information in Scrivener
The Character Worksheets included in Scrivener's Novel Template are very basic and static--something that you could do in any Word Processing software; but with Scrivener's ability to break up into relevant chunks, reorganize, track, associate, and group into collections--character profile information can be so much more dynamic and useful.
This course takes advantage of Scrivener 3's Bookmarks, Keywords,  Labels, and Quick Reference Panels.  Keywords and Labels apply to all versions of Scrivener including Scrivener for Windows.  Quick Reference Panels are available in Scrivener 2 and 3 and Bookmarks is a new feature in Scrivener 3.

Are you a Scrivener for Windows user and feeling left out?
If you have Scrivener for Windows, download the Scrivener 3 for Windows Beta version.  It still has a few things missing and certain things aren't working exactly the way they will be, but everything you are learning in this course is available in the Beta version. The link to the download will be included in the Bonus Section at the end of the class.

THIS IS A WORKSHOP—Important to Apply to a real project
This isn’t a lecture course that you just watch through.  It is important to apply it to a current, real writing project as you follow along in the course.  I would encourage you to do all of the Assignments throughout the course and submit them for review by your fellow classmates.  If you have any questions, be sure to ask them in the Q & A forum.
target_audience: Beginner through Experienced Scrivener Users
Novelists and Short Story Writers
Screenplay & TV Scriptwriters
Playwrights

objectives: Devenir un mircroinfluencer sur instagram

Ça y est je me suis lancé !: La régularité n'a que deux amis : le professionnalisme et le succès.

“La nouveauté, c'est la sensibilité de l'artiste.”

requirements: Un ordinateur, une bonne connexion internet et beaucoup de bonne humeur
courses.description:
Bonne nouvelle !!
Les micro influenceurs Instagram ont plus que jamais le vent en poupe. Finie l'époque où il fallait avoir des centaines de milliers d’abonnés pour cartonner sur Instagram. Les internautes veulent faire confiance aux gens qu'ils suivent, ils veulent pouvoir s'identifier à eux.


Envie de devenir micro-influenceur et d'être repéré et contacté par des marques sur Instagram ?
Je te propose cette formation complète et surtout concrète pour devenir un micro-influenceur sur Instagram et décrocher des partenariats rémunérés avec différentes marques et en faire ainsi une véritable source de revenu.
Cette formation courte et concise est le fruit de plusieurs années d'expériences sur Instagram que ça soit sur mon compte personnel ou sur celui de mes clients.
Elle te permettra de gagner du temps et de faire passer à la vitesse supérieure ton compte Instagram.
Dans cette formation je t'expliquerai  :
Pourquoi il est intéressant pour toi d'être micro-influenceur et pourquoi les micro-influenceurs sont de plus en plus sollicités par les marques ?
Quelle attitude adopter pour être crédible et authentique sur Instagram ?
Comment développer son compte Instagram et fidéliser sa communauté ?
Comment décrocher ses premiers partenariats rémunérés sur Instagram ?
Comment faire en sorte de toujours évoluer et ne pas laisser son compte stagner ?
Le format court et  straight to the point de la formation fait en sorte qu'elle se consomme assez facilement et que tu pourras rapidement mettre en pratique tous les conseils communiqués et ainsi voir les premiers résultats de manière rapide.
La formation est également accompagnée de différents supports te permettant de mieux visualiser et assimiler certains concepts expliqués dans les différents modules.


Cette formation s'adresse à toute personne :


Ayant un compte Instagram personnel et souhaitant devenir micro-influenceur
Déjà Micro-influenceur mais ne décrochant pas de partenariats rémunérés
Collabore déjà avec des marques mais souhaite décrocher encore plus de partenariats
Souhaite mettre en avant sa boutique en ligne ou vendre des formations en ligne
La question à te poser avant de te lancer sur Instagram :
Sur une échelle de 0 à 10, quel est ton niveau de motivation pour devenir Micro-influenceur sur Instagram ?
Si t’as réponse n’est pas comprise entre 7 et 10, je te recommande de suivre cette formation à un autre moment.
Pourquoi ?
Car je vais te donner un condensé de techniques et d’astuces à appliquer pour booster ton compte Instagram et décrocher des partenariats. Il te faudra donc beaucoup d’assiduité, de motivation et de persévérance sinon aucune de ces techniques ne fonctionnera pour toi et tu te sentiras frustré à la fin.


N'hésite pas à me suivre sur mon Instagram pour plus de contenu et d'astuces : iamsawssun
Très bonne formation à tous !

EDITING AUDIO – CONTENT: Initial Editing With Screencast Software Part 1
Initial Editing With Screencast Software Part 2

Editing Audio Content with Audio Software Part 1
Editing Audio Content with Audio Software Part 2

requirements: The ideal student is one who currently creates video or audio recordings related to online courses, YouTube, or podcasts, and wants to use software to edit the audio portion for professional sounding results. Students should have a basic understanding of digital audio and video, recording and playback, and should have a basic understanding of computers and software in general. This course does however start at a very low level to include and teach as many different levels of experience as possible.
courses.description:
Do you want to improve the overall quality of your vocal recordings for online courses, YouTube videos, voiceovers, narration, or other projects? Audacity FREE audio software and the techniques taught in this course and our other course “Audacity Professional Vocals for Courses Video & More Part 2” will get you the professional results you’ve been looking for.
Hi my name is Eric. I am a course creator and have learned many lessons throughout my recording experiences.  I created this course for anyone who wants to improve the quality of their audio vocal recordings for video or audio projects by learning the basics of audio recording and the Audacity audio recording and editing software.
In this course, “Part 1”, we will review and install Audacity FREE audio recording and editing software, to give you a thorough overview and to prepare you for “Part 2” where we use the software to clean up noise, mistakes, problems, and fix level issues and overall volume and clarity for a professional result…
We will cover:
·      An Audio Recording and Editing Overview
·      Introduction to Audacity
·      Audacity website and robust documentation and support sites
·      Installation instructions and demonstration for Audacity
·      Installation of third-party plug-ins
·      A detailed review of Audacity functions and tools
·      Recording audio with Audacity
·      A recording overview using screencast software
·      Initial audio editing outside of Audacity for preparation (applying to screencast or video software)
·      Exporting a udio from other projects for use in Audacity
·      Importing audio in to Audacity
·      Initial audio analysis and editing with Audacity
·      Practice challenges/homework assignments to give you hands-on experience
Take our course “Part 2” to learn more, using real life audio examples to meticulously clean up noise, mistakes, problems, and fix level issues and overall volume, clarity, and quality for a professional result, followed by exporting the final audio and importing into our screencast or video projects, and lastly a quick review of multi-track audio recording and mixing to take your audio to the next level. Part 2 also includes downloadable Audacity projects and audio files so you can follow along and practice with the actual projects used in the course.
Enroll in this course today to get started using Audacity audio software to get professional audio results for all of your audio and video projects.
target_audience: Students should take this course if they want to learn the installation and basics of Audacity audio recording and editing software in relation to videos, online courses, YouTube videos, podcasts, narration and voiceover projects, and more, as the first step in getting the best quality vocal audio recordings possible for many different types of projects.
Do not take this course if you do not currently, or do not plan on learning to, record and edit your own audio vocal files for audio and video projects, or have no computer experience.

courses.title: The Top Three Things That Sell Most Kindle Nonfiction Books
courses.bio: These Things Get More Book Sales Than Anything Else - Make Your Book Sell When Readers See It -6th course in series
objectives: Get continuous Kindle book sales... without marketing.
Optimize any nonfiction book so it gets the most possible sales.
Turn existing books into best-sellers.

Why Marketing Doesn't Sell the Most Book: Why Marketing Doesn't Sell the Most Books
Give Readers This and They'll Buy - Must: Give Readers This and They'll Buy - Must Watch
The One Part That Sells Most Books: The Part That Gets the Most Sales... By Far
The Secret to Getting 'How to' Titles to Work
Certain Words and Where They Need to Go
Your Big Pitch - The Most Effective Book: The First VERY IMPORTANT Part That Sells
The Three Part Story That Really Does Make Them Buy
Use the Power of Many Selling Titles
The Table of Contents That Really Sells: The Table of Contents That Really Sells

requirements: You will need to have, or plan to have, a book published.
courses.description:
6th course in the self-publishing series
Watch the First Three Lectures for Free
More than 1,700 students enrolled.

Jean Lurssen said, "Very good, comprehensive and sound advice. The course is well paced. I stayed glued to each lecture, because each one is filled with lots of great tips that make great sense. I've been wanting to create a kindle book for some time, but didn't know exactly what was required, or what would make one sell. I feel I know a lot more now."

If you have, or plan to have, a non-fiction book on Amazon, you need this information.
My name is Ian Stables, author of more than fifty Kindle books. I have had several best-sellers. One book remained a best-seller for over two years, without any further marketing  or promotion.
I have discovered what makes certain books outsell others. It's what makes a non-fiction book a best-seller and keeps it selling without any further promotion. In this course, I an going to reveal how you can do the same.

When you optimize your book a certain way, it will get the most possible sales. This will ensure your book remains in the best-sellers without any further marketing.
I am not teaching that you shouldn't use promotion. I am going to show you how to make your book continue to sell after your marketing campaign ends.

After you run a promotion, you usually get a spike in sales. This is because it is high up in the best-seller category. Very quickly, the sales drop and the book disappears.
Other books remain in the best-sellers, despite no marketing or promotion. Why does their book stay there and yours doesn't?
The answer is that their book has three parts optimized for sales. This means their book continues to sell well, pushing your book down and out of the best-sellers.
After three years, I discovered how to optimize these three areas. The result is that your book continues to sell and stays in the best-sellers. No further promotion needed.
I had a book that had no further promotion. It continued to outsell every other book I published for more than two years. I studied it to find out why. I also looked closely at other best-sellers to see what they did.
I discovered that there were three areas which were set up a certain way. This was why these books remained in the best-sellers.
In this course, I am going to teach you how to optimize your book for sales. When done this way, you well get the best possible sales results. No further promotion required. Just a simple campaign to get initial sales and then you don't need to do any more. Eventually, sales will naturally slump. In that case, just run a new promotion to bump it up again.
Watch the First Three Lectures for Free

Enroll now and optimize your non-fiction book so it CONTINUES TO SELL.
target_audience: This is for non-fiction authors
Not suitable for fiction authors

courses.description:
WEBを活用してビジネスをしているのならば、LPは制作できるようになっておかないといけません。
LPを制作できるかどうかで売上は何倍も変わってきます。
これまで僕は１つのプロモーションでLPを制作したのですが、これまで年間5000万の売上を年間２億まで伸ばしたのですがLP１つあるかないかでビジネスは大きく変わってきます。
見込み顧客を集めたい。
売上をあげたい。
と思っているのならばLP制作が必須です。
しかし・・・
「LPの魅力や効果はわかってるけど簡単ではない。」
という人もかなりいて実際に書いてみると何を書いていいのかわからない・・。
状態になりますよね。
このコースでは、そんなLPを書けない！
を解決して書けるようになる事に特化したコースです。
LPのロジックについても解説はしていきますが、まずはとにかく書けるようになることを徹底的に考えに考え抜かれた内容にしました。
まずはさっさとLPを作ってロジックは書いた後により質の高いものにするために学ぶという使い方がオススメです。
そして、最終的にLPのコンバージョン率を最大化するための方法やLP制作にオススメの方法についても解説していきますのでLP制作のオールインワンパッケージとして活用してください。


学習内容
・素人からでもランディングページを制作する3ステップ
・マネしてもオリジナルになるLPとはいったい何？
・成約率を何十倍にも引き上げるためにやるべき行動
・LPを実際に執筆する前に必ずやるべき事
・ランディングページを制作する３つの方法
・無料のツールで効率的にA/Bテストをする方法
target_audience: ランディングページを作って売り上げを上げたい方
素人でランディングページを作りたいが作れなくて困ってる方
LPを作ってみたは良いけど出来が納得できない方

courses.title: Create Epic Movie Scenes with Gemini & Google AI Studio p2
courses.bio: Master cinematic scene creation using Google Gemini, AI Studio, and cutting-edge generative AI tools.
requirements: No prior experience with AI or filmmaking is required.
A computer with internet access and a modern web browser (Google Chrome or Edge recommended).
A free Google account to access Gemini and Google AI Studio tools.
Basic familiarity with using online platforms and typing text prompts.
A creative mindset and willingness to experiment with generative AI.
courses.description:
Google AI Studio Unlock your creative potential by learning how to generate stunning cinematic scenes using the powerful combination of Google Gemini and Google AI Studio. In this course, you'll discover how to harness generative AI to bring your vision to life—no professional film crew or expensive software required.
Whether you're an aspiring filmmaker, digital artist, content creator, or simply curious about the future of storytelling, this course will guide you step-by-step through creating visually captivating movie-style scenes using text prompts, AI models, and advanced image-to-video technology.
You'll start with the fundamentals of Google AI Studio and Gemini, exploring the tools for prompt engineering, visual storytelling, and scene composition. From there, you'll move on to crafting dynamic characters, immersive environments, and dramatic lighting effects—all using AI.
We'll cover how to fine-tune your results, apply cinematic aesthetics, and even create motion from still images using AI video generation tools. You'll also get insights into optimizing your workflow, combining outputs from different Google AI tools, and exporting your creations for social media or film portfolios.
By the end of this course, you’ll be able to ideate, design, and produce AI-generated scenes worthy of a Hollywood trailer—all from your browser.
No coding or design experience needed—just your imagination and a willingness to explore the next frontier of storytelling.
Join us and start building your own epic movie scenes powered by the latest in generative AI.
target_audience: Aspiring filmmakers and storytellers who want to create cinematic scenes without a film crew or studio.
Content creators, YouTubers, and social media artists looking to enhance their visuals with AI-generated media.
Digital artists and designers interested in exploring generative AI for creative storytelling.
Anyone curious about Google Gemini, AI Studio, and the future of media creation using artificial intelligence.

courses.title: YouTube SEO Expert - Auf Nr. 1 der Suchergebnisse!
courses.bio: Mehr Aufmerksamkeit für deinen Kanal und deine Angebote durch Video-SEO bekommen
objectives: Keywords finden und einschätzen
Den YouTube-Algorithmus verstehen und nutzen
Optimale Titel, Beschreibungen und Tags kreieren
Mehr Klicks durch die YouTube-Suche bekommen
Neben den Videos anderer gezielt auftauchen
requirements: Für den Kurs solltest Du bereits mit den Grundlagen der Videoproduktion vertraut sein
courses.description:
Dieser YouTube Kurs ist für all diejenigen, die YouTube SEO lernen wollen, um mehr Klicks auf ihre Videos und dadurch mehr Aufmerksamkeit z.B für ihre Produkte oder Angebote bekommen wollen!
Ich mache Dich in drei Abschnitten zum YouTube SEO-Experten!


1. Keywords - Der Schlüssel zu deinem Erfolg
Keywords sind Schlüsselworte für eine Videos, die mit darüber entscheiden, ob dein Video gefunden-, oder nicht angezeigt wird. Ich erkläre wie ich meine Keywords finde, sie einschätze und schlussendlich daraus die Stichwörter für meine Videos ermittle.Einfach und kompakt erklärt!
2. Ranking - Den YouTube-Algorithmus verstehen
Bei YouTube entscheidet der Algorithmus, welche Videos gefeatured werden und z.B auf der Startseite, oder in den Suchergebnissen ganz oben landen.
In diesem Segment gebe ich Dir einen Einblick auf welche Richtwerte du besonders achten solltest und ich gewichte sie in ihrer Bedeutsamtkeit. Du findest heraus, was der Keyfaktor auf YouTube ist und lernst genau darauf deine Videos zu optimieren!
3. META-Daten - Das Erfolgsrezept für mehr Klicks und Abonnenten
Die Klicks eines Videos stehen und fallen mit einem optimalen Titel, einer intelligenten Beschreibung und passenden Tags. Du erfährst meine best practices direkt am Beispiel. Ich habe den Kurs so angelegt, dass er direkt zum selber machen einlädt und du das gelernte direkt umsetzen können wirst.
4 Gründe, weshalb Du dich jetzt direkt in den Kurs eintragen solltest!


Kompakt: Wofür andere 10 Stunden brauchen, erkläre ich Dir kompakt in 1,5 Stunden durchgeplanten Videolektionen!
Umfangreich: Hier geht es um YouTube SEO von A-Z. Du bist am Ende dieses Kurses ein waschechter YouTube-SEO Experte!
Anschaulich: YouTube-SEO ist ein eher theoretisches Thema - ich vermittle es Dir aber so praxisnah und anschaulich wie möglich. Zum Beispiel mit drei detaillierten Case Studies, in denen das Gelernte angewendet wird.
Erfahrung: Wer könnte dir das Optimieren deiner Videos es besser beibringen, als jemand, der schon über 700 Videos für YouTube gemacht und optimiert hat, die mehr als 20.000.000 Aufrufe erzielten?


Warum ich diesen Kurs für Dich erstellt habe
Auf YouTube gibt es unglaublich viele geniale Videos! Videos, die anders sind als der Einheitsbrei, Videos deren Qualität teilweise unvergleichlich ist. Doch das Problem: Diese Videos bekommen einfach zu wenig Aufmerksamkeit! Sie sind schlichtweg nicht SEO-Optimiert und das finde ich persönlich unglaublich schade. Mit diesem Kurs möchte ich dafür sorgen, dass das deinen Inhalten nicht passiert! Deshalb gebe ich mein YouTube-SEO Wissen an dich weiter!
Ich produziere bis heute hochwertige Tutorials für eine wachsende Zuschauerschaft von mehr als 75000 Abonnenten. Meine Videos erreichen insgesamt mehr als 17 Millionen begeisterte Zuschauer. Hauptsächlich, weil ich meine Videos auf die Suche optimiere. Deshalb kommen auch mehr als 50% meiner Aufrufe durch die YouTube-Suche!
Heute  bin ich von YouTube-Zertifiziert, stehe in engem Kontakt zu Google und gebe mein umfangreiches YouTube-KnowHow in Kursen und in der Beratung von Unternehmen weiter.
target_audience: Jeder, der seine Videos auf die Nummer 1 der Suchergebnisse bringen möchte
Alle, die YouTube als Marketingtool nutzen und sich eine Reichweite aufbauen wollen

courses.title: Creating Cartoon Animation Film with AI
courses.bio: Learn how to create cartoon animation films using Leonardo AI, Runway ML, Eleven Labs, Adobe Express, and Veed IO
objectives: Learning how to generate cartoon film ideas, titles, outlines, content scripts using ChatGPT
Learning how to use Leonardo AI text and Runway ML to generate cartoon character and scene images
Learning how to use Big Speak AI and Eleven Labs to convert content script to realistic human voice
Learning how to use Metademolab and Adobe Express to animate cartoon characters
Learning how to use edit the cartoon film using Veed IO

Introduction: Whom This Course is Intended for?
AI Tools & Resources: Where to Find & Download Cartoon Animation Videos
How Can AI Help You to Create Cartoon An: How Can AI Help You to Create Cartoon Animation Film?
Generating Film Ideas & Outlines Using C: Generating Film Ideas & Outlines Using ChatGPT
Project 1: Creating Cartoon Animation Fi: Generating Content Script for Cartoon Film 1
Generating Cartoon Character & Scene Images with Leonardo AI
Converting Content Script to Voice with Big Speak AI
Editing Cartoon Film 1 Using Veed IO
Project 2: Creating Cartoon Animation Fi: Generating Content Script for Cartoon Film 2
Generating Scene Images with Runway ML
Converting Conversation Text to Voice with Eleven Labs
Editing Cartoon Film 2 Using Veed IO
Monetising Cartoon Animation Film: How to Monetise Cartoon Animation Film?

requirements: No previous experience in cartoon animation or filmmaking is required
Willingness to learn and be creative
courses.description:
Welcome to Creating Cartoon Animation Film with AI course. This is basically an extensive project based course where you will be guided step by step on how to create and edit short cartoon animation films from scratch utilising a combination of AI tools such as Runway ML and Leonardo AI for generating character and scene images, ChatGPT for generating film ideas, outlines, titles, and scripts, Big Speak AI for converting content script text to realistic human voice, Veed IO for editing the film, and Sketch Meta Demo Lab for animating the characters and the scenes in the cartoon film. In this course, you will realise that outsourcing the vast majority of work to AI tools will not only save a lot of your time and efforts but also it will totally change your perspective on the cartoon filmmaking process as the amount of work had to be done could be significantly reduced without lowering the quality of the film itself. In the introduction session, you will learn how AI tools can help you to create cartoon animation films as well as how to combine them all to get the best result possible. Then, continued by learning how to write effective ChatGPT prompts to use for generating film content ideas and outlines. Once you choose which idea and outline that you want to pick for your cartoon film, then you will learn step by step on how to start your first cartoon film project from scratch, firstly we will use ChatGPT to generate the cartoon content character, narration, and even conversation between characters. Afterward, those texts will be converted to super realistic human voices using AI tools like Big Speak A. Once you already have the narration and character voices, the next thing that you will learn is to utilise text to image generators like Leonardo AI and Runway ML to generate you character and scene images that you want. Obviously, when it comes to generating characters, you would need to generate the same character face for a variety of scenes and expressions, therefore, you will also learn specifically how to write the prompt for generating identical character faces in different scenes. Then, once all the characters have been created, you will learn how to use Meta Demo Lab to animate the characters where you can turn your creative ideas to cool cartoon animation. Once you have the voices and animated characters scenes, you will learn step by step on how to combine them together using Veed IO which is one of the best browser based editing software.
Beside the film creation, you are also going to learn other essential knowledge that you need to have as a cartoon filmmaker, in the next session, you will learn how to design interesting film thumbnail to attract curiosity of your potential audience, you will learn how to build and grow your audience on social media platforms like Tiktok and Youtube, as well as learning several different ways to monetise your cartoon film contents and potentially start your own cartoon film business as you start generating income from different sources.
Below are things that you are going to learn from this course:
Learning how to generate cartoon film ideas, titles, outlines, content scripts using ChatGPT
Learning how to use Leonardo AI text and Runway ML to generate cartoon character and scene images
Learning how to use Big Speak AI and Eleven Labs to convert content script to realistic human voice
Learning how to use Meta Demo Lab and Adobe Express to animate cartoon characters
Learning how to use edit the cartoon film using Veed IO
Learning several different ways to monetise cartoon contents
Learning several efficient strategies to build and grow audience
target_audience: People who are interested to learn how to utilise AI tools for cartoon filmmaking
People who are interested to learn cartoon animation using Adobe Express and Metademolab
Content creators who want to integrate cartoon related contents to their main content

objectives: Plan a book in three simple steps

This Quick Plan Makes Book Writing Easie: Easiest Way to List Your Chapters

Secrets to Easier, Faster, and Better Wr: What's the Easiest Way to Write?
How to Dramatically Speed Up Your Writing
The Ultimate Three Step Edit Method: How to Edit Without the Headache
The Ultimate Way to Edit Your Writing
Make Sure Readers Love Your Book
Conclusion: How Do I Remember All This?: Conclusion: How Do I Remember All This?

requirements: Computer and internet connection
Have an Amazon Kindle account, or will get one
Basic ability to write and spell
courses.description:
Please note: For non-fiction writers.
This will transform your nonfiction book writing
Do you wish writing a book was easier and faster? Are you struggling with writing one?
Well, there is actually an easier and faster way.
Author of more than 50 books uses a unique method. He's used it to write most of his books, most of which have been successful.
This method will...
- Make writing a nonfiction book as easy as answering simple questions
- Allow you to write your book three times faster
- Permanently remove writer's block (You'll always know what to write next and what words to use.)
The most common problem people have writing a book is what to actually say. In other words, what to write. Not only that, but also how to word it so it makes sense.
Working all this out is the main reason writing a book is often hard and why it takes so long.


The solution is having simple prompts to instantly spark the best words to use.
This will change the way you write books forever.
In my years of writing, I found that the best prompts of all are questions. Not any questions but ones that make you instantly know what to say. You will never get writer's block.
This is exactly what this course shows you how to do. Once you understand how to do this, you'll never go back to your old way.
Ian Stables, author of more than 50 Kindle books found a new revolutionary nonfiction book writing method that's way easier than the normal way. Anyone can do it.
This is different to anything you've ever seen before.
Writing a nonfiction book has never been easier or faster. You'll be amazed how effective this method is.
Once you start using this method, you'll never want to use any other method again.
It's as simple as answering questions about something you know.
My name is Ian Stables, author of more than 50 Kindle books. Since I discovered this method, writing books has been so much easier and quicker.
In fact, you can do more than just write books with this process. You can use it to write anything, articles, essays, Kindle book descriptions, Udemy course descriptions, blog posts, emails, and even business reports. It's that versatile.
I taught this to a university student. She said it was a breakthrough for her. She said it made writing anything far easier and faster.
Student review
Nothing  pleases me more than a book that seems to answer each and every  question I have in mind, and no other book does it better than this  book.  I felt as though Ian was speaking directly to my unspoken  concerns.  From  the unbelievably  great pre-introduction, which  completely captivated  my interest, all the way through the T of C, I  was fascinated and entirely educated.
Now that I have finished  this course, I can only heap more praise on the instructor:  he knows  precisely what he wants his students to know and exactly how they can do  it if they follow his instructions.
Yes, Ian, I know your  students and your readers love the way you  show the way.  You   certainly have a layer of fans that you can count on to keep looking for  anything (book or course) you do.
Thank you so much.
- Lillian
I used to write my books using the traditional approach. I'd pick my subject and create a list of topics. Then I'd start to write.
This often involved a lot of head scratching. I used to run into road blocks many times, wondering what to write next and how to word it. Plus, the long editing process at the end was long and arduous.
To top it all, the book was not as successful as I hoped.
So I began to read everything I could find on the subject of writing. I spent many hours reading books, taking online courses, and watching Youtube videos. I found some really good ideas.
However, the real game-changer was when I discovered a much better way. It literally transformed how I wrote books.
With this new process, writing books became much easier, faster, and more enjoyable too. There was no more long editing process. What's more, I began to produce books I knew a lot of readers wanted.
Writing a book is so much easier and faster when you just answer questions.
Here's an example to prove this works
Think about it. Imagine you were asked to stand up for 30 minutes and tell a group all about your hobby. This would be daunting. You would be scrabbling about trying to decide what to say.
Instead, how much easier would it be if they asked you questions and you just answered them?
No need to worry about what to talk about anymore. Plus, answering questions are a lot easier. The answers just flow off your tongue.
This is how much easier it will be writing your books.
Here are some advantages of this process:
- Writing will be a lot easier, faster, and even more enjoyable.
- No writer's block. You will always know what to write. Words just flow.
- Write a book introduction that compels readers to want your book.
In this course:
Introduction: You'll learn how to use questions to make writing anything easy.
Section 2: How to create a complete book outline in minutes using just questions.
Section 3: The easy way to write your book using simple questions without getting writer's block.
Section 4/5: The best book introduction and conclusion structure.
Section 6: My unique 3 step foolproof editing method that makes every mistake stand out. (Makes your book error free.)
Join 7,622 students to learn this new easier and faster book writing method.
Enroll now and make your book writing easier and faster from today.
Please note: This is for non-fiction writers.
target_audience: Non-fiction authors
Amazon Kindle authors
People who want to write a Kindle book
Want to write practical books that help and instruct others

Writing Leads for Radio and TV
Strategy for Writing Lead, Body and Closing News

requirements: No special requirements are needed
courses.description:
This course is designed to equip students with basic skills and techniques for writing effective and engaging news scripts for various media platforms, including television, radio, and digital media. Students will learn journalistic principles with a focus on accuracy, clarity, and objectivity, while also understanding how to craft stories that engage audiences.
The main topics include understanding news values, structuring news scripts, writing for the ear and eye, and adapting content for various formats and target audiences. Emphasis will be placed on developing clear and concise writing styles, fact-checking, and adhering to journalistic ethical standards. Through practical exercises, workshops, and real-world assignments, students will gain hands-on experience in writing scripts under tight deadlines and responding to the fast-paced nature of news production. Collaborative feedback sessions will refine their skills and build confidence in their abilities.
Mater will be divided into 2 sections:
Hard news script: students will learn how to write hard news scripts
Writing soft news: students will learn how to write soft news scripts
By the end of this course, students will be able to create professional-quality news scripts, demonstrate critical thinking in selecting and presenting news, and adapt their writing to various media contexts. This course is ideal for aspiring journalists, content creators, and anyone interested in mastering the art of news writing.
target_audience: This course is ideal for aspiring journalists, content creators, and anyone who wants to master the art of news writing

courses.title: Crowdfunding per blog, podcast e canali YouTube con Patreon
courses.bio: Scopri come monetizzare e aumentare il coinvolgimento della tua audience attraverso il crowdfunding su Patreon
objectives: Conoscerai i vari tipi di crowdfunding e saprei scegliere la tipologia e la piattaforma più adatte al tuo progetto.
Saprai come creare una campagna di crowdfunding efficace per monetizzare i tuoi contenuti.
Avrai un'idea chiara di come funziona il crowdfunding su Patreon dal punto di vista economico (transazioni, spese, pagamenti)
Potrai comunicare in modo diretto con la tua community gratuitamente.
Organizzerai tutte le informazioni sui tuoi follower e su come supportano il tuo progetto senza bisogno di un CRM.
Pubblicherai contenuti online, anche ad accesso riservato, senza bisogno di un blog o un account social e in modo gratuito.
requirements: Hai un computer per creare e gestire la campagna di crowdfunding su Patreon?
Hai un progetto editoriale online (per esempio un blog, un podcast, un canale YouTube, ecc.) e vuoi monetizzarlo?
(Opzionale) Hai uno smartphone per creare e pubblicare video con la app di Patreon?
courses.description:
C'è una cosa che non si dice molto in giro: il miglior modo per finanziare un progetto digitale, dal blog al canale YouTube passando per il podcast, non è la pubblicità.
Per guadagnare 1 € con la pubblicità ti servono 1000 visualizzazioni del tuo contenuto, mentre ti basta convincere 1 persona ad offrirti l'equivalente di un caffè. Molte persone, se si uniscono e credono nel tuo progetto, pur finanziandoti con pochi euro l'una, possono permetterti di raccogliere grandi cifre.
Si chiama Crowdfunding: chiedere poco a molti. È un punto di svolta in un progetto digitale perché ti permette non solo di monetizzare il tuo lavoro, ma anche di coinvolgere le persone e fare community.
In questo corso ti spiegherò come ho raccolto più di €100.000 con la mia prima campagna di crowdfunding per finanziare il mio podcast Strategia Digitale ( http://strategiadigitale.info )
Parleremo in particolare di:
Cos'è il crowdfunding e come funziona
Quali tipi di crowdfunding esistono
Come scegliere la piattaforma di crowdfunding
Come fare crowdfunding se pubblichi contenuti online
E poi andremo nel dettaglio su come creare una campagna di crowdfunding sulla piattaforma Patreon:
Pubblicare contenuti riservati ai finanziatori
Creare ricompense e premi per i finanziatori in modo efficace
Come funzionano i pagamenti e gli aspetti fiscali
Quali sono gli errori da evitare nel creare la tua prima campagna
Come creare una campagna di crowdfunding di successo per il tuo blog, podcast o progetto video.
target_audience: Blogger
Giornalisti online
Youtuber
Podcaster
Creatori di video online
Gestori di social media e community online
Scrittori di ebook
Editori digitali
Artisti e creativi

courses.title: 【Canva】生成AIによる自動デザインを学ぼう！ -AIを駆使したデザイン業務の効率化/クリエイティブ活動-
courses.bio: 世界中で利用されているデザインプラットフォームCanvaの、生成AI機能を活用しよう！デザインが苦手な方、AIの経験が無い方でも大丈夫。最新の生成AI技術を統合し、デザイン業務を自動化して、新たな表現手法を生み出しましょう！
objectives: CanvaのAI機能の基礎と、使いこなす技術を学びます。
最新の生成AI技術を駆使した自動デザインを包括的に習得します。
Canva上で、最新のAIモデルを利用したドキュメント生成、画像生成、動画生成、音声生成、AIアバター生成、コード生成などについて学びます。
AI初心者の方でも、本格的なAI自動デザインを楽しむことができます。
アイデアを瞬時に形にする方法を学びます。
requirements: デザインの知識、経験は不要です。
AIに関する知識、経験は不要です。
最新の情報をカバーしていない可能性があります。2025年9月までの情報を元にした講座です。
Canvaの有料プランに加入すると利便性が向上しますが、無料の範囲で講義は十分受講可能です。
環境はWindowsでもMacでもLinuxでも大丈夫です。
Canvaのアカウント開設が必要です。
courses.description:
「【Canva】AIによる自動デザインを学ぼう！」は、最新のAI技術を駆使して高品質のビジュアルコンテンツを瞬時に作成したいと考えるすべての方のための講座です。
AI初心者の方でも、本格的なAI自動デザインを楽しむことができます。


本講座では、世界中で利用されているデザインプラットフォームCanvaに搭載された、強力なAI機能群「Magic Studio」を使いこなし、テキスト入力や簡単な指示だけで画像、動画、プレゼンテーション資料などを自動生成する技術を学びます 。


Magic Studioとは、テキストから画像や動画を生成したり、文章を作成したり、さらにはAIアバターにナレーションをさせたりと、これまで専門的なスキルや多くの時間を必要としたクリエイティブ作業を自動化するAIツール群です 。
この技術により、Canvaは単なるデザインツールから、あなたのアイデアを瞬時に形にする強力なAIアシスタントへと進化します。
デザインに苦手意識がある方、SNSやマーケティングのコンテンツ制作を効率化したい方、最新のAI活用術をいち早く習得したい方に最適です 。


講座の内容は以下の通りです。
Section1. AIによる画像・文章コンテンツの自動生成
→ テキストから画像を生成する「Magic Media」や、文章を自動作成する「Magic Write」を使いこなし、SNS投稿やブログ用のコンテンツを効率的に作成します 。
Section2. AIによるプレゼン資料と動画の高速作成
→ 簡単な指示文からプレゼン資料全体を自動生成する技術を学びます。さらに、テキストから動画を生成し、AIアバターにナレーションをさせることで、解説動画などを顔出し不要で簡単に制作する方法を習得します 。
target_audience: AIを活用してアイデアを形にしたいすべての方。
デザイン関係で、最新の生成AIができることを一通り試したい方。
AIを使った自動化により、デザイン業務を効率化したい方。
クリエイティブ活動に様々な生成AIを活用したい方。
コスパ良く最新のAIのトレンドに追従したい方。
ウェブサイトやプレゼン資料などのプロトタイプを素早く構築したい方。

courses.title: Kindle Publishing Masterclass
courses.bio: Kindle Publishing with Amazon: A Guide to Starting a Business Selling Books On-Demand with Kindle Direct Publishing
objectives: Understand exactly what self-publishing is and the best way to do it in 2018 and beyond.
Learn how to successfully think about self-publishing and how to see it as a business.
Effectively set time lines for achieving income goals.
Learn to predict the number of books needed to achieve income goals.
Learn the 4 step process to self-publishing a book.
Understand the role of niches in a modern self-publishing business.
Learn the 2 styles of self-publishing with KDP i.e. wide publishing vs. narrow publishing and which is best.
Grasp the 3 most effective methods for finding niches without brainstorming.
Learn to find 100s of topics to publish books on again without brainstorming for hours.
Grasp the importance of quality control for self-publishing.
Understand how to create full and robust outlines to increase the readability of your books and make writing easier.
Learn the exact resources a proper outline should contain and which resources are often overlooked.
Gain overall guidance for building a solid team of productive freelancers.
Guidance for hiring your first freelancer.
Learn the exact amounts of money freelancers should be paid for every type of task.
Understand which tasks should be outsourced.
Learn the best countries to hire from to get the most skilled workers without overpaying.
Learn to manage a team effectively for good relationships
Learn to properly assign work and create effective workflows for books written.
Understand how to teach and manage an illustrator to design beautiful book covers that will stand out over other self-published books.
Learn the 3 phases every book must go through before being published to generate long-term income.
Fully grasp how to format and upload your book.
requirements: An ability to read and write in English.
An ability to proofread and make simple grammatical changes to documents.
An ability to focus and stay consistent.
An ability to see the bigger picture when just getting started.
A word processor, i.e. Microsoft Word, a computer, and an internet connection.
Money to invest. Minimum should be about $600.00 recommended amount is $3,000-$5,000.00 USD.
Bank account with routing and account number to receive direct deposits of royalties each month.
courses.description:
NOTE: Be sure to visit our blog before purchasing if you want a discount on the course price.
This course is best suited for three types of people:
A person looking to publish their first book, or scale their publishing operations, profitably.
A person looking to make money online or someone who desires "passive income".
Anyone looking to start a business, especially someone who wants to work from home.
There is much that the course will teach you.
If you are someone who likes to fully understand the details of things then you will enjoy this course. We will be upfront and honest this course is REALISTIC and PRACTICAL. The point of the course is to teach you how to successfully build a kindle publishing business that will generate predicable income through royalties each month. This course is ABSOLUTELY not a get-rich quick scheme, and we are NOT trying to sell you dreams.
Making full-time money online will require hard work and patience.
We discuss at length, the amount of money you can expect to earn per book and per month with our recommended publishing style and also in today's somewhat crowded marketplace. But don't let the idea of hard work discourage you. Self-Publishing is still in it's infancy stages so there is much room for growth and there is definitely room for you.
This is why the 2nd module in the course deals only with mindset.
To be successful in Kindle Publishing or to successfully start a business your mindset is very important. So we deal with this topic in the beginning by studying the thoughts and advice of two successful business men (Felix Dennis and Gary Vaynerchuck). Quick note: Felix Dennis made his fortunes in publishing so his advice is very pertinent to us as digital publishers.
You will learn the history of self-publishing and you will learn the best strategies for today's crowded marketplace. It is impossible to list everything you will learn in this course as it is over 8 hours in length. But no stone is left not turned.
You will understand how to research topics for books without spending hours brainstorming, you will understand how to make robust outlines for valuable books and the book formatting process will be explained in detail. And you will follow along with the instructor to submit your work to KDP.
Please read the following two sections to get a general overview of the different sections of the course and also to understand some other things you will learn:
7 Sections of the Kindle Publishing Masterclass:
Section 1: Introduction to Self-Publishing
Get a full introduction to the course and self-publishing. Learn all about your instructor, and his background. Understand exactly what self-publishing is and the best way to do it in 2017. In depth topics like: when you can expect success, and the best 4-step process for publishing a book will be discussed in this module as well.
Section 2: Mindset
Success is all mental. Your life, your business, and your world, are all a result of how you think. Learn how to think about self-publishing and how to think about business in this module. Module 1 discusses mindset, realistic goal setting, and how to accurately predict the number of books and the amount of money you will need to reach a particular income goal with self-publishing.
Section 3: Niche Selection
Selecting a niche is very important. In this module you will learn everything about the role of niches in your publishing operation. Finish this module to learn: A unique publishing strategy that will future-proof your business; The 3 best methods for finding niches without brainstorming; And learn how to find 100's of topics to publish books on.
Section  4: Outlining
Quality control is HUGE in self-publishing. And making proper outlines for your books will make a big difference in the readability of your works and the amount of value you will provide your readers. Outlines should contain information from multiple sources. Many of these resources are overlooked and in this module we learn how to make a proper outline that will make the task of writing a book much simpler.
Section 5: Outsourcing and Building Your Team
A good team will make achieving your goals much simpler. This module is all about hiring your first team members. You will learn the exact amounts of money you should be paying for every task when outsourcing. You will learn exactly which tasks should be outsourced when you are getting started and you will even learn the best countries to hire freelancers from to get the best skills without overpaying. The goal of module 4 is to help you build a solid team of trustworthy workers at a profitable price.
Section 6: Getting Your Books Written and Covers Designed
In this module you will learn how to properly assign work and create effective workflows for getting your books written and your covers designed. Module 5 is about managing your team and creating a good relationship. Module 5 also deals extensively with book cover design, and how to work with your cover designer to get book covers created that look professional and stand out over other self-published books.
Section 7: The Publishing Process Explained: Proofread, Publish, Promote (PPP)
In this module you will learn the 3 phases that every book must go though to have the highest quality and the best chance for generating long term predictable income. The goal of this module is to get your book formatted, uploaded, and published with the highest quality to generate a predictable monthly income from consistent sales.
Course Resources:
Every video contains worksheets which outline the important facts from the video, so you can quickly revisit any topic at a later date and remember what you were taught, without having to watch an entire video.
Worksheets for every video: These worksheets outline the important facts, lessons, and websites, so you can revisit and remember everything you are taught without having to watch the entire video multiple times.
Niche List: This worksheet contains over 100 unique niches. These niches will be used in the course to help you build a brand.
Goal Setting Worksheet: An outline and explanation of the exact math you should be performing to estimate all aspects of your future income and achieving it.
Job descriptions: Exact scripts for job descriptions that should be copy and pasted online to get the highest quality applicants at the most profitable prices.
Help from the instructor: Any person who purchases the course will get the course instructor's contact information (email address). Anyone who takes the class becomes a client and you can email the instructor and have your questions answered personally. The instructor will try to help you as best as possible and all responses are usually sent within 24 hours.
Here are some things you will learn from the course:
A straight forward, detailed guide to build a real online business that generates predictable monthly income.
How a normal college educated corporate worker replaced his full-time income by self-publishing books online.
The importance of the holiday season (Q4) in a self-publishing business and how much you can expect your income to surge in these months.
A method for earning anywhere from $500.00 to $3,000.00(+) per month in fairly passive income from royalties earned through book sales.
Why a self-publishing business is the same as investing in real estate and how a self-publishing business is actually a better investment.
The best mindset for starting a business and how to properly think about self-publishing.
The exact amounts of money that are needed to start a self-publishing business and which amounts of money will provide the best chances at success.
A method for getting started with no money. And sincere honest advice for anyone starting this way.
Which platforms are the best for building a successful self-publishing business in 2017.
How to properly price your books, to get the best feedback from readers and the most sales.
An experience based method for getting book covers that grab attention, look professional, and make your books stand out from the competition.
4 simple things needed to get started successfully.
A general timeline of when you can expect to be earning consistent predictable income from self-publishing, the things that will increase your chances at success, and the things that will diminish your chances at success.
How to properly set goals when getting started.
How to accurately and realistically estimate the amount of time, books, and money you will need to achieve any reasonable level of income with self-publishing.
The best way to maximize any investment in self-publishing to generate the most income.
An age-old method for saving money to invest in this business and 4 additional methods for quickly making money to get your business started.
An honest evaluation of debt and how it should be used in your business.
A 4-Step publishing process. That is and repeatable.
The 1 characteristic of all high earning self-publishers and a strategy for achieving similarly high levels of success over time.
Exactly what your biggest struggle will be when just getting started with self-publishing and ways to deal with it.
A simple hack for interacting with outsourced workers on Upwork that will leave you with a perfect client profile and make freelancers WANT to work for you.
What mindset you should have when self-publishing that will make progress and scaling easy and provide you the best opportunity to succeed in the long-term.
The two different self-publishing strategies that you can employ when getting started, which is the best, and why.
The best publishing method that is future-proof and will GROW over time even as the self-publishing marketplace becomes more crowded.
2 simple methods for finding book topics that will require little to no brainstorming.
How other self-publishers are competing against you and their exact publishing strategy will be explained.
An effective method for building a powerful and recognizable brand.
How to make effective book outlines that will make the job of writing and outsourcing books much easier.
5 different sources of information that should be used when creating an outline.
The best way to think about your writers so they create books that are extremely high quality.
A powerful method to write your own books from beginning to end within almost any deadline.
How to create an easy list that all your books should end with that will provide more value to the reader, and increase the chances of readers enjoying the book more.
A simple resource that should be added to all your books that will increase the number of pages in the book, keep readers engaged, and take almost no effort to create.
How to effectively outsource work in your self-publishing business.
The 3 best countries for outsource writing. These countries will provide amazing quality with very low costs.
The 2 best countries for outsourcing your book covers. Illustrators from these countries will be very talented, make beautiful designs, and have low cost.
Where to purchase high resolution stock photography for your books and book covers at very low cost and have a huge selection.
A clear method and set of instructions for building your first team of workers to reach your income goals.
The exact amounts of money you should pay outsourced workers for completing different types of tasks.
An experience based and theory based method for getting value from bad outsourced work.
How long a self-published book should be, how to deal with book length over the long-term, and the exact number of pages a book should be to get the best feedback from readers.
How to format books and apply styles for the best digital viewing experiencing.
How to format books and apply styles for print publication.
The theory of typefaces and fonts, their role in viewing media, and which fonts are the best for digital and print viewing.
An easy method for turning a basic 20 page outsourced eBook book to 84 pages digitally and 68 pages in print while following all of the Kindle Publishing Formatting Guidelines.
All the principles of proper book cover design and how to make the cover design process easier for your illustrator to get more output.
The exact workflow that should be used with your book cover designer to produce the most content, in the shortest amount of time, with the highest quality.
How to write an effective Book Blurb / Product Description and a method for easily outsourcing most of this task effectively.
How to select an effective title and subtitle for your books that will give your books more visibility and more sales over the long-term.
NOTE: Be sure to visit our blog before purchasing if you want a discount on the course price.
Course Lasted Updated: October 2018
target_audience: Anyone who desires to write their own book.
Seekers of "passive income".
Those who want to start an internet business.
People curious about learning the self-publishing process.
Beginner publishers looking to successfully scale their business.

courses.title: Easy Income mit KI & Kindle: Passives Einkommen mit Amazon

objectives: Starte deinen Durchbruch und generiere passives Einkommen mit Amazon KDP!

courses.description:
Easy Income mit KI & Kindle: Dein Schritt zu passivem Einkommen ohne eigene Inhalte!
Möchtest du ein profitables Online-Business aufbauen, ohne auch nur eine Seite Text schreiben zu müssen? Willkommen zu unserem exklusiven Kurs Easy Income mit KI & Kindle! Hier lernst du, wie du mit „No-Content“-Büchern (wie Notizbüchern, Planern und Logbüchern) auf Amazon Erfolg haben kannst – ganz ohne Vorwissen oder technische Vorkenntnisse.
Was dich in diesem Kurs erwartet: In 20 detaillierten Lektionen führen wir dich durch den gesamten Prozess, von der Planung bis zur Veröffentlichung deines ersten No-Content-Buchs. Wir decken bewährte Strategien und die wichtigsten Tools ab, die du für die Erstellung und Vermarktung deiner KDP-Bücher brauchst. Du wirst lernen, wie du die perfekte Nische findest, die Bestseller-Strategien nutzt und dein Einkommen stetig wachsen lässt.
Warum Easy Income mit Amazon KI & Kindle genau der richtige Kurs für dich ist:
Keine Schreibkenntnisse nötig:
Du erfährst, wie du Bücher erstellst, die sich von selbst verkaufen, ganz ohne eigene Inhalte.
Direkt anwendbare Erfolgsstrategien:
Profitiere von Tipps und Tricks, die dir helfen, No-Content-Bücher zu erstellen, die bei Lesern und Käufern gut ankommen.
Einfacher Einstieg für jedes Level:
Dieser Kurs ist perfekt für Anfänger und Fortgeschrittene, die ein passives Einkommensmodell aufbauen möchten.
Passives Einkommen, das wächst:
Lerne, wie du ein Einkommen generierst, das nachhaltig und ortsunabhängig ist.
Globale Reichweite:
Durch Amazon erreichst du Millionen von Kunden weltweit – wir zeigen dir, wie du diese Reichweite optimal nutzt!
Das wirst du lernen:
Die Grundlagen von Amazon KDP und das volle Potenzial von No-Content-Büchern
Nischenfindung und Marktanalyse, um genau die Bücher zu erstellen, die Käufer suchen
Schritt-für-Schritt-Anleitungen zur Buchgestaltung ohne eigene Inhalte
Tipps zur Vermarktung und Maximierung deines passiven Einkommens
Für wen ist dieser Kurs geeignet?
Einsteiger und Unternehmer, die ein skalierbares und passives Geschäftsmodell aufbauen möchten
Selbstständige und Kreative, die Amazon KDP als Einkommensquelle nutzen möchten, ohne eigene Inhalte zu erstellen
Nebenverdiener und Digital Nomads, die auf der Suche nach einem ortsunabhängigen Einkommensstrom sind
Melde dich jetzt an und lerne, wie du mit No-Content-Büchern auf Amazon passives Einkommen generierst. Starte heute deine Reise zum Easy Income und mache den ersten Schritt in Richtung finanzielle Freiheit!
target_audience: Der Kurs richtet sich an alle, die mit No Content-Büchern passive Einnahmen generieren möchten.
Amazon Autoren, die gerne noch mehr Geld mit KDP (Kindle Direct Publishing) verdienen möchten
Jede Person, die Geld im Internet verdienen möchte, und die sich für das Thema passives Einkommen interessiert
Start Ups, die gerne Notizbücher und andere No Content oder Low Content Bücher verkaufen möchten
An alle, die sich gerne ein Nebeneinkommen aufbauen wollen

courses.title: Starting A KDP Business Without Doing The Writing Yourself
courses.bio: Learn How To Start A Kindle Direct Publishing Business Without Writing the Book Yourself!
objectives: Publish their kindle book on Amazon Kindle.
Know how to outsource and get an expert to write their first book for them.

courses.description:
Introducing the Course: Creating GIFs with Microsoft PowerPoint
Welcome to our exciting new course on creating GIFs using Microsoft PowerPoint! In this course, we will delve into the fascinating world of animation and visual storytelling, leveraging the powerful tools available in PowerPoint to bring your ideas to life. Whether you're a seasoned PowerPoint user or a complete beginner, this course is designed to equip you with the skills and knowledge needed to create captivating GIFs with ease.
Course Objectives:
Mastering PowerPoint Animation: You will learn how to harness the full potential of PowerPoint's animation features to create dynamic and visually appealing GIFs.
Understanding GIF Creation: We will explore the concept of GIFs and their applications, as well as the benefits of using them in various contexts, from social media marketing to educational content.
Practical Hands-On Experience: Through guided tutorials and exercises, you will have the opportunity to apply what you've learned and create your own GIFs from scratch.
Optimizing Workflow: You will discover tips and tricks for streamlining your workflow and maximizing efficiency when working with PowerPoint to create GIFs.
Course Requirements:
Access to a Computer: To participate in this course, you will need access to a computer with Microsoft PowerPoint installed. Ideally, you should have the Office 365 subscription version of PowerPoint, as it offers the most up-to-date features and functionalities.
Willingness to Learn: A curious and open-minded attitude is key to success in this course. Whether you're a novice or an experienced PowerPoint user, approaching the material with a willingness to learn and experiment will greatly enhance your learning experience.
Course Overview:
Our very first lesson will dive right into the action, as we guide you through the process of creating your very first GIF in just 10 minutes! You'll learn how to select the right images or slides, apply animations and transitions, and export your project as a GIF file. By the end of this lesson, you'll have a basic understanding of GIF creation and be ready to explore more advanced techniques in subsequent lessons.
Why Learn to Create GIFs with PowerPoint?
PowerPoint is a versatile and widely accessible tool that is often overlooked when it comes to creating GIFs. However, with its intuitive interface and robust animation capabilities, PowerPoint offers a user-friendly platform for creating professional-quality GIFs without the need for specialized software or technical expertise.
By mastering the art of GIF creation with PowerPoint, you'll be able to:
Enhance Presentations: Use GIFs to add visual interest and interactivity to your presentations, making them more engaging and memorable.
Create Eye-Catching Content: Whether you're designing marketing materials, educational resources, or social media posts, GIFs can help you capture your audience's attention and convey your message effectively.
Express Your Creativity: With PowerPoint's wide range of animation effects and customization options, the possibilities for creating unique and captivating GIFs are virtually endless.
Conclusion:
Are you ready to embark on this exciting journey into the world of GIF creation with Microsoft PowerPoint? By the end of this course, you'll not only have the skills to create stunning GIFs but also the confidence to unleash your creativity and make a lasting impact with your visual storytelling. So, let's get started and bring your ideas to life, one GIF at a time!
target_audience: PowerPoint users

Website designers
Managers
