Are you looking for a simple yet powerful way to create videos without the complexity of advanced editing software?
This Certificate Course in Video Editing using Canva is designed to help beginners and aspiring creators unlock the full potential of Canva’s video editing tools.
In this course, you’ll learn how to create engaging, professional-quality videos step by step. Starting from the basics, we’ll explore Canva’s templates, tools, and editing features. You’ll practice adding text, transitions, and animations that bring videos to life. You’ll also learn how to enhance your videos with background music, sound effects, and voiceovers.
Whether you want to create YouTube content, Instagram reels, marketing videos, or educational presentations, Canva provides an easy, drag-and-drop platform that makes video editing accessible for everyone. You don’t need prior experience—just your creativity and willingness to practice!
By the end of this course, you’ll be confident in creating and exporting videos tailored for different platforms and purposes. You’ll also gain practical skills to boost your personal brand, grow your business, or simply share your stories in a more creative way.

It doesn't matter if you're a new or seasoned author, this course will definitely broaden your knowledge.

Danieln Robinette wrote this review:
"Excellent match! I was ready to spend $3000 for Kindle Cash Flow and found this course and all of your other courses! Before the end of it I will have several profitable eBooks online. I am expecting it now!"
Adriano Santana wrote this review:
"Extremely helpful, provided me everything I wanted and I'm not even at 25% completed. The teacher also speaks in a very comprehensive way. Best course I've bought on this topic."
Ana Silva wrote this review:
"This course was exactly what I was looking for. It's perfect for someone starting in the Amazon Kindle Self-Publishing business."
-
Hi, my name is Ian Stables. I wrote more than 50 Kindle books and made around $1,000 a month on Amazon using easy, fast and highly effective methods I alone created. This was while holding a full-time job.
These book writing and marketing methods are different to what other authors are using. All these methods work... and they will work for you too.
What I discovered
I thought my first book would sell well. I had spent a lot of time on it. Sadly, it just got a few sales a month. I had a lot to learn.
I used to find the whole process a struggle. It was hard and time consuming.
First was the hours of trying to decide on a subject to write about.
Then came the long process of writing.
Next came the headache of editing. I did my best to get rid of spelling mistakes and poor wording. I was meticulous. Imagine how frustrated I was when I still found errors existed.
After the editing was done, I still had to format the text, titles, and create a clickable table of contents.
When the book was finished, I then had to write the book blurb to sell it. However, I was fairly good at this, as I had spent years learning.
At last, I would publish my book. I sat back expecting the sales to flood in. But no. I got very few sales with my first efforts.
I was determined to be a success. Others were getting results. Why not me?
I've lost count of how many books I read, not to mention the endless hours of brain numbing Youtube videos.
Gradually, I discovered new ideas and methods. But I still wasn't satisfied. So I spent a lot of time thinking as well as testing lots of different methods.
Was it worth all the effort? You bet.
My second Kindle book made 66 sales in less than 12 hours after my free promotion ended. It stayed a best-seller for more than two years.
-
Get these eight self-publishing courses in one (15 hours of video training):
Endless Nonfiction Book Ideas - You'll Never Run Out Again
Write In Steps: The Amazing Nonfiction Book Writing Formula
How to Write a Nonfiction Bestselling Book or eBook
How to Create Nonfiction Books That Sell Themselves
Format Professional Kindle Books Easily and Quickly
The Top Three Things That Sell Most Kindle Nonfiction Books
The Book Marketing System That Never Fails
Ultimate Way to Get Kindle Book Reviews... That Sell
-
In these eight courses, I'm going to teach you everything I know so you can be successful too
You'll be able to come up with a nonfiction book idea in minutes. A subject you know will sell.
You'll be able to  write books in simple steps.
There is no long editing process. I know a way to catch every error.
You'll be able to quickly format your books and create a clickable table of contents.
You'll know how to set it up to sell. So when someone sees your book, they're very likely to buy.
You'll know the few marketing methods that really work.
-
THESE ARE THE EIGHT COURSES:
Course 1 - Endless Nonfiction Book Ideas - You'll Never Run Out Again
Do you struggle finding a book idea that will sell? I did too. Until now.
I'll give you the method I used to get best-selling book ideas in minutes.
I use to struggle and spend many hours trying to find an idea for my next book. I tested many different methods. Most were not very effective and took far too long. I discarded the ones that didn't give great results. What was left was a few methods that were easy and quick at finding profitable book ideas.
When you've finished this course, you will always be able to come up with book ideas quickly and easily.
-
Course 2 - Write In Steps: The Amazing Nonfiction Book Writing Formula
Do you wish there was an easier and faster way to write your Kindle books?
Well now you can. My unique step-by-step system makes book writing far simpler. So simple that anyone can do it.
Like most, writing a book was time consuming and far from easy. I set out to read every book I could find on the subject. I also spent many hours watching countless Youtube videos.
I started creating a step-by-step book writing system using what I learned. It still wasn't perfect so I moved things around, replaced steps with others until I finally had a super simple effective way of writing books. One I could use again and again.
With this process, you'll be able to quickly plan and write your books in simple steps.
-
Course 3 - How to Write a Nonfiction Bestselling Book or eBook
Do you want to know what makes the difference between a top best-seller to other books?
There is one thing that separates best-sellers from other books. All the top books include it.
I was reading a very famous book. It has sold more copies than any other book apart from the Bible. I then read another book by the same author. In it, he referred to the book and explained how the book would have not done well without a certain ingredient.
This course will not only tell you what this is but also how to do it effectively. This one thing will make the book your own and stand out amongst others.
-
Course 4 How to Create Nonfiction Books That Sell Themselves
There are other things you need to do to get ultimate book sales results. You're about to learn how to ramp up your results. I had a book that outsold every other book I published. It was a top seller for more than two years. It had certain ingredients. I'm going to show you what these are and how to do it.
-
Course 5 - Format Professional Kindle Books Easily and Quickly
With this unique method, you'll be able to quickly format your work into professional looking books. Ones that will attract more sales.
If a book it not formatted to look professional, if will put many people off from reading it. This course will show you a simple quick way of formatting your book.
Formatting can be very time consuming. This course shows how to do this quickly and make the text look professional.
I used to spend a lot of time formatting my first Kindle books. I always knew I had this to do when I had finished writing and editing.
I decided to make this process not only simpler but a lot faster. So I came up with a system that created a template. Every time I wrote a new book I simply used this template.
-
Course 6 - The Top Three Things That Sell Most Kindle Nonfiction Books
The book page is what will get people to buy your book. If it isn't done right, you will struggle to get buyers. This course shows you how to make your book page sell well.
Like you, I wanted to get as many sales as possible from my books. I spent a long time studying what get people to buy. I found there were three main things.
With the know how in this course, you will always be able to get book sales.
-
Course 7 - The Book Marketing System That Never Fails
There are many book marketing methods being taught online. This course will teach you the few that get the best results.
I spent weeks and months learning all the different methods and testing each one. Most of them didn't get much results if any. However, I found that a handful did. I decided to use just these. They always served me well, as they will you.
-
Course 8 - Ultimate Way to Get Kindle Book Reviews That Sell
Readers use book reviews to help them decide to buy or not. This will show you how to get those important reviews. Genuine reviews.
If you use tricks to get reviews, they won't be genuine or convincing.
This popular course shows you how to get them.
If you want to write quality books faster and sell more books, enroll now and join more than 5,000 students who have already enrolled.

courses.description:
Students will learn what is takes to become a professional Voice-over Artist. You will learn how to effectively audition and break down audition scripts; learn how to build a DIY recording booth at home; how to create online profiles for Voice Over submission websites; how Commercial Voiceover recording sessions work and the keywords you need to know in the recording booth; how to make your own professional Voiceover reel; and how to get representation.
You don't just need to have "a great voice" to be a successful and professional Voiceover actor. You need training and the understanding of this as a business. Yet, it doesn't have to be as daunting as it seems! As an industry pro myself, I want to teach you how to get your own foot in the door and take your voice over career into your own hands! It can be accessible, you can work from home if you like, or you can put yourself out there and hit the pavement if you have representation.
After taking this course, you will walk away with confidence that you and anyone who takes the time to learn these skills can be a successful Voiceover Actor and make a living off of VO work! The beginning of your successful Voiceover business starts right now.
I hope you enjoy this class as much as I enjoyed teaching it!
You got this!

courses.description:
Would you like to record yourself as a talking head, talking directly to camera for a YouTube video, website intro, Kickstarter promo, or perhaps your own online course?
Are you completely freaked out by the thought of recording yourself? Or perhaps you've got confidence, but are looking to refine your technique and camera presence?
This course is designed to get you up and comfortable in front of camera, and to speak with confidence and warmth.
How does it work?
An engaging camera presence is a mixture of technique, comfort, camera setup, and a well crafted message that you believe in. All of this can be learnt, refined, practiced and achieved.
The great thing about video is that you don't need to get it right the first time - you can try and retry as often as you like, and people only ever see the bits that you decide to release.
I recently launched a course about creating online courses, and every bit of feedback I received included glowing compliments about my engaging camera presence. The thing they didn't see is how many times I forgot my lines, or scratched my nose and decided to re-take.
What they did see was the result of my years of experience in filming and training presenters, helping talented by shy people to step up to camera, and of course my own experience in talking to camera.
In this course, I lead you through the steps that have worked for me and others I have helped to captivate an audience on camera.
These steps start days before you start your "real" filming, by helping you refine your message, get comfortable with the idea of talking to a camera, develop your speaking tone, and a method for practicing that's far better than simply talking to the mirror or a friend.
As you get closer to filming, the course also explores a range of tools and ways you can setup your camera, lights and sound to evoke a particular mood, and even explores how clothes and sleep can affect your videos.
You will get coaching on your body posture, how and when to emphasise your voice, and what to do with your hands.
Each lesson in this course gives you practical skills that can help you improve your camera presence, starting from right now.
Remember that taking this course now gives you access for life, and this is indeed a living course, where I'll be on hand to answer questions, keep you motivated, and create bonus extra lessons based on your feedback.
Hope to see you inside, and let's get started on improving your camera presence!
target_audience: Anybody looking to talk to camera in a confident and engaging way

courses.description:
Are you desperate to get more Kindle reviews for your books? Seeking more five star reviews? Craving that vital social proof needed to catapult your book sales skyward?
You're not alone.
Many authors struggle to get readers to leave honest reviews for their books, even when they've got a great book and solid sales. The hard truth is that only 1-2% of readers, on average, ever bother to take the time to leave a review. Waiting for those organic reviews to slowly filter in and praying they result in a positive rating can be an agonizing, slugging process.
But it doesn't have to be.
Imagine launching your new book with more than a dozen reviews on day-1?
Getting a large number of positive, honest launch-day reviews is crucial for generating valuable momentum to drive sales of your Kindle book. It's also a lot easier than you might expect, and you can accomplish this while only using white hat methods and best practices. (That's right, no shady business here).
All you need is a quality Kindle book and the simple-to-follow formula I'm going to teach you when you enroll today.

In this course, you'll learn how to:
Get more positive 4 and 5 star reviews for your Kindle books
Build a launch team to get tons of honest day-1 reviews right from the get-go
Create the positive social proof you need to drive launch sales
Increase your overall customer reviews over time using strategic best practices
Overcome the challenges of getting negative reviews
Learn how to turn constructive criticism into a valuable tool for improving your books and getting more positive reviews
And more!


Are you ready to turn the tide and get more positive and reviews and social proof to drive your Kindle book sales? Scroll on up and click "Take This Course" today! Let's get started!

courses.description:
This is a BUSINESS course for Business, Government and Not for Profits: Wordpress can be used for a variety of purposes including hobby blogging and opinion sites. But in THIS course you'll learn how to turn the free Wordpress hosted software into a social media press room for Public Relations, Marketing and general Business students interested in Facebook and Twitter and blogs. If you want to integrate Facebook and Twitter and Instagram and all that good stuff into your website instead of having it sit aside from your channels, this is the course for you. If you are a corporate writer, public relations press release manager, or a small business wanting to create a free website that catches the eye of journalists, and customers on social media, this course will teach you how to create the site, add your own domain name, write articles and publish blog posts, turn your blog articles into an enewsletter and fully integrate social sharing, Facebook and Twitter into your hub/website. If you already have a website or even a Wordpress blog, this course will help you see if it's been set up right to get the most readers, and customers interest.

Learn what makes a social media press release "social".
See examples of a social media press room by some of the world's biggest companies and organisations
Practice writing for social media distribution by customers and journalists
Build social media into your everyday website so that the website and Facebook/Twitter work together, not separately
Gain experience blogging for business and learn what makes a successful (and read!) business blog
Brush up on your Public Relations, Marketing, Content and Business skills by creating a website from scratch (no techie bits!) and presenting it to the world
If you complete this course you will have a live, business website with relevant information for both customers to make purchasing decisions and journalists to review and contact you.
What are the Main Features of a Social Media Press Release?
A controllable hub (Facebook, Twitter etc are under the control of those companies).
Written in the most suitable brand voice (educational, serious, fun, corporate or entertainment)
Strong visual branding (colours and logos, and header images)
About statements on corporate social responsibility, company history, stories.
Contacts such as address of press launch, and maps, email addresses, phone numbers
Lots of rich content “social objects" ripe for dissemination on Facebook and Twitter
Usable and easy admin and structure – ability to email in a press release and have it go live!
Call to action widgets (sign up for email newsletters, download industry PDF, fill in survey)
Posts containing: Coupons, offers, competitions, company statements, message from CEO, industry vision.
Social sharing also increases SEO and SMO (search and social media optimisation).
Your own personal blogging mentor! 3 hours of videos, a workbook, quizzes, and a question and answer forum where you can ask me any question about Wordpress. I'll even make a video to respond to your question and walk you through it! Provided it hasn't been covered already etc.
My name is Laurel Papworth, I've been blogging for over 10 years (and before then, a "citizen journalist") and have won accolades such as Forbes Magazine "Top 50 Social Media Influencer" and AdAge magazine "Power 150 Media and Marketing Blogger". I have taught this course at University of Sydney and to Corporate and Government in Australia and Asia for 10 years. And I reach 6.8 million people a month through social media.
July 20 2015
target_audience: Marketing, Public Relations and Writers/Editors will gain a lot from the content marketing and social media press release parts of this course.

This course is for anyone who is looking to use Wordpress for Business, who is interested in corporate blogging and writing, or who wants to understand how to make sure their website works WITH their social media and not separate from it. It's not for advanced Wordpress users or those who "just want to blog" and aren't concerned about Press or business needs.
Small business, retail, work from home people will be able to set up a website for free, that meets their business needs.
If you already have a Wordpress site, this will give you training on managing it. If you don't yet have a Wordpress site, this takes you through the correct setup of this free website builder.
Students or those studying business, marketing, social media and other business topics will understand how a blog and social media website fits in with a business digital strategy

courses.description:
How To Podcast Without Wasting Your Time is a course designed to help you start or grow a podcast in the most efficient manner possible. With over 550,000 podcasts on Apple Podcasts alone, the podcast market is getting increasingly competitive.
I am here to help you cut through this market saturation—all without wasting time on trivial or meaningless tasks.
Ny name is Adam and I am a podcasting veteran. Currently I'm the host of The Power of Bold, a podcast on risk-taking, entrepreneurship, and bold living. I designed this course so that students can confidently start their show, increase their listener count, and scale their show. The course is for would-be and current podcasters and there are no prerequisites.
Topics discussed in the course include:
The two most important words in podcasting.
Market research and competitive advantage.
Whether you should “reinvent the wheel” with your podcast episodes.
Finding guests and creating reliable guest flow.
How to stand out from the crowd.
How to monetize your show.
Using freelancers to delegate certain tasks.
Leveraging the “asymmetric bet” of podcasting.
To get a taste of the course, I invite you to view the promo video and free excerpts. If you have any questions, feel free to reach out. I look forward to seeing you inside!

courses.description:
Learn the process, tools, and techniques you will need to find experts and successfully interview those experts on your podcast.
Noteworthy Podcasting Interview Tips & Techniques
Secrets To Finding Experts & Celebrities
Productivity Tools & Techniques For Scheduling Interviews
Interview Templates & Guidelines
How To Successfully Package Each Podcast Episode
Amazing Follow Up Strategies To WOW Your Guests
Influence Strategies That Boost Your Podcast
Understanding the behind the scenes in the podcast world is a game changer. Podcasting has exploded in growth in the past couple of years and is quickly replacing mainstream media. The interview format is the primary show structure for podcasts and when you have the right guests on your podcast you see a spike in new listenership.
Podcast interviews open up the doors to new business relationships, book deals, speaking offers, and is the easiest way to create content to spread your message.
Content Overview
This course is designed for podcasters who want to get more downloads and subscribers. That means if you’re brand new to podcasting or you’ve hit a plateau you can take this information and boost your podcast.
With over 2 hours of video lessons and over 40 lectures of content you will learn all the fundamentals to finding excellent guests and celebrities for your podcast. You’ll be able to schedule interviews with those experts and have successful interview that brings more listeners to your podcast.
We will start out unveiling techniques that will make you a master researcher. We cover little known tools and proven techniques to uncover the research gold. We then cover communication secrets that will make you a master influencer getting people to agree to be on your podcast. We then talk about the best practices for interviewing and then putting together the podcast package to make you and your guest look like professionals.
Students completing this course will have the knowledge and skills to find, interview, and publish an interview with an expert or celebrity.
This course includes templates, swipe files, checklists, mind maps, and resources to use when working through the podcast interview process. There are many copy and paste templates you can use right away to schedule interviews.
target_audience: This podcast course is meant for beginners to intermediates looking to bring on more influential guests for their podcast. No prior interviewing experience required. This course is not about the technical setup or management of a podcast so if you're looking to start your first podcast and you want the "how to" of getting started this is not a fit.

Imagine turning your existing YouTube videos, your short tutorials, your online courses, documentaries, indie films, short video clips, music videos (and any other type of video you create) into an ongoing, passive income, and doing it quickly and easily?

MASSIVE DISTRIBUTION = PASSIVE INCOME

AMAZON’S MILLION DOLLAR BOUNTY PROGRAM

You can rest assured that, if Amazon is putting up 1 million dollars, they want this program to succeed and now you can be part of that success!

courses.description:
Unlock the secrets of creating captivating lightshows in dynamic live environments such as concerts, festivals, and theaters with our comprehensive course, "Mastering Live Lightshows: The Art of Busking." Whether you're a seasoned light operator or a budding enthusiast, this course will empower you to excel in the exhilarating realm of live performances.
In this course, you'll delve into the essence of "busking," a skill crucial for light operators in venues like music clubs, festival stages, and theaters. Busking is the art of creating live lightshows on the spot, adapting instantaneously to the music and the performers without the safety net of rehearsals or predetermined plans. Imagine yourself as an integral part of the performance, synchronizing your lights in harmony with the musicians on stage, all in real-time.
What You Will Learn:
Fundamental Concepts: Explore three fundamental concepts essential for creating adaptable lightshows in unpredictable live settings.
Busking Techniques: Master the art of busking, learning how to improvise and synchronize your lights seamlessly with live music performances.
Effective Preparation: Discover tricks and strategies for preparing a busking show, ensuring you can respond swiftly and creatively to any situation on stage.
Universal Applicability: Learn principles that are applicable across various lighting consoles, such as Ho(TM), Chamsys(TM), Avolite(TM), and MA(TM), allowing you to adapt the techniques to your specific setup.
Software Proficiency: Utilize MADot2onP(TM) software for hands-on practice, although the concepts taught are easily transferable to other software and hardware setups.
target_audience: Experienced Light Operators: Enhance your skills and learn specialized techniques for live improvisational performances.
Aspiring Light Operators: Gain essential knowledge and confidence to step into the world of professional live lighting design.
Theater Professionals: Traditional theater light operators seeking to expand their expertise into the realm of dynamic live shows.

requirements: There are no absolute requirements, but access to a recording device, text editor (or pen and paper), and a guitar and/or piano would be helpful.
courses.description:
Hey guys! My name is Ben Cooper, and I’m a full-time songwriter here in Nashville, Tennessee. Whenever I tell people what I do for a living, I often get a response like, “Wow, writing songs is such a mystery to me.” Maybe you’ve thought about writing a song or have come up with an idea that would make a good song. Who knows, you might have already written tons of songs and are just looking to come back to some of the basics.
Whatever the case, this course is specifically designed to equip you with a working knowledge and understanding of the craft of songwriting.
In this first course, we’ll focus on de-mystifying the process of constructing a song. We’ll begin with questions like “What is the purpose or goal of a song?” and “How do a lyric, hook and melody work together?” Don’t worry if you don’t yet play an instrument… I’ll be giving a quick piano and guitar lesson to get you started. We'll also be looking at the importance of the opening line and what to do if you get stuck starting the second verse.
In the end, my hope is that you’ll feel confident of your ability to take an idea and develop it into a complete song. I’m excited about this course, and I hope you’ll join me!
This course, primarily taught through informal video discussions, will encourage the participation of its viewers by finding specific examples in popular music of each segment topic. This course contains about two hours of viewing time, with the option to participate in composing an original song based on the information discussed. As the instructor, I will be monitoring the discussion weekly and improving upon the course as necessary.
target_audience: This course is intended for anyone who has ever entertained the idea of writing a song. Because the basics of songwriting are covered, beginning writers will probably benefit from this course most.

courses.title: Erstelle Deinen eigenen Online Kurs
courses.bio: Wie du mit einfachsten Mitteln und ohne große Investition einen hochwertigen Online Kurs erstellst.
objectives: Wie Du einen Kurs produzierst, der aus der Masse heraussticht.
Wie Du ein umfassendes Kursskript erstellst.
Wie Du ein professionelles Video-Template ohne Kosten erstellst.
Wie Du deine Videos mit geringstmöglichen Kosten weiter optimierst.

Einführung: Wie Du das Maximum aus diesem Kurs holst
Vorüberlegungen: Das Kernproblem von reinen Online Kursen
Die Reise von A nach B
Kurs-Skript schreiben: 5 Tipps für das Schreiben deiner Lektionen
Videomaterial produzieren: Schritt 5: Video übertragen und Ordnung halten
Extras: Extras I: Audio- und Bildqualität verbessern

requirements: Wenn du den Kurs mit der Methode dieses Kurses am Ende auch produzieren möchtest, benötigst du ein relativ aktuelles Smartphone (ca. 2017 aufwärts) und einen Laptop.
courses.description:
Online Kurse sind eine wunderbare Gelegenheit aus der eigenen Leidenschaft oder Expertise ein Neben- oder Haupteinkommen zu erzielen. Tausende Menschen sind jedes Jahr erneut von dem Gedanken fasziniert, den eigenen Online Kurs zu erstellen, aber nur ein Bruchteil setzt dieses schöne Vorhaben auch tatsächlich um und erreicht das Ziel. Das möchte ich mit diesem Kurs ändern!
Warum setzen die meisten den eigenen Online Kurs am Ende doch nicht um? Bei aller Faszination kann die tatsächliche Kurserstellung ganz schön erschlagend sein: Was werde ich genau in meinem Kurs behandeln? Welche Kamera brauche ich? Wie schreibe ich meinen Kurs? Wie kann ich meine Videos bearbeiten? Ist mein Kurs gut genug? All das sind Fragen, die auch mich lange beschäftigt haben und mich davon abgehalten haben, meinen ersten eigenen Online Kurs zu veröffentlichen.
In diesem Kurs werden wir diese Fragen aus dem Weg räumen und alle Schritte auf dem Weg zum fertigen Online Kurs gemeinsam gehen. Wir werden dein Kursthema ermitteln und besprechen, was einen guten Online Kurs ausmacht. Wir werden dein Skript erstellen und ich zeige dir, wie du deinen Online Kurs mit einfachsten Mitteln und dennoch professionell gestalten kannst. Wenn Du mit dem Gedanken spielst, deinen ersten Online Kurs zu erstellen oder du Inspiration für deinen nächsten Online Kurs gebrauchen kannst, dann ist dieser Kurs für Dich!
target_audience: Dich, wenn Du endlich einen Online Kurs veröffentlichen möchtest
Dich, wenn Du deinen nächsten Online Kurs mit einem (vielleicht neuen) Template umsetzen möchtest

objectives: Charge and quote a client for an explainer video project

requirements: Purchase Explaindio Video Creator
Download and install Audacity
courses.description:
Explainer videos are becoming a very popular form of marketing that many freelancers would love to offer. Unfortunately, many people believe creating them is a difficult job that requires a skilled animator. This course aims to show you otherwise. It aims to show you, somebody with little-to-no experience, how to create great looking professional quality explainer videos that you can sell to your clients.
Learn and Master the Art of Making Explainer Videos Quickly In This Comprehensive Course For Beginners
Recognize the concepts of what makes a great explainer video
Learn how to create a custom-made explainer video, step-by-step, from beginning to end.
Learn where I find valuable resources for adding to my explainer videos
Learn how to charge your clients for explainer video projects
A Powerful and Valuable Skillset For Any Freelancer
Learning how to create explainer videos with Explaindio puts a powerful and very useful tool at your fingertips. There are many benefits to knowing how to properly make an explainer video and sell it. You can become a more valuable freelancer to potential clients seeking this service, especially since many businesses around the world are now seeking explainer videos to describe what they do.
This course is really geared towards someone who doesn't have any experience with programs such as Photoshop, Flash, After Effects and all of those other complicated pieces of software that have steep learning curves. Explaindio, on the other hand, is not geared towards professional artists and makes it easy for just about anyone to create great looking explainer videos. Using my method you'll be making beautiful videos in no time. That said, you're also going to learn how to sell these videos to your clients.
Content and Overview
Students will first understand core concepts of explainer videos learning how to structure a script. Then we'll venture on to see some great resources you can use for obtaining stock photos, videos, and more, free of charge.
Once we've covered that we'll go through an example of creating an explainer video from beginning to end. You'll be able to watch the instructor as he takes you from conception to completion of the project. During this process you will go through all of the steps needed to create a video. Finally, We'll move onto the business end learning how to quote a project for a client, where you can sell your videos, and more.
In order to do what I do you don't have to be an artist. You just need to get those creative juices flowing. And if you don't feel that you are creative, don't underestimate yourself. I'm going to show you how to be creative using my method and it's not as difficult as you may think.
By the end of this course, you'll have valuable skills that you can start using to seek jobs creating explainer videos for clients in order to expand your freelance or work-from-home business.
target_audience: This course is meant for freelancers who want to start offering explainer video creation as a service. No prior animation or explainer video knowledge is needed. This course is probably not for you if you're looking to learn advanced animation techniques.

courses.description:
During long commutes or workout sessions, people get tired of listening to the same old music. These people resort to finding content they are interested in and listening to it. Having your own podcast will allow you to reach this segment of people and expand your marketing presence.
Podcasting is relatively easy to do, but you have to know how to get started before you start uploading your audio to iTunes. Without a little bit of training, you will have some serious trouble getting started.
This course is designed to walk you through the steps taking your podcast from an "idea" to a "reality". We will start with learning more about how podcasting actually works and by the end of the course, we will have your first podcast on iTunes and Stitcher radio.

courses.description:
こんにちは、マーケティングコンサルタント、佐々木晋です。


私は日ごろ、テレビディレクターとして、
プレスリリースを選別する側に身を置きながら、
コンサルタントとして、
プレスリリースを送る企業の側にも身を置くという、
とても珍しいスタンスで活動しています。


ゆえに、プレスリリースを送る側、それを受け取る側、
どちらの苦労も知り尽くしているつもりです。


プレスリリースの本質は、
ものではなく、ものがたりを売る事です。
したがってこの講座では、
自社の商品やサービスの特長を分かりやすくまとめる！
まずは、その発想から完全に脱却して頂きます！


いま、何それ何いってんの意味わかんない！と思いませんでしたか？
そんなあなたに、ぜひ受けて頂きたいんです。


ものがたりを作って伝える事が、広報活動の基本だからです。
この講座では、ものがたりを作るとても簡単な方法をお伝えします。
この方法は、私が独自に編み出し、クライアントさんたちが実践し、
実際にプレスリリースからマスコミ取材を勝ち取った方法です。


最後まで受講いただければ、あなたはきっと、
マスコミから取材されやすいプレスリリースを書けるようになります。
あなたが扱う商品・サービスをタダでたくさんの人に宣伝できます。


ぜひ講座でお会いしましょう。お待ちしています。

objectives: Lerne, wie du Kindle Bücher richtig schreibst, formatierst und veröffentlichst, sodass aus einem eBook ein gutes eBook wird.

requirements: Um Bücher bei Amazon veröffentlichen zu können brauchst du einen Amazon Kindle Publisher Account.
Du möchtest ein Business starten, deshalb solltest du bereit sein ein wenig Geld in die Hand zu nehmen um in Ghostwriter und Marktanalysetools zu investieren.
Du brauchst zum Schreiben von Büchern keine Vorkenntnisse, nur den Willen Bücher zu schreiben.
Ein bereits angemeldetes Gewerbe ist sinnvoll, aber nicht zwingend notwendig, allerdings sollte es angemeldet sein, vor der ersten Buchveröffentlichung.
Du brauchst eine stabile Internetverbindung.
courses.description:
Du würdest gerne lernen, wie man ein profitables eBook Business aufbaut und deine Bücher auf Amazon Kindle zu Bestseller Büchern werden? Dann bist du hier genau richtig!
In diesem Kurs wirst du von mir eine Anleitung von A-Z bekommen, wie du ein eBook planst, schreibst, publizierst und erfolgreich vermarktest. Ich werde dir hier meine persönlichen Erfahrungen weitergeben und einen kleinen Einblick auf den E-Book Markt geben.
Der Kurs ist für jeden geeignet, der Bücher schreiben und Bücher verkaufen möchte, Unternehmer, die sich ein neues Standbein aufbauen möchten, Autoren, die bereits Bücher geschrieben haben und diese nun gewinnbringend vertreiben möchten und Autoren, die bereits auf Kindle veröffentlichen und nach neuen Strategien suchen, um erfolgreicher zu verkaufen.


Gehen wir hier die Themen des Kurses einmal Schritt für Schritt durch:
1. Voraussetzungen: Du brauchst zum Schreiben von Büchern keine Vorkenntnisse, nur den Willen Bücher zu schreiben. Du brauchst eine stabile Internetverbindung. Um Bücher bei Amazon veröffentlichen zu können brauchst du einen Amazon Kindle Publisher Account. Ein bereits angemeldetes Gewerbe ist sinnvoll, aber nicht zwingend notwendig, allerdings sollte es angemeldet sein, vor der ersten Buchveröffentlichung. Du möchtest ein Business starten, deshalb solltest du bereit sein ein wenig Geld in die Hand zu nehmen um in Ghostwriter und Marktanalysetools zu investieren.
2. Marktanalyse & Buchideen: Du möchtest deine Buchideen erfolgreich umsetzen und suchst noch neue Themen, die sich lohnen könnten um ein Buch darüber zu schreiben oder schreiben zu lassen? Dieses Thema wird hier ausführlich besprochen, besonderer Fokus liegt hier auf der Nischensuche, um profitable Buchideen umsetzen zu können, ohne erst einen Markt dafür schaffen zu müssen. Hierzu werden wir unter anderem das kostenpflichtige Tool KDP Rocket verwenden, mit dem ich euch einen kleinen Einblick in den E-Book Markt geben werde. Natürlich zeige ich auch Alternativen dazu auf und gebe sogenannte „Evergreen“- Themen bekannt.
3. Planung & Umsetzung eines E-Books: Hier stelle ich dir eine Checkliste zu Verfügung, die man bei jedem Buch abarbeiten sollte, um es erfolgreich zu schreiben oder schreiben zu lassen. Arbeitsweisen und Arbeitsroutinen stelle ich in diesem Kapitel ebenfalls vor, damit einem erfolgreichen Start bei Amazon Kindle nichts mehr im Wege steht.
4. Kindle Publishing: Ich stelle die Plattform Amazon Kindle vor und deren Programme. Welche Methode der beiden zur Auswahl stehenden (Self-Hosting oder KDP Select) die beste Methode für dich ist, werde ich anhand von einfachen Beispielen erklären.
5. Arten von Büchern: Fiction oder Non-Fiction Bücher, was ist profitabler? No-Content und Low-Content Bücher werde ich in diesem Kapitel vorstellen und wie man auch damit Geld verdienen kann werden wir hier genau besprechen.
6. Outsourcing & Übersetzung: In diesem Kapitel werden wir uns mit dem Auslagern der Arbeitsschritte befassen und was dabei zu beachten ist. Hier werde ich dir Material zu Verfügung stellen, wie du zuverlässige Outsourcingpartner finden kannst und Plattformen vorstellen, die du zur Freelancersuche verwenden kannst. Außerdem zeige ich dir, wie du langfristige Outsourcingpartnerschaften aufbauen kannst. Im Bereich Übersetzung zeige ich dir, wie du kostengünstig ein digitales Produkt in gefragte Sprachen für e-Books übersetzen kannst und welche Schritte dazu nötig sind. Außerdem stelle ich dir Rechtschreibungstools vor, für Deutsch und Englisch.
7. Andere Formate: Hier lernst du, wie du andere Formate in E-Books verwandeln kannst und e-Books in andere digitale Infoprodukte, zum Beispiel einen Onlinekurs, Podcast oder YouTubevideo.
8. Vermarktung: Hier zeige ich viele Wege auf, mit denen du deine Produkte vertreiben kannst. Je mehr Kanäle du verwendest, desto häufiger wird dein Produkt gekauft und durch die dabei entstehende SEO auch bei Google und anderen Suchmaschinen besser gerankt.


Zusammenfassung:
Diese Dinge wirst du nach erfolgreichem Abschluss dieses Kurses können:
- E-Books schreiben bzw. schreiben lassen & vermarkten
- E-Books professionell veröffentlichen
- E-Book Cover erstellen bzw. erstellen lassen
- E-Book Business erfolgreich auf Amazon Kindle starten
- E-Books übersetzen und übersetzen lassen
- welche digitalen Infoprodukte du aus E-Books formen kannst
Worauf wartest du noch? Schreibe dich noch heute in diesen Kurs ein und wir beide sehen uns dann gleich im ersten Video.
Beste Grüße
Martin Sutter
- dein Dozent -
target_audience: Autoren und die, die es werden wollen.
Leute die bereit sind, sich auf das Abenteuer Geld verdienen im Internet einzulassen.

courses.description:
Escribir un libro en formato ebook o tapa blanda y publicarlo puede resultarte
difícil ahora...A mi me llevó un tiempo darme cuenta cómo encontrar
la forma fácil de hacerlo. Pero luego de entender el sistema verás que es muy fácil y rápido.


A través de esta serie de videos te mostraré de forma muy práctica
cómo hago para escribir mis libros, subirlos a amazon kindle y luego quedar libre para comenzar
a trabajar en otros proyectos.


Te mostraré  a través de videos, el paso a paso y las metodologías que uso para que no sea
tedioso escribir un libro. En este curso te enseño lo que para mí funciona y que luego
lo puedas adaptar a tu estilo de vida, costumbres y sobre todo al tiempo del que dispongas.
Por otro lado debes saber que para poder escribir y publicar tus ebooks no necesitas ser Paulo Coelho.
¡De verdad!


¡Tres razones para TOMAR ESTE CURSO ahora mismo!
Tienes acceso de por vida a todos los módulos y recursos!
¡Podrás hacerme preguntas y las responderé de inmediato a cada una de ellas! Seré tu entrenador en línea...
¡Lo que aprenderás en este curso es muy detallado pero a la vez concreto para que
puedas aplicarlo rápidamente!


Que vas a aprender en este curso:


El curso está dividido en dos grandes bloques: por un lado la creación del libro
y por otro, su publicación.


En la primer parte verás cómo encontrar una metodología o modalidad
de trabajo para escribir un libro. Esto es muy importante para que te cuentes verdad y no comiences tú
libro y lo dejes por el camino. Si encuentras tu forma de trabajar no tendrás que
abandonar tu libro para NUNCA continuarlo.
Además te quiero enseñar un par de herramientas para que puedas escribir
un libro de forma muy fácil.


En la segunda parte que es un poco más técnica pero híper necesaria,
descubrirás cómo subir tu libro a Amazon Kindle, que es la plataforma
que inicialmente recomiendo. Son simples pasos pero que tienen sus truquitos
si nunca has publicado un libro.


La parte más importante es hacer visible tu libro para ello hablaremos de
cómo posicionarlo en amazon para que las personas lo encuentren
de forma inmediata.
Si te ven te compran, de lo contrario no podrás mostrar tu trabajo.


Un saludo enorme y te espero como alumna/o
¡Nos vemos dentro!

I have spent thousands of dollars learning how to write books, publish and use publicity to market my books. Now it is time for me to transfer what I have learned to others. Too many people have a passion to write a book, but never get it done because they don't have the plan of action and concrete skills they need. That is why I developed this course. Want to make voice-overs that catch attention and praise?
This online Voice Over Course will teach you how to make great voice-overs using proven techniques and approaches.
This course is designed to teach you the ins and outs of professional voice-overs by showing you the art and craft of making voice-overs showing you how to plan, design and perform them. While there are plenty of courses about making voice-overs, it's hard to find one that gives you step-by-step insight into making voice-overs punching through the noise.
This is the course for you, taught by a professional filmmaker who has personally done hundreds of voice-overs.

Improve Your Voice Overs with This Complete Course
What makes me qualified to teach you?
I'm Paul, a professional documentary film director with over 40 credits. Plus, I create popular video and filmmaking courses - with over 50,000 students and hundreds of 5-star reviews. Over the past 20 years, I've done hundreds of voice-overs for films and videos.
Regardless of your budget or experience level - you can do great voice-overs. Learn professional techniques that I use again and again.
If you want to learn how to make great voice-overs and make money doing so, this is the course for you.
My Promise to You
I'll be here for you every step of the way. If you have any questions about the course content or anything related to this topic, you can always post a question in the course or send me a direct message.
I want to make this the best course for doing great voice-overs. So if there is any way I can improve this course, tell me, and I'll make it happen.
Dive Right In
This course dives right into making great voice-overs with immediate examples of where they are found and how they are used. You'll learn what makes excellent voice-overs so that you can choose how to pitch your voice every time. Next, you'll learn how to structure, design and deliver those voice-overs to tell powerful and emotionally engaging stories.

Learn how to use your voice-over craft online and offline.
Start making great voice-overs today!
With our 30-day 100% money-back guarantee, nothing is holding you back from jumping in right now and trying the course out.
Click the enroll button, and I'll see you in lesson 1!
Cheers,
Paul

courses.description:
Master course in Strategic Public Relations and Communication Management
Navigating the Future: Mastering Strategic Public Relations and Communication Management
In an era defined by rapid technological advancements and dynamic socio-political landscapes, the role of effective communication has never been more critical. Organizations across the globe are recognizing the need for skilled professionals who can navigate the complexities of strategic public relations and communication management. If you aspire to be a leader in this field, a Master's course in Strategic Public Relations and Communication Management may be your key to unlocking a world of opportunities.
Master Course in Strategic Public Relations and Communication Management
The Master Course in Strategic Public Relations and Communication Management is designed to equip professionals with the advanced skills and strategic insights necessary to thrive in the ever-evolving landscape of public relations. This comprehensive program covers essential areas ranging from the fundamentals of PR strategy to the intricacies of reputation management. Participants will engage in hands-on learning experiences, case studies, and real-world applications, ensuring they are prepared to navigate the complexities of modern communication.
1. Fundamentals of Public Relations Strategy:
This module provides a solid foundation in the principles and theories that underpin effective public relations. Students will explore the historical evolution of PR strategies and learn to develop comprehensive plans that align with organizational goals. Emphasis is placed on understanding key stakeholders, identifying communication objectives, and crafting messages that resonate in diverse contexts.
2. Developing and Implementing PR Campaigns:
Building on the fundamentals, this module focuses on the practical aspects of developing and executing PR campaigns. Participants will delve into the strategic planning process, honing their skills in campaign design, message development, and media relations. Through case studies and simulations, students will gain valuable experience in addressing real-world communication challenges.
3. Advanced Tactics in Strategic Public Relations:
This segment delves into advanced PR tactics, exploring innovative approaches to enhance brand visibility and reputation. Topics include crisis communication, influencer engagement, and leveraging emerging technologies for strategic advantage. Participants will analyze successful PR case studies and apply advanced tactics to develop effective communication strategies.
4. Measuring and Evaluating PR Impact:
Understanding the impact of PR efforts is crucial for continuous improvement. This module covers quantitative and qualitative methods for measuring PR success, including key performance indicators (KPIs), sentiment analysis, and impact assessment models. Students will learn to assess the effectiveness of campaigns and make data-driven decisions to optimize communication strategies.
5. Foundations of Strategic Communication & Advanced Communication Strategies:
This dual module explores the broader landscape of strategic communication. Participants will delve into the principles of effective communication, including message development, audience analysis, and channel selection. The advanced segment focuses on specialized communication strategies, including internal communication, government relations, and issues management.
6. Corporate Communication and Reputation Management:
This module explores the critical role of corporate communication in shaping and maintaining organizational reputation. Topics include stakeholder engagement, corporate social responsibility, and crisis prevention and management. Students will learn to develop comprehensive corporate communication plans to enhance brand equity and mitigate reputational risks.
By completing the Master Course in Strategic Public Relations and Communication Management, participants will not only gain a deep understanding of the theoretical underpinnings of effective communication but will also develop practical skills to excel in the fast-paced world of strategic PR. This program is designed for professionals seeking to elevate their expertise and make a meaningful impact in the field of strategic communication.
In this master course, I would like to teach the major topics: (More new lecture updating now..)

courses.title: How to Plan and Outline Novels (Using Scrivener)
courses.bio: Learn the Step-by-Step "Story Beats" Process That Two Bestselling Writers Use To Publish 1.5 Million Words a Year
objectives: Plan your entire story from Day One starting with a no-fuss, stepwise outlining process ... but WITHOUT locking yourself in and cutting off creative expansion as happens with most outlining methods.
Learn how "casting" your characters the way Hollywood does will give you amazing shortcuts to understanding their personalities, appearance, and mannerisms.
Use "location scouting" (complete with online, image-based research) to effortlessly build your story's locations and world (even if your world isn't on Planet Earth).
Find your book's central nuggets by working "narrow to wide," beginning with a single, simple sentence.
Effortlessly craft a story summary, book description, and boiled-down "elevator pitch" with no extra work as you follow the process.
Use Scrivener's native organizational features to keep everything together and searchable, right where you need it whenever you require it.
See how the deepest stories can come from the very simplest of ideas -- and learn how you can make a great story from just about anything.
requirements: Scrivener software (not required for planning process, but recommended to get the most out of it).
courses.description:
In this course, Smarter Artist co-founder Sean Platt will show you the step-by-step process our 3-person bestselling author team uses to plan and outline over 2 million words per year of high-quality, reader-loved fiction without hassle, delays, or the frustration most writers face.
The most important thing any independent author must do to sell more books and make more money is to "write, publish, and repeat," getting new work to market fast. In this course, we'll show you how to get faster while making your stories richer, deeper, and flat-out better.
Through ten videos and just under 3 hours of content, you'll learn a pre-production process we call "story beats" -- a way of planning that combines the thoroughness of traditional outlining with the flexibility and high creativity of "seat of the pants and trusting the story" writing. Having the very best beats in place before writing will take the frustration out of daily writing because you'll always know your characters, their world, their motivations, and their conflicts. You'll know what they look like, how they act, and what they're up to.

Sean will show you this process using our favorite writing program: Scrivener. He'll show you what to put where, how to use images and the different sections to define your project, and how to show up at the desk tomorrow ready to kick butt and take names.
target_audience: Authors who want to write better stories faster.

requirements: Have Scrivener 3 for Mac installed (can be the 30-day, free trial version)

Some experience with Scrivener of any version is helpful, but not required.
courses.description:
Each short video tutorial:
Shows the steps to do one specific task listed in alphabetical order, so that you can find what you need quickly.
Has no narration, but short written instructions when needed.
Repeats each task 2 to 3 times, so you can see it more than once if you need to without having to manually start it over again.
* * *
Scrivener 3 for Mac came out in November of 2017 and Scrivener 3 for Windows is in Beta and should be coming out in the near future.  These videos apply to both the Scrivener 3 Mac and Windows versions unless otherwise indicated.  Most of the videos were recorded in Scrivener 3 for Mac, but most everything is in the same place and the same icons are used in both.  Occasionally, because of Mac and PC platform differences, a task has to be done slightly different in each, in that case both the Mac and PC version will be recorded separately.
* * *
GET A HEAD START ON SCRIVENER 3 FOR WINDOWS: If you have Scrivener for Windows, you may want to download the Scrivener 3 for Windows Beta version.  It still has a few things missing and certain things aren't working exactly the way they will be, but most everything you are learning in this course is available in the Beta version.  The link to the download will be included in the Bonus Section at the end of the class.
* * *
target_audience: Fiction & Nonfiction writers of all kinds: Novelists, Short Story writers, Screenplay and TV Scriptwriters, Playwrights, Poets, Lyricists, Article writers, Journalists, Nonfiction Book writers and even Cookbook writers!

courses.title: Filmvertrieb Meisterkurs: Verkaufe Filme & Serien effektiver
courses.bio: Verkaufe deine Filme & Serien an Vertriebsfirmen, manage den Vertrieb selbst, verkaufe über Amazon & andere Plattformen
objectives: Übernehme den Direktvertrieb deiner Filme, Serien und Kurse

Lerne alles über Amazon Video Direct und wie man Filme, Serien und Kurse über Amazon anbietet
requirements: Du brauchst einen Amazon Account
Du solltest Filmemacher sein oder Interesse daran haben Filme zu produzieren
Du brauchst eine gute Internetverbindung zum Uploaden von Videos
courses.description:
Würdest du gerne lernen wie man Filme, Serien und Kurse online und offline verkauft und vermarktet? Oder hast du bereits Videos produziert und möchtest diese gewinnbringend anbieten? Dann ist dieser Kurs genau das richtige für dich.
In diesem Kurs werde ich dir Schritt für Schritt zeigen wie du gutes Geld mit Filmen, Serien und Kursen verdienen kannst. Wir werden alles über das Thema Filmvertriebsfirmen, Outsourcing und Produktmarketing lernen und ich werde dir an echten Beispielen zeigen wie du jede Strategie, die ich dir im Kurs beibringe für dich, umsetzen kannst.
Was genau werden wir alles in diesem Kurs lernen?
Fernsehformate - In diesem Kapitel werden wir Schritt für Schritt lernen wie man mit Filmvertriebsfirmen in Kontakt tritt, welche Business Modelle es gibt, wie man Filme an Firmen wie Netflix verkauft und warum man Aufmerksamkeit rund um den eigenen Film aufbauen sollte.
Amazon Video Direct - Amazon Video Direct ist Amazons Filmvetriebstool. Über dieses Tool kannst du direkt auf Amazon deine Filme anbieten und erhältst für jede Minute die von deinem Film gestreamed wird Geld. Wir lernen wie man Produkte auf Amazon Video Direct hochlädt und Untertitel automatisch generiert.
Outsourcing - Post Production und Erstellung von Untertiteln ist teuer. In diesem Kapitel zeige ich dir wie du Kontakte in die Ukraine, nach Bangladesh und viele andere Länder aufbaust und deine Arbeit outsourced. Wir werden diesbezüglich vor allen Dingen uns auf die Plattformen Upwork und Fiverr konzentrieren.
Direktvertrieb und Marketing - Wie verkauft man seine Filme eigentlich effektiv über das Internet? Wie vermarktet man seine Amazon Video Direct Produkte und wie baut man eine Community rund um seinen Film auf? All dies werden wir in diesem Kapitel lernen. Der Fokus wird diesbezüglich auf Facebook Marketing und Facebook Werbeanzeigen liegen.
Nachdem du diesen Kurs abgeschlossen hast, wirst du fähig sein folgende Dinge zu tun:
Übernehme den Direktvertrieb deiner Filme, Serien und Kurse
Verkaufe deine Filme, Serien und Kurse über 10+ Online Plattformen
Sei fähig die "Post Production" und anderes online zu outsourcen und spare viel Geld
Verkaufe deine Filme, Serien und Kurse an Vetriebsfirmen und Firmen wie Netflix
Baue eine Community um deinen Film auf und nutze diese um öffentliches Interesse zu wecken
Lerne wie man Filme, Serien und Kurse über Facebook Werbeanzeigen vermarktet
Lerne alles über Amazon Video Direct und wie man Filme, Serien und Kurse über Amazon anbietet
Deswegen nimm deine Chance jetzt wahr, schreibe dich ein und wir beiden sehen uns dann gleich bereits im ersten Video!
Beste Grüße und viel Erfolg im Kurs,
Leon Chaudhari
- Dozent -
target_audience: Filmemacher die ihre Produkte (über Vertriebsfirmen) verkaufen oder mehr über das Thema Direktvertrieb lernen möchten
Online Kurs Dozenten die gerne ihre Produkte gewinnbringend verkaufen möchten

courses.description:
YouTube, çağımızın en etkili ve popüler içerik platformlarından biri haline geldi. Siz de bu büyüleyici dijital dünyada başarılı olmak istiyorsanız, YouTube Eğitim (2023) 0-100 Kursu tam size göre!
Bu kurs, YouTube'un nasıl çalıştığını anlamaktan, kanalınızı oluşturmaya ve büyütmeye kadar her adımı öğrenmenize yardımcı olacak. Sadece temel bilgilere sahip olmanız yeterli; çünkü bu kurs, her seviyeden katılımcı için tasarlanmıştır.
Neler Öğreneceksiniz?
YouTube platformunu derinlemesine anlama.
Kanal oluşturma, tasarım ve içerik planlama.
Hedef kitlenizi belirleme ve çekici içerikler oluşturma.
Videolarınızı optimize etme ve izlenme sayısını artırma.
Gelir elde etme ve işbirlikleri kurma stratejileri.
Eğitmenlerimiz, size YouTube üzerindeki başarı için gereken bilgi ve becerileri aktaracaklar. Siz de kendi YouTube yolculuğunuza başlamak veya mevcut kanalınızı daha da büyütmek istiyorsanız, bu kurs sizin için birinci tercih olmalıdır.
YouTube Eğitim (2023) 0-100 Kursu ile dijital dünyada iz bırakın ve YouTube'da başarınızı yükseltin. Kaydolun ve bugün eğitime başlayın!
Kurs İçeriği:
YouTube'un Temelleri
Kanal Oluşturma ve Yönetme
İçerik Stratejisi Geliştirme
Videoları Optimize Etme
YouTube Monetizasyonu ve İşbirlikleri
YouTube'da Başarı Hikayeleri
Öğrenmeye Devam Etme ve Kaynaklar
Unutmayın ki YouTube sürekli olarak değişiyor, bu nedenle kurs içeriği güncellemelere tabi olacaktır. En son trendleri ve stratejileri öğrenmek için kursa hemen kaydolun!
Eğitim süresince interaktif öğrenme materyalleri, örnekler ve uygulamalar da sunulacaktır. Ayrıca, kurs sonunda bir sertifika alacaksınız, böylece YouTube'daki uzmanlığınızı kanıtlayabilirsiniz.
Siz de YouTube'da etkileyici bir varlık oluşturmak ve içerik üretimindeki becerilerinizi geliştirmek istiyorsanız, bu kursu kaçırmayın. Kaydolun ve dijital dünyada fark yaratmaya bugün başlayın!
target_audience: Bu kurs, YouTube'a yeni başlayanlar için tasarlanmıştır. YouTube platformunu daha iyi anlamak ve kendi kanalını oluşturup büyütmek isteyen herkes için uygundur. Kurs, video içerik üretimine ve düzenlemeye hiç deneyimi olmayanlar için temel bilgiler sunar. Ayrıca, YouTube'un nasıl kullanılacağı, video yükleme süreci, başlık ve açıklama yazma, anahtar kelime seçimi, izleyici kitlesi oluşturma ve YouTube'dan nasıl gelir elde edileceği gibi konuları kapsar.

requirements: If you are self-recording, it's best to have a quiet area of the home that could be used for your audio studio.

courses.description:
Reach a whole new audience with this Audiobook Creation Course!
Why only sell 1 version of your book when you can triple your sales and sell 3 versions of your book?!
Turn  your book into a Kindle, Paperback and Audiobook version by simply following this step-by-step audiobook creation course.
When it comes to selling books these days, authors and publishers just can’t ignore the power of audio anymore. The growth in audiobooks continues at a phenomenal level.


If you’re a self-published author and you are not creating audiobook versions of your works, both past and present, you really are missing out a large part of your potential audience. But the whole process can get very complicated and expensive, if you don’t know what you’re doing.
Peter Baker presents this very practical “how-to” guide for all authors whether they wish to narrate and record themselves or hire in a narrator / producer to take care of the entire audiobook production process. HD video chapters, many with detailed screen shots of exactly how to record, edit and upload your book and audiobooks to the ACX platform that will be sold on Audible and Amazon sites across the world.

This is a highly detailed course and is packed with essential information. Everything is covered including creating the initial Kindle digital version of your book and optimising the sales using a little known book marketing software program!


Then you’ll learn how to;
Adapt your manuscript for the audio medium; selecting the right choices offered by KDP, ACX and other platforms
Find the right people to help you.
Draft contracts and agreements.
Discover the best way to work with narrators and to give practical and constructive feedback on their recordings.
Authors, learn the techniques of experienced narrators so you can record your own audiobooks!


Also, if you’re the kind of author who can’t let go and would rather do absolutely everything themselves...
Peter will show you how you can set up a studio, narrate, record, edit and upload yourself!
Over 3 hours of HD broadcast studio quality training material with a free downloadable transcript for your reference.
target_audience: If you want your books to reach a much wider audience then this course is for YOU!
If you want to make a lot more money by selling more books then this is for YOU!
This is for you if you want your readers to be able to enjoy listening to your books on the move...

Grundlagen von Amazon Video Direct - Wie genau funktioniert Amazon Video Direct und wie viel Geld kann man über die Plattform verdienen? Wir werden außerdem über die technischen Spezifikationen zu den Videos auf Amazon Video Direct sprechen.
Upload von Videos - Der Upload von Videos auf Amazon Video Direct ist gar nicht so leicht. Du musst Metadaten eintragen, Untertitel hochladen und synchronisieren, Designs erstellen und vieles mehr. Ich werde dir Schritt für Schritt zeigen wie dies gelingt und du keine Fehler im Prozess machst.
Untertitel generieren - Zum Horror vieler musst du auf Amazon Video Direct Untertitel zu jedem Video haben. Ich werde dir zeigen wie du nicht jemanden anstellen musst um diese Untertitel zu erstellen, sondern deine Untertitel mit ein paar Kniffen kostenfrei generieren, optimieren und konvertieren kannst.
Marketing - Ohne Marketing werden deine Amazon Video Direct Produkte höchst wahrscheinlich unprofitabel bleiben. Ich werde dir zeigen wie du hochkonvertierende Facebook Werbeanzeigen erstellen kannst mit denen du schnell die ersten Leute dazu bringen kannst deine Produkte über Amazon Video Direct zu streamen.

courses.title: 5 Schritte ins Buchbusiness
courses.bio: Eine Übersicht im Schnelldurchlauf für den Einstieg
objectives: Die grundlegenden Schritte kennen, um erfolgreich ins Buchbusiness einzusteigen.
Verstehen, wie sie eine Buchidee entwickeln und in ein marktfähiges Produkt verwandeln.
Die verschiedenen Veröffentlichungsmöglichkeiten (Self-Publishing vs. Verlag) analysieren können.
Strategien zur Vermarktung und zum langfristigen Erfolg als Autor:in anwenden.
requirements: Keine Vorkenntnisse erforderlich
Motivation, ein eigenes Buch zu schreiben und zu veröffentlichen
Computer mit Internetzugang
courses.description:
Bist du bereit, dein Schreiben auf das nächste Level zu bringen und mit deinen Texten Geld zu verdienen? Dann ist dieser Videokurs genau das Richtige für dich! Wir führen dich Schritt für Schritt in die Welt des Buchbusiness ein und zeigen dir, wie du erfolgreich durchstartest.
Was dich erwartet:
Die Anatomie eines Buches:
Grundlagen und Aufbau: Erfahre, was ein Buch ausmacht, von der Struktur über den Inhalt bis hin zur Gestaltung.
Elemente des Erfolgs: Verstehe, welche Bestandteile ein Buch unverzichtbar machen und wie du sie meisterhaft einsetzt.
Nischenplatzierung:
Marktanalyse: Lerne, wie du profitable Nischen identifizierst und dein Buch optimal darin platzierst.
Zielgruppenansprache: Entdecke, wie du deine Zielgruppe ansprechend und überzeugend erreichst.
Strategischer Aufbau:
Geschäftsplan: Entwickle eine nachhaltige Strategie für dein Buchbusiness, die auf deinen Zielen und Ressourcen basiert.
Marketing und Vertrieb: Erfahre, wie du dein Buch effektiv bewirbst und verkaufst.
Darüber hinaus zeige ich dir:
Verdienstmöglichkeiten:
Einkommenspotenziale: Finde heraus, wie viel du mit Büchern verdienen kannst und welche Faktoren deinen Verdienst beeinflussen.
Passive Einkommensquellen: Lerne, wie du mit einer einmaligen Arbeit langfristige Einnahmen generierst.
Zeitaufwand:
Effiziente Bucherstellung: Schätze realistisch ein, wie viel Zeit du für die Erstellung deines ersten Buches benötigst und wie du diesen Prozess optimieren kannst.
Zeitmanagement: Entwickle Techniken, um deine Zeit effektiv zu nutzen und produktiv zu bleiben.
Erfolgsfaktoren eines Buchlaunches:
Planung und Vorbereitung: Verstehe, welche Schritte nötig sind, um einen erfolgreichen Buchlaunch zu planen.
Durchführung und Nachbereitung: Lerne, wie du deinen Buchlaunch reibungslos durchführst und nachhaltig von deinem Erfolg profitierst.
Bestseller-Geheimnisse:
Erfolgsstrategien: Entdecke, was ein Buch zum Bestseller macht und wie du diese Strategien auf deine eigenen Werke anwendest.
Praxisbeispiele: Erhalte Einblicke in erfolgreiche Buchprojekte und lerne aus den Erfahrungen anderer Autoren.
Warum Bücher eine clevere Einkommensquelle sind:
Stell dir vor, du wirst für eine einmalige Arbeit immer wieder entlohnt. Mit Büchern kannst du dir Stück für Stück eine stabile Einkommenssäule aufbauen. Bücher sind ein smarter, leicht zu erlernender und kostengünstiger Weg, um einen weiteren Einkommensstrom zu generieren. Die Möglichkeiten sind nahezu unbegrenzt, und das Potenzial, deine finanziellen Ziele zu erreichen, ist real.
Warte nicht länger! Schau dir diesen Videokurs an und entdecke, wie du Bücher für dich nutzen kannst. Nutze die Chance, deine Leidenschaft für das Schreiben in ein erfolgreiches Geschäft zu verwandeln.
Ich freue mich darauf, dich im Kurs zu begrüßen und dich auf deinem Weg ins Buchbusiness zu begleiten. Lass uns gemeinsam deine Autorenträume verwirklichen!
target_audience: Anfänger:innen, die ihr erstes Buch veröffentlichen möchten
Menschen, die ein passives Einkommen mit Büchern aufbauen wollen
Unternehmer:innen, die mit einem Buch ihre Reichweite erhöhen wollen
Hobby-Autor:innen, die ihr Wissen professionalisieren möchten

Are you a new or aspiring author who does not know where to start with marketing your book? Then this course is for you.
When you wrote your book, little did you realize that you would need to market it in order for it to reach your audience. You might have published on Amazon and left it there, thinking it would market itself. But, hey, what a rude awakening when you realized that your book would not simply sell itself. To add to your frustrations, you have discovered that there is such a maze of information out there, that you do not even know where to start.

requirements: Keine Vorkenntnisse nötig: Erfahre alles von der Kursplanung bis zur Erstellung. Schritt für Schritt!
courses.description:
Kurs erstellen auf Udemy – Dein Fahrplan zu passivem Einkommen mit Online-Kursen
Willst du lernen, wie du deinen eigenen erfolgreichen Kurs auf Udemy erstellst und dir damit ein zusätzliches Einkommen aufbaust?
Dann ist dieser Kurs genau das Richtige für dich!
In unserem umfassenden Videokurs „Kurs erstellen auf Udemy“ erfährst du alles, was du wissen musst, um auf der größten Lernplattform der Welt durchzustarten. Von der ersten Idee über die Planung und Produktion bis hin zur Veröffentlichung und Vermarktung begleiten wir dich Schritt für Schritt – klar strukturiert und leicht verständlich.
Was dich in diesem Kurs erwartet
1. Udemy verstehen – Chancen & Verdienstmöglichkeiten
Erfahre, wie Udemy funktioniert, welche Reichweite du mit deinen Kursen erzielen kannst und wie viel sich mit Online-Kursen tatsächlich verdienen lässt. Wir zeigen dir echte Beispiele und erklären, wie du dir ein profitables Business aufbauen kannst.
2. Das richtige Mindset entwickeln
Lerne, wie du die richtige Einstellung und Motivation für deinen Erfolg auf Udemy findest. Du erfährst, wie wichtig klare Ziele sind, um langfristig dranzubleiben, und wie du dir Schritt für Schritt eine zuverlässige Einkommensquelle aufbaust.
3. Von der Kursidee bis zur Umsetzung
Erhalte eine praxisnahe Anleitung, wie du Themen findest, die gefragt sind, deine Kursinhalte strukturierst und eine logische Lernreise für deine Teilnehmer gestaltest. So weißt du genau, wie aus einer Idee ein professioneller Kurs wird.
4. Die perfekte Kurslänge und Struktur
Welche Länge ist ideal für deine Zielgruppe? Ist es besser, kompakte Kurse zu veröffentlichen oder umfangreiche Programme? Wir geben dir klare Antworten und zeigen dir, wie du deine Inhalte optimal aufbereitest.
5. Produktion & Technik leicht gemacht
Du brauchst keine teure Ausrüstung, um hochwertige Kurse zu erstellen. Wir erklären dir, welche Tools und Software du wirklich benötigst, wie du deine Videos aufnimmst und bearbeitest – einfach und verständlich auch für Anfänger.
6. Tipps, Tricks & Vermarktungsstrategien
Ein guter Kurs alleine reicht nicht aus – er muss auch gefunden werden! Du erhältst wertvolle Hinweise zur Vermarktung, Optimierung deiner Kurse und Steigerung deiner Einnahmen. So erreichst du mehr Teilnehmer und machst deinen Kurs langfristig erfolgreich.
Warum dieser Kurs?
Dieser Kurs bietet dir nicht nur theoretisches Wissen, sondern praxisnahe Anleitungen, konkrete Beispiele und sofort umsetzbare Strategien. Du lernst nicht nur, wie man einen Kurs erstellt, sondern auch, wie man ihn profitabel macht und ihn langfristig skaliert.
Dein Ergebnis nach dem Kurs
Am Ende wirst du in der Lage sein, deinen eigenen Kurs auf Udemy erfolgreich zu veröffentlichen. Du weißt, wie du Themen findest, Inhalte erstellst, deinen Kurs optimal strukturierst und ihn so vermarktest, dass er Teilnehmer begeistert und dir regelmäßig Einkommen generiert.
Du gehst mit einem klaren Fahrplan, praktischen Tools und der Motivation an den Start, die du brauchst, um deine ersten Schritte in Richtung passives Einkommen mit Online-Kursen zu machen.
Starte jetzt und lege den Grundstein für dein eigenes Online-Business mit Udemy-Kursen!
target_audience: Der Kurs richtet sich an alle, die ihr Wissen auf Udemy teilen möchten, um mit dem eigenen Kurs Geld zu verdienen!

requirements: No prior experience required — this course is beginner-friendly

A creative mindset and interest in sci-fi, storytelling, or filmmaking
courses.description:
Step into the future of filmmaking with Google Veo 2, the cutting-edge AI video generation tool that brings your sci-fi visions to life with just a few prompts. This course is perfect for creatives, content creators, filmmakers, YouTubers, and sci-fi enthusiasts who want to produce stunning cinematic videos without the complexity of traditional animation or VFX.
In this hands-on course, you’ll discover how to turn your science fiction ideas into dynamic video scenes using Veo 2’s powerful text-to-video capabilities. Whether you’re imagining dystopian cityscapes, futuristic robots, alien planets, or space battles, you’ll learn how to create ultra-realistic visuals with minimal effort.
We’ll walk you through:
Accessing and using Google Veo 2’s interface
Writing effective sci-fi prompts
Customizing camera movements, visual styles, and effects
Exporting and using your videos for social media, film projects, or storytelling
No prior video editing or AI experience is required — just your imagination.
By the end of the course, you’ll have a portfolio of sci-fi videos you can showcase or monetize. Tap into the future of video creation today and unlock the power of AI for cinematic storytelling.
Sci-Fi Movie Scenes with Google Veo 2: AI Video Generation (Learn how to generate cinematic sci-fi scenes using Google Veo 2 – no prior video editing or animation experience).
target_audience: Aspiring sci-fi filmmakers who want to create cinematic scenes without expensive gear

courses.description:
Olá, seja muito bem-vindo ao meu curso. É uma satisfação enorme tê-lo(lá) aqui comigo. Atualmente, eu trabalho no setor Audiovisual e Broadcast de uma das maiores Edtech's do Brasil, acredito que também da América Latina, e estou aqui para repassar meu conhecimento a vocês. Por conta da pandemia, essa área apresenta um crescimento no mercado de trabalho e as lives estão cada vez mais em evidência.
Por isso, nesse curso eu vou expor um pouco da teoria que envolve os elementos de uma transmissão ao vivo e gravação de vídeo. Farei sugestões de quais tipos de equipamentos vocês vão poder estar utilizando. (Apesar dos equipamentos relacionados a essa área serem um pouco acima do orçamento, vou mostrar como vocês vão poder estar utilizando alguns recursos acessíveis).
A ferramenta principal que vamos utilizar será o StreamYard (que apesar de ser pago, possui uma assinatura gratuita, mas com recursos limitados). Também vou mostrar como vocês podem utilizar o Youtube para divulgar seus materiais gravados e como realizar suas transmissões ao vivo.
Os conhecimentos que vão ser ensinados nesse curso mudaram a minha vida e me permitiu mudar de vida. Espero poder ajudá-lo a alcançar mais uma habilidade para que possa se destacar no mercado de trabalho.


"O conhecimento passou a ser o principal fator de produção e geração de riquezas."
- Bill Gates

無料でスタートできますので、ぜひこの機会にGhostでの情報発信を始めてみませんか？

Videos reach more people! More and more companies are needing demo or explainer videos to introduce their products or services. With the onset of Filipino-made online applications and games it's now a great timing and great opportunity to learn how to make demo videos and start your own business from it.
Now, it's possible that you can start on your own by combining the things that you'll learn here - learn to make demo video and market your own skills. You don't need to be technically profficient. Making use of the basic correctly and effectively could lead to big changes. Learn to use the basics of Adobe Illustrator, Adobe After Effects and Adobe Premiere Pro while making a project that's fun!
This Learn to Make Money from Making Demo Videos for Filipinos course is for Filipino students who want to get a skill that will help them to make a home-based or online-based business. If you have the time and passion and is eager to learn something simple but profitable then this course is for you.

This course include more than 50 lectures with around 7 hours of content!

Start changing your life now!

Learn iBooks Author to publish your book on iBookstore.
How do you define the word "ebook"? You might think texts and images on your digital devices. But, if you use iBooks Author to create your ebook, you will redefine the world "ebook." iBooks Author is the best tool you can create an ebook without any barriers.
iBooks Author allows you to publish your book on iBookstore. A book created by iBooks Author is the most advanced and interactive that you have ever seen.
The Story
I had written and published my own book 'iStart iBooks Author(Multi-touch)' by using iBooks Author on iBookstore. And the experience with iBooks Author was quite great, because I could freely visualize my ideas through it.
After publishing the book on iBookstore I have got some noticeable moments that I didn't expected.
First, my book became noteworthy on iBookstore.
Second, my book became the bestseller on iBookstore.
Third, Apple introduced iStart iBooks Author(Multi-Touch) at WWDC2013 session "What's new in iBooks Author.
iBooks Author gave me the opportunity to finally visualize my idea! I believe that you can reach that with this course!
Visualize Your Idea!
